32a7('dul ba): mkhan gyi chung ma la ni btsun mo rnams kyis ji snyed yang bar byin no// me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu la ni gzhon nu rnams kyiso// me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna'
32a8('dul ba): ma la ni rgyal po'i mna' ma rnams kyis te/ de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la nor gyi me tog mngon par bsgrub par gyur te/ dbul ba par gyur to// dge slong dag ji
33b1('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa dag mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ bdag cag gi nye du sku mchis te/ de rnams la bdag cag gdug cing bzhin stsol bas/ khyed cag
33b2('dul ba): dag de rnams la khyad par rngo mi thogs nas/ kye 'phags pa bdag cag gis yo byad rnams 'bul gyis zhal ta kho na mdzod cig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras
33b3('dul ba): pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o// zhes dge slong rnams kyis bskab de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
33b4('dul ba): pa/ de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis kyi zhal ta bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams kyis zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de rnam
33b5('dul ba): kyis zhal ta bya bar brtsams te/ ji tsam na steng g.yogs med par thug pa 'tshed pa'i zhal ta byas pa las lha'i char 'babs pa las/ de ma rung bar gyur
33b6('dul ba): pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// steng g.yog med par btso bar bar mi bya'o// sgo gang dang /
33b7('dul ba): khyam su 'tshes par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo gang dang khyam su btso bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i gnas
33b8('dul ba): kyis bzhir mi rung ba'i ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ 'di rnamasu zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// bcu gang zhes na/ steng g.yog med pa dang / sgo gang dang khyams dang /
33a1('dul ba): 'dul ba#/ kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi cang mi gsung bas yang pa can
33a2('dul ba): gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la gnang ngo // de nas yang pa can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/ bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/
33a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bstan las lang ste 'dong ngo // de nas yang ba can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyi
33a4('dul ba): nub mo nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/ zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar reg nas stan ches dma' ba zhig
33a5('dul ba): blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ zhes bya ba'i bar gom pa bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang pa can gyi bram ze/
33a6('dul ba): dang khyim dag rnams chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par stan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
33a7('dul ba): mdzad nas/ gtan las bzhengs te gsheg so// de bzhin du nyi ma gnyis sam/ gsum gyi bar du 'das so// yang pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'kho
33a8('dul ba): rgya chen po mu ge dang ces pa'i dus byung nas/ de rnams kyi nye du dang zas kyi phyir nyi ma re re zhing 'ongs pas/ de dag gi brtses par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams la smras
34b1('dul ba): nad g.yogs gis thugs pa grang mo zhig khyer te byon no// de nas sman pa 'ong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod bde 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang mi bde'o// ci'i
34b2('dul ba): khyod kyi thugs pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs so// ci 'dra ba zhig drang mo'o// 'phags pa ma lags pa zhig bgyiso// sang ni dron mo gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad
34b3('dul ba): g.yog gis bslangs na grang mo kho na rnyed nas/ des de bsros nas byon no// de nas smras pa 'ongs te/ de bzhin du dris pa dang / des smras pa/ mi bde'o// ci'i thugs
34b4('dul ba): ba drang mo gsol tam/ 'thung so// ci 'dra ba zhig grang mo zhig bsros nas so// 'phags pa ma leg pa zhig bgyis so// de grang de bsros pa lags kyi/ sang ni rang
34b5('dul ba): bzhin dron por mdzad de gsol cig/ de nas de nad g.yog gis 'bras dang / snod sta gon byas nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa
34b6('dul ba): las/ de nas kha'i rdug pas de ma rung bar byas pas dge slong de 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das la
34b7('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bskor bar bya'o//
34b8('dul ba): zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams ci 'dra ba dang / ci tsam pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba'i gnas ni lnga ste/ brtsom pa'i
34a1('dul ba): 'dulasrog dang / khrus gang dang / rgyal po'i gnas dang / mchod rten gyi gnas dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / khyim bdag
34a2('dul ba): gnas dang / dge slong ma'i g.yar khang ngo // bcu po 'di dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'i gnas kyi bzhi yin te/ de rnamasu dge slong gi zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// zhal ta byed pa/
34a3('dul ba): na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sngo ba ni/ nang bu can dang zas dug can dang / g.yar bcus lhag pa dag dang yang / tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang / pad pa'i rtsa dang lug
34a4('dul ba): dag go// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod na dge slong nang bu can zhig yod pa de/ sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzang kho bo smen sten tsog/ des nad kyi bzhi dris nas
34a5('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa thub pa gsol gcig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyi ma gnang ngo // sman pas smras pa/ 'phags
34a6('dul ba): pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas/ 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do// des skabs de dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong
34a7('dul ba): rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyil bka' stsal pa/ gas te ldan pa zugs sheg ces par na/ ldan pas bsgo ba bzhin
34a8('dul ba): grags pa gtang bar byas te/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thugs pa gtung bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang ma
35b1('dul ba): tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol bar byas te/ las bya'o//
35b2('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i
35b3('dul ba): gnasu bsko na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas
35b4('dul ba): pa 'di dge 'dun gyis rung ba'i gnasu bsko'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar byas te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa
35b5('dul ba): nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa de/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnasu bskor ba bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad lags pa/
35b6('dul ba): nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gan su bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad lags
35b7('dul ba): pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyis rung ba'i gnasu bsko bar bzod pa de dag gi cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi
35b8('dul ba): bzod pa'i de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyi bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'ad
35a1('dul ba): 'dul na@#mtha' ni can dang sems gtog pa'i mtha' can dang bag nyal ba lta bu dang stong pa'i gnas dang bsgos pa'o// de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni
35a2('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gis slas gnas rtsom pa na der thog mar bzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gan su 'gyur ro// zhes sems bskyed cing tshig tu smras pa ste/
35a3('dul ba): 'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// sems gtong ba'i mtha' can gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gis blas der thog ma rdo ba dang 'dre ba
35a4('dul ba): na/ nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun rung ba'i gan su 'gyur bar nges par bzung shig nges par zung shig ces bya ba te/
35a5('dul ba): 'di ni sems gtong ba'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgo ba tha dad par gses pa ste/ 'di ni ba nyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o// gnas stong pa ga/
35a6('dul ba): zhe na/ 'di ni gnas spangs pa'i gnas gang zhe na/ 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o// bskos pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyi bskos pa'o// dge slong rnam
35a7('dul ba): kyis ji skad bsgo ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor tham
35a8('dul ba): mdom gang dang bcas pa la dge 'dun gyis 'don na de bskor bar bya'o// bsko ba yang 'di ltar byas te/ gnas mal bshams la/ 'gen bde brdungs te/ dris pa'i
36b1('dul ba): mid ches pa las khyod kyi ched du byas pa yin no// zhes thos pas chung bas yin pa shabada' bar mi bya zhes gsung ba dang / rag gathol rnam par dog pa sdus pa cu
36b2('dul ba): las 'di ni bdag gi ched du byed pa yin no// snyam par rung ba mi yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsung ba yin no// dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyi rung ba'i sha bza'
36b3('dul ba): bar bya'o zhes gsung ba/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag gi ched du byed par mngon gsum du mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa la
36b4('dul ba): 'dis khyod kyis ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos pas rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa tshul las/ 'di dag gi chad du
36b5('dul ba): bya ba ma yin no// snyam skyes pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa ma yin no// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong dag
36b6('dul ba): ltogs par gyur par/ de rnams blo phab te 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i bstan pa la ci'i slad
36b7('dul ba): du smos phab ste bzhugs shing / dge ba'i mchog la brtson par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyi smras pa/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bsod snyoms lto 'brangs par mi rnyed
36b8('dul ba): pas kho bo cag ltogs te/ nyams chung ba den blo phab te 'dug go/ de rnams kyi smras pa/ ci ste zhal chus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma gnang ngo // khyod kyi ston pa/
36a1('dul ba): 'dugagang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyis rung ba'i gan su bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge
36a2('dul ba): bdun gyi rung ba'i gan su bskos pa der gnyis bslab dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du bcos pa dang / mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang
36a3('dul ba): ba can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na zhug so// yang pa can gyi sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis/
36a4('dul ba): de'i chad du sha khyer te 'ongs nas/ de yang za bar byed do// gang gi tshe des bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe mi za bas khyer te/ 'ongs na yang dge slong rnam
36a5('dul ba): la sbyin par byed do// dge slong rnams kyis kyang / de dag zos pa dang / mu stegs can rnams mos par byed/ gzhogs 'byas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ shes ldan dag dang dpon
36a6('dul ba): seng ge'i ched du byas te/ sha khyer te 'ongs na ni des de dag ma zos la/ shAkyi 'asras kyi dge slong rnams la byin pa dang / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi chad du byas pa'i
36a7('dul ba): sha ni zos so// zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum gyi rung ba ma yin
36a8('dul ba): ba'i sha za bar mi bya'o zhes gsung ba/ gsum gang zhes na/ bdag gi ched du byas pa mngon gsum du mthong ba rung ba ma yin pa'i sha za bar mi bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang /
37b1('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed kyis ched du sta gon gyis bdag lags kyis snoms te bzhud la byis gsol cig/ de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo // dong nas de'i yang
37b2('dul ba): za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma thos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i
37b3('dul ba): phyir rje su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'di dag ni byin no// snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhi
37b4('dul ba): ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams zas la 'gron du bos te/ de rnams kyi/
37b5('dul ba): zos nas/ bza' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhags te/ dge slong rnams dong ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni bdag cag gi 'phag
37b6('dul ba): pa dag kho na la yongasu btang ba lags te/ 'tshal te mchis la khyed kho na la 'bul lo zhes de rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams de la yang za bar
37b7('dul ba): 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes
37b8('dul ba): gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur sngar yongasu gtang ba'i snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhi ni
37a1('dul ba): ni thugs rje can gyin pas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i gnas de yod do zhes bya ba'i skabs de dag dge slong rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la
37a2('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur dge slong rnams kyis gas
37a3('dul ba): chus bza' bar byas te/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dang
37a4('dul ba): pa can rnams kyis smras pa 'phags pa dag 'di nyid zas kyis bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsug lag
37a5('dul ba): khang du song ste/ de rnams kyi mu ge'i skyon gyis bza' bar 'dod na/ 'on kyang 'gyod pas zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
37a6('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/ mu ge sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'dod na sngar blangs zin to snyam du sems la/ sngar
37a7('dul ba): rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can
37a8('dul ba): rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams kyis nang du zas la 'gron bos nas/ de rnams kyis zos pa dang / bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/
38b1('dul ba): Na dang / shing thogs pa b+ha bu ba dang / shing thogs sin ci ka'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim dag dad pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams thas
38b2('dul ba): zos zin pa dang / chu nas skyes pa dag phul ba dang / dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spangs par byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
38b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyad dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi
38b4('dul ba): bya'o// de la chu nas skyes pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ud pa la'i rtsa ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / ku mu ta'i sa bon dang / pad+ma'i sa bon dang / gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o//
38b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu khams la snyoms pas khrag dang bad kan khrugs par 'gyur to// de'i rim gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/
38b6('dul ba): bdag rang gi blos ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyi/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyis/ ma la bdag gi dri'o snyam nas/ des sman
38b7('dul ba): bal dris pa// bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan khrugs par gyur na/ de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i
38b8('dul ba): ma gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i bsams pa gal te bdag gi tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba
38a1('dul ba): dumanyan yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dang bcan rnams kyis/ nub phyogs kyis 'tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas/ de rnam
38a2('dul ba): kyis bsams pa/ 'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba yin pas/ 'phags pa rnams la 'bul lo zhes de dag gis dge slong rnams la zas zos nas spangs pa byas pa rnams
38a3('dul ba): la/ de dag byin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma bros pa dang / bram ze dang khyim dag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa
38a4('dul ba): dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas bgyid pa las/ da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas/
38a5('dul ba): khyed rnams dang bdag cag gis yon gnas su gyur pa lags na/ gal te khyed kyi ma bzhes na bdag cag dge ba'i shul brgyag dang bral te/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig
38a6('dul ba): rten pha rol tu mchi bar bgyi ba 'am/ de lta bas na thugs rtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
38a7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/ rnyed dka' ba yin snyam bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu 'di
38a8('dul ba): dag yin te/ dgun 'brum dang / bal po se'u dang / bra go da ltar rga dang / yon tshe dang / shing thogs dbur ma na dang / shing thogs ko ru mi'i ka dang / shing thog ni ke/
39b1('dul ba): byed kyi tshal mgon me zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na phyin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par
39b2('dul ba): gyur to// klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang / glang po che nag po'i cha byed 'chang la pad+ma'i rtsa ba khur gcig bskur nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song
39b3('dul ba): la/ gtsug lag khang gi khyams kyi mdun du zhog shog shig/ de klung gi shugs 'gyogs pa'i mthus mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ong
39b4('dul ba): nas/ pad+ma'i brtsa ba rnams khyams kyi 'dun du bzhag nas/ slar log pa las lam gyi phyed na tshal gyi ba glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan gcig 'dus par gyur to// dus
39b5('dul ba): gzhan zhig na/ ba glang mo de las ba glang phru gu zhig 'brang ste/ 'brangs pa'i mod la seng ge'i sgra 'byin to// de nas ba glang mo de skrag pas/ gcin rtag gtor nas/ ba glang
39b6('dul ba): phru gu bor te/ bros so// de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i shing mkhan zhig shing gi chad du tshal du song ba las ba glang phro gu mthong nas/ khyim du grangs te bsnun ga
39b7('dul ba): bskyed de nor gyi bskyangs pas ming nor skyong zhes bya bar gragaso// kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor bskyong skyes bu bskur ba las/ de
39b8('dul ba): mnyan yod kyi yul na gnas pa'i skye bos nor gyis skyabs pas nor skyong zhes 'don to// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos zos/ kha cig ni/
39a1('dul ba): 'du #bal ba'i 'o mas rim gros bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin snyams bsams nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pas ma stan yod nas
39a2('dul ba): gnang bar gyur te/ dal gyi bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du byin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la sdom par zhugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab rten gyi gnas dang nyes
39a3('dul ba): gyur pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab rten gyi mthong nas/ smras pa/ 'phags pa dgong pa ci zhig gi phyir byon no// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu khrag dang
39a4('dul ba): bad kan 'azhugs nas/ de la sman pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'om bstan to// klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na re shig pa zhes shig/ de nas
39a5('dul ba): dal gyibs kyi nang du zhugs nas/ mi'i tshad tsam gyis pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag ston cing bton cing / pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad+ma'i dab ma'i sbyore rag bar nas tshe dang ldan pa me
39a6('dul ba): 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i pad+ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa la blta bar rtsams pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab
39a7('dul ba): brtan gyi smras pa/ 'phags pa ci gzigs/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol bar bzhad nas/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / 'phags pa bzhud dang bskur// de nas tshes
39a8('dul ba): ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lhung bzed bkang ba khyer nas/ dal gri babakyi 'bram nas mi snang bar byas te/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal po rgyal
40b1('dul ba): gi bu ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi mna' ma ji lta bu zhes na/ des gcig gi don du dri sbyar nas brgya stong khyer bar gyur te/ lug gi mna' ma ni de ltar bu yin no// lug
40b2('dul ba): gi bran po ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang che zhing la rol cig rmos pa de'i tshe/ zhing la rol bdun rmos par gyur te/ lag gi bran po de lta bu yin no// lug gi bran mo ji ltar bsod nam
40b3('dul ba): ji ltar bso zhes na/ de gang gi tshe gang tsam gus pa de'i bdun tsam du skye bar gyur te/ de ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
40b4('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag lug gi 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la/ dge slong dag de
40b5('dul ba): de zhi na gshegs pa ni/ ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong
40b6('dul ba): khyer bzang byed du 'dod par/ spro ba ni chos gos rnams longs shig/ ces sgo shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
40b7('dul ba): 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag
40b8('dul ba): las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang / thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dod par spro bar de ni chos gos rnams la longs shig/ tshe dang ldan
40a1('dul ba): 'dulagatshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ kha cig ni dge 'dun las 'brims pas las/ 'on kyang lhag par gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis spangs pa
40a2('dul ba): byas nas kyang za 'dod na bdag gi spang bar byas so zhes ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
40a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' bas/ de'i phyir rje su gnang ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' ba yin no// snyam nas
40a4('dul ba): bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag
40a5('dul ba): lugs ces bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi bran mo'o// khyim bdag lug bsod nams chen par ji
40a6('dul ba): ltar shes zhes na/ gal te bang mdzod stong pa rnams la ltas na/ mthong ma thag kho nar gang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so// lug
40a7('dul ba): gi chung ma ji lta bu zhes na/ des cig gi don du snod bcos pa ni/ brgya stong gi bza' ba byung ste/ lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bu ji lta bu zhes na/ de'i rkang pa la
40a8('dul ba): lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug la/ des gang gi tshe brgya'am stong yongs su btang ba'i tshe/ de de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ lug
41b1('dul ba): bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su dag cag spang bar bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig ma bzhud cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ci ste 'dug/ khyad cag kho bo cag gi
41b2('dul ba): nyan du mi btub po// 'phags pa dag gsungs shig mnyan par bgyi'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyis 'khor gyis skye bo
41b3('dul ba): 'tshogs thams cad nasas nas phyung la/ grong khyer zad byed kyi nang du tshang cig rtsa sngon po rnams ni rngos shig/ 'dug gnas rnams na shig shig/ me tog dang
41b4('dul ba): 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni chod cig/ chu rnamasu dug lugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig dang thams cad bgyi'o// de nas de
41b5('dul ba): rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bos tshogs thams cad gnas nas btong nas/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du btsud de/ rtsa sngon po rnams ni
41b6('dul ba): brngas/ 'dug nas shig ni shig me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam ni bcang / chu rnams la ni dug blangaso// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams
41b7('dul ba): ba bcom ldan 'das bkur sti ma yin par byed pa/ yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med gsum
41b8('dul ba): du bka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad
41a1('dul ba): 'dul #pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor
41a2('dul ba): 'dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegaso// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod/
41a3('dul ba): dra cho 'phrul chen po brtan pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams mtha' khob du song ba las/ de nas grong khyer bzang byed du dong nas gnas pa/ de rnams kyis dge sbyong go'u ta/
41a4('dul ba): ma 'ongaso// zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rod rod gyur nas/ bdag cag dge sbyong go'u ta mas yul dbus nas skyug go/ de la gal te 'dir 'ongs na gdon mi za bar
41a5('dul ba): bdag cag 'di nas kyang skyug par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o// snyamase mo// de rnams kyis khyim bdag cag gis gam du dong nas smras pa/ chos tho
41a6('dul ba): par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag ci lags/ shes ldan dag ltas zin gyis 'gro'o// de ci'i slad du re shig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni bdag cag gi
41a7('dul ba): mthong gis/ ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba'i de'i bar du dong ngo // 'phags pa dag bdag cag rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta
41a8('dul ba): ma spu gri'i ser ba 'beb shing / du ma zhig bud med pa dang khyim thabs med par byed cing 'ongs de/ 'phags pa dag la gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar bzhes par
42b1('dul ba): mthong ngam/ re shig gang shig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang sbyar bar byed pa des khyed cag sgyur bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni sring re skan/ khyed cag rnam
42b2('dul ba): pa thams cad du bltas zin te/ lta ba'i tha ma byas nas 'gro'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig/ khyed cag la dge sbyong go'u ta ma
42b3('dul ba): ci 'gyir mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba la glong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ ci'i des khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur ste
42b4('dul ba): 'am/ mu stegs can rnams kyi smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te khyo cag sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing / gang zhig 'gro
42b5('dul ba): ba de la chad par kar sha pa ni drug bcas bcad par khri chan 'dug go// de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrim su bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
42b6('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs nas/ bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi
42b7('dul ba): bram ze'i bu mo// grong khyer bzang byed bag mar gtang ba der ba'i kha na 'dug pas/ bcom ldan 'das mun khung na bzhugs pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bcom ldan
42b8('dul ba): 'das shAkya'i ri dga' bar mdzad pas/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po sbyang nas rab tu 'byung ba de ni yin te/ gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur na/ bdag
42a1('dul ba): 'dul bamed pa'i yul stong du rgyu zhing gshegs par bya ba 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bde
42a2('dul ba): ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o// snyam nas/ des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu la bsko ba/ song la chu dug can rnams skoms shig/ char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i
42a3('dul ba): bu la bsgo ba/ 'di rnams kyis bskabs dang khyod kyis yan lags brgyad dang ldan pas khong shig/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams la yang bsgo ba/ khyed
42a4('dul ba): kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyis nye 'khor du gnas mthong shig/ de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni chu dug can rnams bsgoms so// char 'beb pa'i lha'i bu ni der
42a5('dul ba): yang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i rig kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas gtab nas ljongs rnams
42a6('dul ba): 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to// mu stegs can rnams kyis grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsogs nas de rnams kyis rtogs chen dag mngags te/
42a7('dul ba): ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shig/ de rnams 'dong ba las ljongs lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas/ slar 'ongs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag
42a8('dul ba): ljongs rnams 'di lta bur 'byor cig rgyas pa ni ldan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo // mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa// shes ldan dag khyed kyis
43b1('dul ba): sam zhes sgrog shig/ btsun pa dga' bzhin 'tshal zhes bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas chas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi
43b2('dul ba): tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ khyim bdag lug gi gam du ste phyin pa dang / smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod la nad med par gyur cig ces gsung
43b3('dul ba): ngo // des smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kho na'i ched du nga 'dir gsheg
43b4('dul ba): na/ khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/ blo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de cig rigs sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo tshogs kyi khrimasu bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong
43b5('dul ba): go'u ta ma la lta ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o// gang zhig 'gro na be tshogs kyi kar sha pa ni drug bcu'i chad pas bcad do zhes bcas so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi
43b6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi bu'i skang pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod cig btags te 'dug pa/ des gal te brgya 'am stong 'gong par btang na yang gang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing yongs
43b7('dul ba): zad par mi 'gyur na/ kar sha pa ni drug bcu sbyin nas khyod 'ong bar mi nus sam/ zhes gsungs ngo // des bsams pa/ 'di ni sus kyang mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das
43b8('dul ba): de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gro'o snyams nas/ des kar sha pa ni drug bcu bsgor bzhags nas/ bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them skas las babs te/ bcom
43a1('dul ba): 'dul / @#/ bag mar thogs la 'bab pa zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa thugs su chud nas/ them skas zhig sprul to// de nas de'i snyib
43a2('dul ba): dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas mar me thogs te them skas las bab nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
43a3('dul ba): spyan sngar mar mi bzhag nas/ zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir du 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang
43a4('dul ba): khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ skyab su mchi bar mngon
43a5('dul ba): dad par lags so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod tshur khyim bdag lag
43a6('dul ba): gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang de la nga na re nad med par gyur cig ces smros shig/ khyim bdag khyod kyi rnyed kho narang 'dir 'ongs na khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/ blo bur rab
43a7('dul ba): la khyod ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba'i ci rigs sam gal tshogs kyi khrims bca' bar byaso zhes smras pa dang / khyod kyis bu'i rkang pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags
43a8('dul ba): te 'dug pa des/ gal te brgya 'am stong 'god par gtang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na khyod kar sha pa ni drug bcu byin nas/ 'ong mi nus
44b1('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta mas mthong nas dge bar 'gyur ram/ des smras pa/ dge bar 'gyuraro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar na tshogs kho nas khrim su bcas pa/
44b2('dul ba): tshogs kho nas shig tu zad mo 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ de rnams kyis khrimasu bcas pa shig nas/ ngabyung bar brtsam so// de nas phan tshun sngos pas 'byung bar
44b3('dul ba): ma nus pa dang / gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'dul ba'i skye bo la snying rtse ba'i phyir/ rdo rje 'phags pas rab dral nas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma kha cig ni ya mtshan
44b4('dul ba): skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i brtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo // de nas skye bos tshogs chen po 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad
44b5('dul ba): gcig tshun 'chad 'khor bar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bden bsham pa
44b6('dul ba): nyid la bzhugs nas/ sems can du ma dag gis rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
44b7('dul ba): mngon sum du byas so// zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gi ni skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blang so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// /
44b8('dul ba): 'dul ba bzhi// // bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring zhig tu chos bshad pas
44a1('dul ba): 'dul ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan
44a2('dul ba): sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi bsams pa dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phag
44a3('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad des/ khyim bdag lug gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
44a4('dul ba): gsum du byaso// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gi
44a5('dul ba): kyang / cig 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod la brten nas phal cher kun gyis
44a6('dul ba): 'thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgro bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar nas song ste/ de khyim
44a7('dul ba): du phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kA sha pa ni'i phung po gtsang ste/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod mod pa/ mtshungs pa med pa
44a8('dul ba): gser gyi mdog can lta 'dod pa/ de ni 'jigs med snying gis shin tu nges byos la/ myur du dong shig de'i nor ni kho bos zhal/ skye bos tshogs kyi smras pa/ khyim bdag
45b1('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung bas byed pas so// rung ba byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so// sangs/
45b2('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye 'khor gyi zhus pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis slab pa'i bzhi bcu par gser dngul len par gsungs la
45b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyi blang bar bya'o// zhes gang gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye ba 'khor lngas 'tshang bar byed
45b4('dul ba): pas dgongs te gsungs kyis mi blang ba ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyi blang bar bya ba'i blangs nas/ bdag gir mi bya'o// khyim bdag lugs gi gsol pa/ bco
45b5('dul ba): ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gi ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom
45b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa 'am dge tshul med na dge slong gi zhag bdun gyi bar byin gyis brlabs nas rang nyid kyi bkur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gi
45b7('dul ba): ji ltar byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis dkrus nas byin lan bya ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du
45b8('dul ba): bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas bskab nas dge slong zhig gi 'dun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i sman 'di dag dang tshang
45a1('dul ba): 'dul @gdug tshod kyis dus las yol bar gyur to// khyim bdag lug gi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyis mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/
45a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag zas kyi dus yol bar gyur to// des gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung ba ci lags//
45a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar dang bu ram dang hwags dang sha ka ra dang tung ba dag go/ de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yos mkhan dag kug ste/ smras
45a4('dul ba): pa shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' rnams myur du sta gon gyis shig/ de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon du bya'o// de nas khyim bdag lug
45a5('dul ba): gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba dang dus ma yin pa'i btung ba rnams kyis tshim par bso// de nas bcom ldan
45a6('dul ba): 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/ ri'i 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang bskal pa ji lta ba bzhin
45a7('dul ba): tu btul te gshegs pa na/ khyim bdag lug gi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shul gyi snyun brgyags kyi bong kar sha pa ni dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das
45a8('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kar sha pa ni blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyi su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes
46b1('dul ba): la btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
46b2('dul ba): ba khyim bdag lug dang lug gi mchis 'brang dang lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi bran mos las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na de drug bsod
46b3('dul ba): nams chen po gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas/ 'di dag gi bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis kyis ma mnyes par nim
46b4('dul ba): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bstsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu
46b5('dul ba): 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba ba ra na se'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid la dbang byed du 'jug/
46b6('dul ba): de'i tshe ba ra na se'i grong khyer du ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyi su char mi 'babs pas thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyuraro// zhes lung sngon mu ge rnam pa
46b7('dul ba): gsum ni za ma tog dang rus gong kar po dang thur mas 'tsho ba'o// de za ma tog ces bya ba ni za ma tog des nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag thugs te/ ma 'ongs pa'i sos
46b8('dul ba): can rnams kyis ched du bzhag nas/ bdag cag shin 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro snyam pa ste/ 'di ni za ma tog dang 'brel pas za ma tog ces bya'o/
46a1('dul ba): 'dul gapa dang mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis phyir zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab po zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// sang
46a2('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ram zhag bdun par gyis brlabs par bya'o// zhes gang gsung
46a3('dul ba): pa su zhig gi 'tshal bar bgyis lags nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyi ste/ lam du zhugs pa dang / smyung ba byas pa dang / nad pa dang / dge skos dang lag
46a4('dul ba): gis bla so// dge slong ljongs rgyur bcas pa rnams kyis 'bras dang phye dag gis nang du bu ram bcug pa las/ lam gyis dal nas za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas mtho
46a5('dul ba): pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas des zas bya ba byed mi nus
46a6('dul ba): pas/ 'bras dag gis nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de skrag nas bza' bar bya'o// phye rnams kyis gang ba yin pa de ni chus bkrus nas/ bya za' bar bya'o// kha cig/
46a7('dul ba): bar gyur pa der bkrur ma rung ste zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smyug ma'i tshal bas bzhar la chus bkru bar bya'o// 'on
46a8('dul ba): kyang zas med par bya ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ leg par gsal te chu'i nang du mnyes la btung bar byas nas de tshags kyis btsag
47b1('dul ba): kyang drug cig lus so// de nas khyim bdag des bang mdzod rnams phyag pa las/ 'bras bre'u chung gang zhig byung nas/ des chung mas snod du blugs te btsos so//
47b2('dul ba): sang+yas rnams rnams 'byung ba med pa na/ rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ji tsam na rang sangs
47b3('dul ba): rgyas zhig ljong rgyu zhing song ba las/ ba ra na ser phyin nas/ snga dro sham thabs dgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ ba ran ser bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
47b4('dul ba): na/ khyim bdag des kyang bza' bar bsdogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de yang rims bzhin du bsod snyoms la rgyus nas de'i khyim du phyin to// khyim dag des de
47b5('dul ba): lus mdzes shing sems dang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ 'di dag gis zos kyang gdon mi bza' bar srog dang bral bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag
47b6('dul ba): gis skal pa rab tu byung ba 'di la sbyin no// snyam nas/ des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo kho bos skal ba ni rab tu byung bas 'di la 'bul lo// des bsam pa
47b7('dul ba): bdag gi khyim thabs mi za can/ bdag gi ci ste bza' snyams nas des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi bskal pa yang 'di la 'bul lo// de bzhin du bu dang mna'
47b8('dul ba): ma dang bran pos dang bran mos kyang dpyad nas/ rang rang gi skal ba yongasu btang ste/ de nas de thams cad 'dus nas/ rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul
47a1('dul ba): 'du rus gong dkar po gang zhen dus de na mi rnams kyis rus dag sdus nas/ re shig bcos te/ ji tsam rus pa de dkar por 'gyur ba dang de nas de'i
47a2('dul ba): khu ba 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni rus gong dkar po zhes bya'o// thur mas 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ dus de na mi rnams kyis g.yul gyi ser gnas 'bru'i 'brum bu dag thur mas
47a3('dul ba): brus nas chu mang pos snod du btsos nas 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni thur ma dang 'brel pas thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis/ ba ra na ser dril
47a4('dul ba): sgogasu bcug pa/ ba ra na se na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer bdag nyon cig ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyi su char mi 'bab pas za ma tog dang / rus go
47a5('dul ba): dkar po dang / thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge 'byung ba lung bstan gyis/ khyed las gang dag lo gnyis kyi bza' bar yod pa de rnams 'khod cig/ gang dag la med pa
47a6('dul ba): dag ni gar dga' bar deng la mu ge med cing lo legs par gyur nas slar sheg shig/ de'i tshe ba ra na se na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba 'khor yang
47a7('dul ba): shing rgya che ba zhig yod de/ des chung ma bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo gnyis kyi bza' ba yod dam/ des smras pa dpon po mchis
47a8('dul ba): so// de de nyid na gnas pa las mu ge de rgyun ma kho nar byung bas de'i bang mdzod rnams yongs zad pas/ 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad shi bar gyur te/ bdag nyid
48b1('dul ba): yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ bdag gis rkang pa la lnga rgya stong btags te/ 'dug pa gal te brgya 'am stong 'god par
48b2('dul ba): btang yang gang ba nyid du 'dug ste/ yongasu zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyed par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes
48b3('dul ba): bar bgyisi cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ mna' mas smon lam btab pa/ btag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
48b4('dul ba): gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbyar ba des brgyu 'am stong skyugs kyang / ji srid sbyor ba ma btang gi bar du zad par mi 'gyur zhing /
48b5('dul ba): 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyis thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ bran pos smon
48b6('dul ba): lam btab pa/ bdag gi yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te zhing rol cig rmos pa na rol bdun
48b7('dul ba): rmos par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par bgyid par
48b8('dul ba): gyur cig/ bran mos smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba bya'i pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag gis gal te snod gang tsam
48a1('dul ba): lo// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni las kyi chos ston gyis tshigs ni ma yin pas des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma kyang bskur steng gi na mkha' la
48a2('dul ba): mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / klog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul
48a3('dul ba): la myur du sems gtong ba yin pas/ shing rtsa ba nas bcad de 'gyel bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/ smon lam ci 'dod pa gtags par brtsom ste/ khyim
48a4('dul ba): bdag gi smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta ba bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te bang ba dang bang mdzod stong pa
48a5('dul ba): dag la bltas pa na/ mthong ba'i de'i mod la gang bar gyur cig/ 'di lta bu chos rnams kyis thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid
48a6('dul ba): mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ chung mas smon lam btab pa bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis
48a7('dul ba): gal te gcig gi don du snod du bcos pa des brgya 'am stong gis zos kyang ji srid bdag gi sbyong ba ma btang gis bar du yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos
48a8('dul ba): rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par bgyid par ma gyur cig/ bu phos smon lam btab pa bdag gi
49b1('dul ba): byung ba rgyal pos thos nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha khyim bdag che ge mo zhig ces bgyi
49b2('dul ba): bas mdzod dang gang rnams bye ba lag so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye 'am/ shes
49b3('dul ba): ldan dag khyim bdag de khug shig/ de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pas/ de'i tshe khyod kyis
49b4('dul ba): mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye 'am/ lha su'i mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye/ 'on kyang de ring kho na sa bon stsal ba'i 'bras bu de ring nyid du grub lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ de
49b5('dul ba): ji lta bu zhig/ des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi bdag nyid chen po de la bsod snyoms phul lam/ lha bdag gi phul lo// de yang
49b6('dul ba): lhag par dad par gyur nas/ tshig su bcad pas smras pa/ kye ma'o yon gnas las byung ba yin/ skyon kun rnam par spang ba'i zhing // de la sa bon btab pa'i// 'bras
49b7('dul ba): bu de nyid thob par 'gyur/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma dang / khyim bdag gi bu dang / khyim bdag gi mna' ma dang / khyim
49b8('dul ba): bdag gi bran po dang / khyim bdag gi bran mo gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag gi lug dang / lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang /
49a1('dul ba): 'dul #brus pa yin pa des/ snod bdun tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i
49a2('dul ba): ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams
49a3('dul ba): la snying rtse ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs sbyin steng gi khang bzangs kyi bzhir ste 'dug pa las/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi song ba'i grib ma rgyal po tshang
49a4('dul ba): sbyin gyi steng du bab nas des gyen du lta bar brtsams pa las rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du bdag nyid chen po 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis gshog chen pos yang su
49a5('dul ba): zhig gi bkren pa'i drungs phyung bar gyur snyam mo de nas khyim bdag de re ba chen pos mdzod dang bang mdzod rnams la bltas pa dang / ji tsam na gang bar mthong ngo // des
49a6('dul ba): chung ma la smras pa/ re shig kho bo smon lam ni rdzogs par gyur gyis/ da khyed cag gi lha'o// de nas bran mos 'bras snod gang tsam drus na bdun tsam du 'phel bar gyur/
49a7('dul ba): chung ma gcig don du btsas pa la de dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug/ nye 'khor gyi srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dun
49a8('dul ba): de nas khyim dag des ba ra na ser dril sgrogasu bcug pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag las su zhig ci don du gnyer ba de shog shig/ ba ra na ser bsgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po
50b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/ chos nyid kyi gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang
50b2('dul ba): tshangs pa la stsogs te/ lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa sems kyi shes par 'gyur bas/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bsams pa/ bcom ldan
50b3('dul ba): 'das ci zhig gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa blta na/ bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams kho na la chos bshad par bzhed do// snyam du rig nas
50b4('dul ba): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lnga rtsen la bsgo ba/ lnga rtsen song la rdzing bu dal gyi bab kyi 'gram du bcom ldan 'das gdan bshoms te/ 'du ma chen po 'dus pa na sus kyang
50b5('dul ba): de'i 'dangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur bar drang srong ke na'i bu'i srung ba cig kyang bsgos shig/ de rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyis drung du drang srong ke na'i bu'i srung ma bzhag nas
50b6('dul ba): gdan bshom par rtsom pa na de na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos ca co'i sgra byung ba dang / de nas drang srong ke na'i bu ca co'i sgra langs nas srungs ma de la dris pa/ ca co'i sgra la
50b7('dul ba): ci zhig/ des smras pa/ gdan shom par byed pa'i 'o// ci kho bo'i phyir ram/ khyod kyi phyir ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir yin no//
50b8('dul ba): khyod 'di ni ci zhig la sdod/ khyod kho na srung ngo // ci'i phyir 'byung po mang po 'du bar 'gyur bas so// des smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de su zhig gis srung bar byed pa
50a1('dul ba): 'dul pa@lug gi bran mo 'di nyid yin no// 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des las kyi rnam par
50a2('dul ba): smin pas drug char yang bsod nams chen por gyur cing / nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong zhing rang sangs rgyas byed pa brgya stong pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa
50a3('dul ba): mnyes par byas kyis ma mnyes par ni ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyis rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig
50a4('dul ba): tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin pas zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag de khyed kyi de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
50a5('dul ba): du'o// sdom ni/ kye ne'i bu yis btung bas blangs/ ka sha'i tshong rdal nas thugs dang / sdig can du ni bca' ba dang / 'gyod dang bcas pa'i zas dag go/ bcom
50a6('dul ba): ldan 'das yul du ma'i gnas na bzhug so// de'i drang srong ke na'i bu gnas ni yul u du ma na 'dug go/ nyin par ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyis 'gram na gnas so//
50a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa/ ngas gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams la chos bshad na der ngas tshegs chung ngus drang srong ke na'i bu thul bar 'gyur snyams pa
50a8('dul ba): dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma langs rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bshad nas/ der thul bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas btso
51b1('dul ba): 'phags skyes po yang grul bum du ma'i 'khor dang grul bum brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum brgya stong phrag du/
51b2('dul ba): ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i mu tig gi thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mu tig gi gtor nas/
51b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas lho phyog su rten te/
51b4('dul ba): 'dug go// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya stong phrag du ma'i
51b5('dul ba): 'khor dang / lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
51b6('dul ba): der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis gtor nas/
51b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'dun gyis bltas nas/ nub phyogs su rten te 'dug
51b8('dul ba): go/ rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyang gnod sbyin du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod
51a1('dul ba): 'dul ba@#'gyur/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la su zhig srung / bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i bsrung ma mdzad do//
51a2('dul ba): zhes byas pa dang / drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas cang mi smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs gsol lhung bzed chos bsnams nas/ u
51a3('dul ba): dum mar bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ u dum mar bsod snyoms la spyad na/ zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spang so// ji ltar thugs snyams
51a4('dul ba): par bzhags nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu u dum nas mi snang bar gyur to// rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi 'gram du byon par 'gyur ba de lta
51a5('dul ba): bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so// de nas rgyal
51a6('dul ba): po chen po yul 'khor skyong dri za'i du ma'i 'khor dang dri za brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang dri za stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang dri za brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang lha
51a7('dul ba): nor bu'i thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
51a8('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyi bltas nas/ shar phyog su rten te 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po
52b1('dul ba): skyong dang de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i dri za brgya stong phrag du mchos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba sten no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
52b2('dul ba): rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po de la khyod kyis mthong ba tsam dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes
52b3('dul ba): pa tsam du gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po de dang bskal pa'i mnyam pa'i grul bum bye ba phrag du ma chos
52b4('dul ba): rnams la chos kyis mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral skyeso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar rgyal
52b5('dul ba): po e ne/ me ne dang phye 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang de dang bskal pa
52b6('dul ba): mnyam pa'i klu brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam
52b7('dul ba): thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar rgyal po chen po// mA sha tu sha/ sang sha mA/ sarba tra bi ra DI/ 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs
52b8('dul ba): 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po rnams thos dang de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri/
52a1('dul ba): 'dul ga#sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i dbyig dang gser gyi thu ba bkang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom
52a2('dul ba): ldan 'das lha'i dbyig dang / gser gyi gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge
52a3('dul ba): 'dun la mdun bltas nas/ byang phyog su rten te 'dug/ de dbus pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/ yul 'khor skyong dang 'phags skyes po'o// mtha' 'khob pa'i rig
52a4('dul ba): ni gnyis te/ mig mi bzang dang rnam thos kyi bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad na gnyis
52a5('dul ba): kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyi ni mi shes la/ gal te mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad nas gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/ gnyis kyis ni mi shes
52a6('dul ba): pas/ ma la ngas gnyis la ni dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do// gnyis la mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gi chos bshad do snyams du dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen
52a7('dul ba): po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus shig pa dang / tshor ba bsil bar gyur pa dang / 'du shes 'gag pa dang / 'du byed rnam
52a8('dul ba): nye bar zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa nub par 'gyur ba de nyid du sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor
53b1('dul ba): bden pa mthong nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung
53b2('dul ba): chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gi bya ba rnams btad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang bstan pa'i don gyi bya
53b3('dul ba): ba la brtson par gyis shig/ dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po chen po/
53b4('dul ba): bzhi rnams kyi sa las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po chen po bzhir gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyi
53b5('dul ba): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon gyis tshe rabs gzhan rnam su las rnams byas shing bstsags pa dang /
53b6('dul ba): tshogs rnyed pa nas zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sku
53b7('dul ba): dgu rnams kyis tshe lo khri thub pa na ston pa zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
53b8('dul ba): ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po na klu gnyis shig gnas pa/ dbugs 'byin na dbugs chen 'byin no// shing shal ma rtseg pa na
53a1('dul ba): 'dral ba@#ma dang bral ba skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgod pa/ de ni bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la khad kyis nyen su la
53a2('dul ba): bstan pa btang nas yongasu mya ngan las 'da'/ gal te lha'i rnams la ni rnams bag med pa la bga' ba mang bas yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro// 'on te mi
53a3('dul ba): rnams la ni mi ni tshe thung ba yin pas/ de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyis/ ma la ngas lha dang mi rnams dang dge slong 'od srung la btad nas yongasu mya
53a4('dul ba): ngan las 'ang/ snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa/
53a5('dul ba): shar phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen pos khyod kyis kyang lho phyogs nas srang pas byos shig/ rgyal po chen/
53a6('dul ba): po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang nub phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen pa
53a7('dul ba): kyi kyang byang phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
53a8('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bsrung ba bgyi lags so// zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
54b1('dul ba): nas dong ba de dag/ de gnyis kyis mthong nas/ na mkha' lding de gnyis kyis klu dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa/ 'gro ba phag gi ngag
54b2('dul ba): su yin te gnyis kyis rgyas par smras pa dang / na mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag cag gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi
54b3('dul ba): spyan sngar skyab su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs la smon lam btab po zhes de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las sgrub
54b4('dul ba): su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs so// dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis ni blar blangaso// de nas lhan cig 'dus nas/ yang dag par rdzog
54b5('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhab sA l+la btugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
54b6('dul ba): srung gi spyan sngar chos gnyan pa'i bden pa mthong ste/ rang gi gan su mchis pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing /
54b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gi bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi
54b8('dul ba): tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan pa'i/ bcom ldan
54a1('dul ba): 'dul ba#yang na mkha' lding gnyis yod pa'i 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang gtsug gi dbang phyug go/ gang gi tshe dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin
54a2('dul ba): gnyis la de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i tshe de gnyis sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis yang
54a3('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabasu song bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs pa dang de gnyis la na mkha' lding gis gnod par bya bar btsams pa
54a4('dul ba): las/ ri rag rlung dang chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas slar log pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni kho bo cag gis khyod gcig la gnod
54a5('dul ba): pa byas na/ sa'i 'og tu 'gro na/ da gang gis na kho bo cag khyed dang phrad nas ri rab la rlung dang chu bzhin du gdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ dbugs/
54a6('dul ba): 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung spyan sngar skyabasu 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blang
54a7('dul ba): so// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag cag gis kyang blang ngo zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
54a8('dul ba): bsrung gi spyan sngar 'dod nas/ de dag phyin pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan snga nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag gis chos thos
55b1('dul ba): rtogs nas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de nas de rtogs pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ gtung ba
55b2('dul ba): brgyad po tso ci'i btung ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang / rgyag shug gi btung ba dang / a sha tha'i btung ba dang / u dum ba ri'i btung ba dang /
55b3('dul ba): rtsub 'gyur gyi btung ba dang / 'bra 'gro'i btung ba dang / gun gyis btung ba khyer ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
55b4('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa btung ba brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis bstod cing sngags pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thug
55b5('dul ba): rtse ba'i nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke ne'i bu la thugs rtse bar dgongs nas btung brgyad po dag bzhes so//
55b6('dul ba): ba zhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byed/ dus su mnyes/ dus su btsags/ dus su/
55b7('dul ba): byin gyis brlabs nas/ dus su longs spyod par byas zhing dus ma yin par yang longs spyod par byas la/ nam gyi thun dang po thal nas ni longs spyod
55b8('dul ba): par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas du su mnyes la/ dus ma yin par brtsags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni//
55a1('dul ba): #'das ngas kyang de bzhin du rjeng bu dal gyis 'bab kyis 'gras du bdag cag la chos bshad de bdag cag gis chos thos
55a2('dul ba): nas bden pa mthong ste/ 'di bzhin du rang gi gnas su mchis par gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ klu dang na mkha' lding bzhi po gang
55a3('dul ba): dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyis dbugs 'byin gang yin pa 'di ni yul khor skyong de nyid yin no//
55a4('dul ba): dbugs cher 'byin gang yin pa de ni 'phags skyes po yin no// 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ni mig mi bzang yin no// gtsug gi dbang phyug ni rnam thos kyi bu yin te/
55a5('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di ngag gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabasu 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs shing smon lam
55a6('dul ba): btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cig/ nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnasu song ngo // chos
55a7('dul ba): bshad pa de drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de
55a8('dul ba): bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang tho nas mod nas drang srong ke na'i bus 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon pa/
56b1('dul ba): bo zhes bya ba de nyid nas nub mo nas btab pa la/ drang srong ri bo'i drang srong ke na'i nam ma langs par langs nas/ nang mi rnams la smra ba thos so// thos nas drang srong
56b2('dul ba): ke ne'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// drang srong ci khyod tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa 'gron du bos sam/ yul ma ga ta'i rgyal po bzo sbyang gzugs can snying po 'am/ pho
56b3('dul ba): zang 'khor na gnas pa'i rgya ma chags sam/ drang krina'i ji ltar 'dod pa yong ma rdzogs sam/ des smras pa/ ra bo khob changs batshungs par spyod pa rnams 'gron
56b4('dul ba): bos pa yang ma yin/ yul ma ga ta'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang ma yin/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bos tshogs kyang ma yin/ drang srong
56b5('dul ba): gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongasu rdzogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas las stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdug tshod la spyan drangaso// des
56b6('dul ba): sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra ma thos pa thos nas/ ba sku thams cad zing zhes byas nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa/ drang srong sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ci zhig
56b7('dul ba): yin/ ri bo dge slong go'u ta ma shakya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smigs bgos te/ dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim
56b8('dul ba): med par rab tu byung nas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ ri bo sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de yin no// ri bos
56a1('dul ba): @longs spyod pa ma sbyar/ bzung babardzu po 'di dganas ma yin par byin lan byas/ dus ma yin pa mnyes/ dum ma yin pa
56a2('dul ba): bcugs pan mas kyi 'og tu yang mengs stong mi byul/ nam kyi mthong 'das byin yang sangs stod par ma bya'o// de nas drang srong sena'i ldan las
56a3('dul ba): thugs phrag pagacig tugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan bdur thog su thal mo ra ba da / ma ldan 'dam la 'dri na tsams
56a4('dul ba): ldan pangs garjong ga dge 'dun bas gcig tu da gagisags da sa na/ gnang pa mdud drugasos// com ldan 'a
56a5('dul ba): kyis drang srong ka na'i bu bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo // de nas drang srong ke ne'i bu bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan
56a6('dul ba): las yang ba te song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing bu'i dal gyis 'bab kyi 'grus nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ u du mar
56a7('dul ba): gshegs so// de nas nang srong / 'i rnam sa langs pa yangs nas/ nad mi rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag pazhengs shig/ bzhin pazang dag la banan/
56a8('dul ba): shing dag gshegs shig/ me dag bus shig/ zhal zas dag gral bar gyis shig/ dkangs dag byi dor gyis shig/ de'i drang srong ke na'i bu'i sring mo'i bu drang srong
57b1('dul ba): 'dul ba la rab tu byung / bstan pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob por gyur to// 'dul ba bzhi// bam po lnga bcud
57b2('dul ba): dgu pa'o// // de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas btabs shing tshim
57b3('dul ba): bar byas so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// des sangs rgyas la skyegro pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na ri bos rab tu byung ba mthong bas des smras
57b4('dul ba): pa/ ri bo khyod rab tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung ngo // legs par byas so// shin tu legs par byas// kho bo sangs rgyas la stsogs pa dge slong gis dge 'dun gdugs
57b5('dul ba): tshod gsol zin nas/ rab tu byung ngo // de nas drang srong ke ne'i bus sangs rgyas la srogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams grang du mar gtsang bsod pa'i bza' ba dang
57b6('dul ba): bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dam
57b7('dul ba): ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yon bsngo ba dang chos bshad pa mdzad nas
57b8('dul ba): gsheg so// de nas drang srong ke na'i bus/ rgyu lhag de dag thams cad btang ba'i chos byas te/ 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
57a1('dul ba): 'dul ba/ smras pa/ drang srong dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin/ drang srong ke na'i bus smras pa/ ri bo rgyal rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las skra dang
57a2('dul ba): kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yang yod/ bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang mang rig
57a3('dul ba): kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de nyid kyis
57a4('dul ba): rje su rab tu byung ba yod de/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du te/ ri bo 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o// ri 'o dge 'dun 'di dang sngar spros pa'i sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas
57a5('dul ba): stsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di kho bos gdug tshod la spyan drang so/ de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas nang par sngar langs te/
57a6('dul ba): 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
57a7('dul ba): drang srong ri bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa leg par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ bdag rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa
57a8('dul ba): dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// drang srong ri bo 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsung ba'i chos
58b1('dul ba): tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ni shes rab che ba rnam
58b2('dul ba): dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po ni mthu che ba dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis mchog tu lung bstan lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pa'i nas
58b3('dul ba): gdam ngag phog pa gang dag lag pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gang dag lags pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu'i
58b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gang dag lags pa de dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
58b5('dul ba): dge slong dag de ltar du ma zad ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ka pi na'i gdams ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/ mo'u
58b6('dul ba): 'gal gyi bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang / sha ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa de dag nyon cig/ dge
58b7('dul ba): slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas shig na drang srong gnyis shig gnas te/ so sor 'khor lnga brgya yod do// tsam dus gzhan zhig na gnyis las gcig shi nas
58b8('dul ba): de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bas gdung nas phan tshun phyan phyin nas drang srong gcig shos des drung du 'ongs pa dang /
58a1('dul ba): 'dul ba/ @#bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ drang srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di
58a2('dul ba): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ dag rab tu byung ba dang / bstan par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos por thob par
58a3('dul ba): na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// drang srong ke na'i bus 'khor lnga brgya dang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
58a4('dul ba): tu byung ba dang / bstan par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stong po de dang
58a5('dul ba): 'bab chu rab tu bzang po'i 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur dbyar gnas par gzhal gyi bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pa'i na
58a6('dul ba): la dge slong lnga brgya btang do// tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la nyis brgya lnga bcu btang do// tshe dang ldan sha ri'i bu la nyis brgya lnga bcu btang do// de nas tshe dang ldan
58a7('dul ba): pa bram ze ka bi nas/ gdam ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
58a8('dul ba): gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gang dag yin pa de dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bu'o// dge slong rnams
59b1('dul ba): shi ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no// 'on kyang dge slong ka pi nas gdam ngag phog pa gang yin pa de dag ni dbang rnon po yin no// me'u 'gal gyi bu gang yin pa de dag ni dbang
59b2('dul ba): po 'bring yin no// sha ri'i bus gang yin pa de dag ni rtul po yin no// gal te sha ri'i bu'i gdam dag ma phog par gyur na de dag gi dro bar gyur pa yang rtogs par mi
59b3('dul ba): 'gyuraro// ke na'i bu ni ral pa can/ ji ltar sangs rgyas sngags brjod pa// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// thams cad mthun par mnyan par gyis// ke na'i bu'i
59b4('dul ba): khyim du ni// dus gcig cig na ston pa po// dpa' chen nyan thos thabs gcig tu// gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangaso// ke ne'i bu'i khyim na ni// zas kyi zhal ta
59b5('dul ba): byed pa dag/ bram ze ri bos mthong gyur te// mthong nas ka'i bu la dris// bag ma len tam 'on te ci// rgyal pos yul 'khor 'gron pos sam/ khyod kyis mcho/
59b6('dul ba): byin che 'dus sam// dris de ni bdag la smros// bdag ni bag ma mi len la// rgyal po 'am yul 'khor 'gron ma pos// bdag gi sangs rgyas sems dpa'
59b7('dul ba): mchog/ gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs// ri bos sangs rgyas dgra thos nas/ yid la bde ba skyes gyur te// sangs rgyas de ni ken bu// dris pa de ni bdag la smos
59b8('dul ba): shAkya'i rigs las skyes pa'i// ston pa gang zag bzla med yod// de ni chos kun blo ldan pas// nges par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// 'du byas 'jig par 'gyur
59a1('dul ba): 'dul pa/ @#de des rnams mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag mkhyen gyi mkhan po de gar song gum mo// des bsams pa dag
59a2('dul ba): 'das na bram ze'i khye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabasu 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar bya'o// snyam nas/ de de rnams dbugs byung bsdus so//
59a3('dul ba): ji tsam du sa gzhan zhig na drang srong de yang nad kyi theb par gyur nas/ de'i slob mcho ga gsum yod pa las des gcig la ni lnga brgya/ gnyis la ni nyi sa brgya lngacu
59a4('dul ba): gsum la ni nyi sa brgya lnga bcu gtang ngo // de ni mchi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to// des la lnga brgya brgan pa gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs med pa'i khams la
59a5('dul ba): dgod pa de ltar gdam dag phog go/ nyis brgya lnga bcu gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs kyi khams la bkod pa de ltar gdam ngag phog go/ nyis brgya lnga bcu phog/
59a6('dul ba): pa gcig shos kyi ni ji ltar mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de ltar gdam ngag phog go/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u
59a7('dul ba): lnga brgya gzugs med pa'i khams la 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ka pi na/ 'di nyid yin no// nyis brgya lnga bcu gang yin pa gzugs kyi khams la rab tu 'god
59a8('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong me'u 'gal gyis bu 'di nyid yin no// gcig shos nyis brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong
60b1('dul ba): ma'i 'od zer can// de bzhin gser ni gtso ma'i// gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin// sa la shing gi me tog dang // kar ni ka ri'i me tog 'dra// rin chen sna
60b2('dul ba): sbas pa'i// rin chen mchod lhong ji bzhin no// n+ya gro da lta bur ni// chu zheng gab par gyur pa dang // 'khor yug 'dom gang 'od kyis ni// kun nas snang ba dag tu
60b3('dul ba): mdzad// rgyal sred brgyas dang nye dur byas// 'dod pa kun dga' grangs nas ni// rab tu 'byung bar mngon byung ba'i// thub pa badren pa rnams la 'gyes// spos ngas
60b4('dul ba): ldan pa'i seng ge ni// gan su 'jig pa med pa ltar// seng ge lta bu'i snying med gsungs// bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// zhal 'dzum mdzad pa'i gsung
60b5('dul ba): dang ni// tshangs pa'i gsung dang snyan pa'i gsungs// rnga sgra'i gsungs ni lta bu yi// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// bzla ba dag pa na mkha' la// rgyu dkar
60b6('dul ba): rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa// na mkha'i ngos la ma
60b7('dul ba): pa lha'i// sangs rgyas mun dang bral gyur cing // mdzes pa bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar khyu ba'i khyu mchog ni// nog dang ldan pa'i mig yo nas// skyes bu
60b8('dul ba): khyu mchog stobs bcu ldan// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dag ni gting zab pa'i// chu chen tshad gzung med pa lta'i// sangs rgyas bsam
60a1('dul ba): 'dub ba@#ba'i chos// 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi gzig la// de bzhin ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing // de ltar 'byung ba rnams kyang gzigs// mngon
60a2('dul ba): shes bya ba byi skyes pa/ de kun rtogs pa thams cad rig/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// mngon par shes
60a3('dul ba): bya mngon shes byas// sgom par byan kyang bsgoms nas// spang bar bya ba spangs pas na// de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// gang zhig ltam par 'gyur ba na// rgya mtsho
60a4('dul ba): ri bos bcas pa'i// sa 'di rab tu g.yos mdzad pa// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis bdud dang nag po'o// rtsa lag gzhon bcas bcom nas ni// de
60a5('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// ba ra na se'i grong bzhud nas// gang gi rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo de bskor ba/
60a6('dul ba): de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi 'dod chags bcing bas bcings/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gis gdug pa'i// sems can mang po grol mdzad pa// de la thal
60a7('dul ba): sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan gang zhig na// nam 'dran de ni ji srid na// shAkya'i sras po 'od mdzad la// de ring nyid nas skyabasu 'gro/ tshar sdug
60a8('dul ba): yid du 'ongs pa de// gang na ba ni bram ze chos// dri za'i rgyal po lta bu'i/ sangs rgyas bla med mthong bar 'gyur// na bza' ngur mig 'od ldan te// gser 'dog tu
61b1('dul ba): stobs ldan pa'i// pi bo bzhin du shin du gnas// snyed ma snyed de sdug dang // smad pa dang ni stod pa dang // grags pa dang ni ma grags pas/ chu'i pad+ma bzhin ma
61b2('dul ba): gos// srog gcod pa ni rnams spangs te// ma byin pa la dga' mi byed// bden pa srung zhing tshangs par spyod// de ni phra ma spangs pa yin// tshig rtsub dag ni mi gsung
61b3('dul ba): zhing // dus su 'bab par 'jam po gsungs// de ni 'dod la rnam sems med// skye bo rnams la dad sems med// yang dag lta ba phun gsum tshogs// ting nge
61b4('dul ba): 'dzin stobs spyod yul ba// bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug/ rdzu 'phrul gyi ni mkha' la gshegs// lha dang mi'i sgra dag ni// gang yin rnam pa sna tshogs
61b5('dul ba): gsan// nyon mongs can rnams dge yang rung // pha rol gyi ni sems kyang mkhyen// gang dang gang du mngon gnas pa/ mngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa dang // sem
61b6('dul ba): can 'gro dang 'ong ba yi// 'chi pho dang ni skye ba mkhyen// zag pa zad cing mi ldan pas// nyer bzhi shin tu mya ngan 'das// dbang po zhi zhi thugs zhi ba// mtshon ni
61b7('dul ba): gang ba bzhin gnas// pad+ma'i rdzing dang glang po che// dam pa drug bcu lon pa ltar// mthong na ngom ni mi shes pas// bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur// ri bo btsa
61b8('dul ba): ldan 'di 'dra ste// de sku ni skyes chen gyi// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing // gzi brjid me'i phung po bzhin// gang gi lo brgya tshangs par ni// skyob pa'i
61a1('dul ba): 'dul ba/ @#gtan pa'i mchog/ bsams kyis mi khyab bla med mthong // nag po'i mchog las ngas 'byung ba'i// nyi ma mkha' la gsal ba dang // me'i
