119b8('dul ba): bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar tshe zhing rgya che ba'i// ri mo na mkha' las 'ongs pa// kun
119a1('dul ba): srog chags thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / rtsa ba dang / shing dang yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma dang / thams ca
119a2('dul ba): bye mar glogacig mchi ba mthong gi lha khyod kyis bgyi ba'am sgrub pa gang lags de mdzod cig/ ces zer la/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang /
119a3('dul ba): byang phyogs nas mi zhig 'ongs te zhes bya ba nas/ bgyi ba 'am sgrub pa de mdzod cig ces zer te/ rgyal po chen po 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po mi
119a4('dul ba): bzod par byed pa/ mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa ni snyed par bka' na/ khyod kyis ci zhig bya/ btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen
119a5('dul ba): po mi bas pa bgyid pa mi zad pa de lta bur nye bar gnas na/ de nyid thob par rnyed par bka' lags pas/ don spyod pa dang / chos ston pa dang / bsod nam
119a6('dul ba): spang ba dang / dge ba spyad pa dang / bzang po spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi stan pa la brtson par bgyi ba ma lags par gzhan ci zhig bgyir mchis/
119a7('dul ba): rgyal po chen po khyod ci'i phyir 'di skad ces/ btsun pa 'jigs pa chen po'i chen po de lta bu zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis ston pa la brtson par
119a8('dul ba): bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// btsun pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin tu ste/ sa'i dkyil la'o//
120b1('dul ba): sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ba dang / de rnams las kyang bu po sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ste/ rtsal po che thub la glag pa shes dag tu gyur lags/ bcom ldan
120b2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so// gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ba ra na se'i grong khyer du khyim bdag cig pu shi
120b3('dul ba): nas de'i chung mas de rtag tu bu mngon par 'dod par gyur to// gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/
120b4('dul ba): shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ ba ra na ser rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba byung ste/ des yang
120b5('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas 'od srung gi mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las rtsig so// de na bud med bu mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang rgas par gyur nas/ mchod ce/
120b6('dul ba): de la byi dor byas nas 'dug/ des 'dun pa'i slongs mo byas nas mchod rten de la mchod pa byas te/ smon lam btab bdag gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
120b7('dul ba): 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bdag bu mang por gyur cig ces bya ste/ song nas grong khyer du zhug so// de nas bu med cig
120b8('dul ba): bu nad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas myong nas du ba dang / des gzhan zhig la bris pa/ ci'i phyir 'di du bar 'gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / des
120a1('dul ba): nas yang dag 'ong ba yis// sa ni phye mar klog pa na/ de la glang pos rjes mi rtsi/ dpung bu chung dang shing rta dang / rtas min gsang tshig
120a2('dul ba): mkhan dang ni/ nor gyi 'gyed pas rgyal mi thob/ de bzhin rgan dang mchi ba yis/ mi rnams 'jom par byed pa ni/ rgyal rigs bram ze rje rigs dang // dmang
120a3('dul ba): rigs rdol dag yung po dang / tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims ldan/ khyim pa de bzhin rtul shug can/ lang tsho nyid dang rgan po dang / de bzhin par
120a4('dul ba): ma'i mi rnams la/ cung zad kyang ni gzeb med pas/ thams cad mngon du 'jom par byed/ de lta bas na mkhas pa'i mi/ bdag gi don la lta ba yis//
120a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/ bla med dag la dang bya zhing / lus dang ngag dang yid dag gi/ dam pa'i chos ni spyad byes na/ 'di na smad par mi 'gyur
120a6('dul ba): zhing / mtho ris song na dga' bar 'gyur/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mngon par dga' ste rjesu
120a7('dul ba): yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo // dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams
120a8('dul ba): cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhes pa/ btsun pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gams las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sgo nga/
121b1('dul ba): char sgo ngar 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma 'di nyid yin no// sum
121b2('dul ba): cu rtsa gnyis kyi dge 'dun gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di rnams kho na yin te/ 'dis de na smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis
121b3('dul ba): byung ngo // btsun pa sa ga'i bu rnams kyi sa las ci zhig bgyis na/ las kyi rnam par smin pas nod pas ma bgyis shing skyon ma mchis par rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
121b4('dul ba): bkum nas de rnams mgos bze ba skad nas sa ga ma la skur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di kho na las rnams byas shing skyugs pa
121b5('dul ba): dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ las can rnams 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor na chang 'tshong zhig gnas so// chom
121b6('dul ba): rkun pa rab tu mang po chang 'tshol zhing de'i drung du 'ongs nas bris pa/ chang yod dam/ chang tshong gi chung mas smras pa yod do zhes de rnams la blud na/ 'tshar ba med
121b7('dul ba): nas des glang zhig stan te 'di song cig de rnams kyis smras pa/ mtsho cha med do// des btag blangs nas mtsho cha byin pa dang / de rnams de bsad par brtsam so//
121b8('dul ba): de bsod pa na sems la bsod pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ni chang 'tshong gi chung ma 'dis yin gyis bdag gang du 'di rnams mgo bcad nas gseb skang
121a1('dul ba): ba sams pa/ gal te de dag la bu byung bar gyur na/ bdag kyang sdug bsngal bar 'di lta bu nyam su myong bar 'gyur snyam pa las/ ji tsam na su
121a2('dul ba): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dge 'dun gyi mchod rten de la mchod pa byed pa na bud med de yang de dang ha cang yang mi ri ba zhig na 'dug go/ de rnams kyis mchod pa byed nas/ smon
121a3('dul ba): lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag chen po chen po'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so// des de rnams la bris pa dang / bu dag khyed kyis
121a4('dul ba): smon lam ci zhig btab/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum 'di dang 'di dgo/ des smras pa/ bu dag lag te de dag na khyed cag gi mar dag kho nar gyur cig/ yum de
121a5('dul ba): bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas/ de rnams dong ngo / des bsams pa/ re shig bud med de lan cig btsa' na yang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyan pa de ltar du na//
121a6('dul ba): bdag la lan sum bcu rtswa na ji ltar bya zhes/ de de ltar rnam par rtog pa na/ mchod rten dang nye ba na bya gag mo zhig yod pa sgod 'byung ba de de thang cig tsam gyis sgo
121a7('dul ba): nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung la smre sngags kyang 'don to// des bsams pa/ 'byung ba'i thabs ni rung ba yin no// snyam du rigs nas/ mchod rten de la dad pa drag
121a8('dul ba): pos smon lam btab par brtsam pa/ ji ltar bya gag mo 'di thang cig tsam gyis sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ba de bzhin du bdag gis sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang cig
122b1('dul ba): skyed de/ de'i mgo ri dgas kyi 'dra bas/ ri dgas kyi mgo ri dgas kyi mgo zhes bya bar grag so// dus gzhan zhig na drang srong shi nas/ ri dgas mgos rlad pa'i
122b2('dul ba): thod pa rdob pa'i rig pa slab te/ de thod pa rdabs nas thams cad lung ston par byed de/ gal te re sheg sgra grag por gyur na gyen du 'gro ba lhar skyes par 'gyur bar lung
122b3('dul ba): bston par byed do// 'on te 'bring du gyur na/ gyen du 'gro ba mi skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed de/ de ni bde 'gro'i rtag so// ngan 'gro'i rtag na/ gal re shig
122b4('dul ba): sgra mi gsal bar gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ 'on te sgra 'bring du gyur na 'on tu 'gro bar dud 'gror
122b5('dul ba): skye bar lung ston par byed do// 'on te sgra chung bar gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba yi dag su skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul
122b6('dul ba): ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo/ song la rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ongs pa dang / phyir mi 'ongs
122b7('dul ba): ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i mgo bzhi khyer cig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ mgo
122b8('dul ba): bzhi khyer te drang srong de'i mdun du song nas/ khyod kyi lung ston cig/ des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i thod pa la rdabs nas smras pa/ 'di ni lha rnamasu skyes so// lan cig phyir
122a1('dul ba): ste/ 'di la skur bar 'gyur der skye bar gyur cig bsams so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glad gang yin pa
122a2('dul ba): de rnams ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin no// chom rkun pa gang yin pa de rnams ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di bdag nyid de rnams yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chang
122a3('dul ba): 'tshong gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma'i 'di nyid yin no// zhes rgyas par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od mi'i tshal ka lan da ka'i
122a4('dul ba): gnas na bzhugaso// de'i tshe drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sti gnas shig yod de de de na 'chag pa las sti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba'i sa'i rdza ba can
122a5('dul ba): kyi phyogs shig tu/ bcin khu chu dang bcas pa zhig bcaso// blo bur du ri dgas so skom pa nyen pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/ de skom pas nyen pas de 'dru
122a6('dul ba): nas ma'i dbang po la rnam so// sems can rnams kyi las rnam par smin pa ni bsams kyis mi khyab pas sems can dang ldan par gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig
122a7('dul ba): na phyogs de nyid du 'ongs nas khye'u zhig byung ba dang / des de rnams na skal pa mi 'thun pa'i sems can yin nas bor te song ngo // ji tsaman drang srong de sti gnas
122a8('dul ba): de ni 'chag pa las/ khye'u de mthong nas 'di su'i yin zhes des bsams pa la zhugs nas ji tsam bdag gi yin par mthong nas des de sti gan su bzhag ste/ snyun stod
123b1('dul ba): la gal te yang dag rnams grol ba mi g.yo go phang thob rnams kyi/ 'gro ba bdag su yod pa yin/ de skad ces pa bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la ri dag
123b2('dul ba): mgos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / snyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa/
123b3('dul ba): na bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshang bar spyad spyod pa bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung / snyan par rdzogs par mdzad de/ de rab tu byung zhing
123b4('dul ba): snyan par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ rgyal po'i khab du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhi gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gsheg
123b5('dul ba): ba dang mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod kyi ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzang na bzhag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bla gab med pa/
123b6('dul ba): na 'chag cing rgyu skar rnams gzig so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas mgo la bka' stsal pa/ ri dgas mgo ji srid cig na lhas char 'bebs pa
123b7('dul ba): 'gyur soms shig/ de bsams nas btsun pa 'jig rten 'di ma rung / 'di rab tu ma rung lags te/ 'di rgyu skar rnams ji ltar gnas pa dang sbyar na/ lo bcu
123b8('dul ba): gnyis su char mi 'bab lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu skar rnams 'thun par byin gyis rlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ yang shes par gyis shig/ des gsol
123a1('dul ba): 'ongs pa'i yang de bzhin no// phyir mi 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no// dgra bcom pa'i 'thod pa rdabs nas/ ma shes pa rnam par ma shes nas
123a2('dul ba): ngo tsha ba'i phyir 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir 'di'i 'gro ba ma shes pa/ bdag ci sten pa de las nyams par gyur tam/ 'on te slob dpon rigs rigs las/
123a3('dul ba): ma skyes sam/ 'on te rtags rnams de 'dra ba ma yin nam/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa gang gi phyir 'di 'gro ba ma shes pa/ khyod kyis rig pa kun
123a4('dul ba): legs goms ma byas re shig pa mtha' dgas rtogs byos la/ khyod kyis phyi nas 'jig rten lung ston cig/ khyod kyi rig pa thams cad la byang ba mga' mthong ba
123a5('dul ba): yod dam/ des smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas reg pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// ri dgas
123a6('dul ba): mgo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba lha mi skye ba'i 'gro 'tshal na/
123a7('dul ba): rig pa'i skyon gyis sems can spyod pa drug ma 'tshal gyis/ gtso bo srid pa gsum gyi mtsho chen pha rol smra kun las rgyal drug pa ma 'tshal te ci gsungs/ bcom ldan
123a8('dul ba): 'das kyis mer sreg pa'i lcags kyi me/ lcags kyi tho bas brdungs byas nas/ rim gyis 'gro bar zhi ba'i/ 'gro ba ji ltar mi mngon pa/ de bzhin 'dod pa'i 'dam chog
124b1('dul ba): 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par rten ces
124b2('dul ba): bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ cad mi gsungs ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gam rten las langs
124b3('dul ba): te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
124b4('dul ba): dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sa ga ma la cang mi
124b5('dul ba): gsung bas rnang ngo zhes bya ba nas/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag te/ bcom ldan 'das la bu mo mdag bzhug ma dus tshod gsol tu bcug go// ji tsam na bu mo mngag bzhug
124b6('dul ba): de sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas sgo gseb nas ltas na/ dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar
124b7('dul ba): 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tsho ba ba nal phrug 'di bdag gi gtsug lag khang 'dir btab po snyam nas de rings pa rings par 'ongs te smras pa/ jo mo mkhyen
124b8('dul ba): par mdzod cig/ 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tsho ba pa nal phrag rnams kyi gtsug lag khang 'dir btab lag so// sa ga mas bsams pa/ bcom ldan
124a1('dul ba): ba lo drug tu lag so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis yang smras pa dang / gsol ba lo lnga lag so// de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi
124a2('dul ba): bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par spos shig de reng kho nar lhas phye
124a3('dul ba): ba'i tshogs lta bu'i char 'beb par 'gyur te/ de la khrus byed pa gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras bu dang / phol mig 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// re dgas mgo de ltar na rgya
124a4('dul ba): skar rnams ni 'gyur/ sa g.yo ba mi mi rten pa yin te/ srog kyang g.yo ba mi rten pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ri dgas mgo
124a5('dul ba): par dad par gyur to// de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byaso// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba rab tu myong nas tshigasu bcad pa
124a6('dul ba): smras pa/ ri dgas rnams nag khrod rten/ mdab chags rnams kyi mkha' la rten/ rnam par sgom pa chos la rten// dgra bcom mya ngan 'das la rten// ri dgas 'ji
124a7('dul ba): gyi ma sa ga mas/ bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyen yod kyi kha dag kho na'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//
124a8('dul ba): zhes thos so// zos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gdon ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu
125b1('dul ba): mkhas par gyur lagaso// sa ga ma de thugasu chud de leg so/ leg so don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong mchi bar chas
125b2('dul ba): pa la bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ 'gron po rnams dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshogs dang bral na/ phongs par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la long
125b3('dul ba): spyad nas/ tshogs dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur lag so// sa ga ma de yang thug su chud de leg so// don gyi dbang zhig mthong nas/ nad pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge
125b4('dul ba): slong blo 'tshal pa/ bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ nyon mongs pa 'am/ 'gum par 'gyur bas/ des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyod na bro nad las ldang ba
125b5('dul ba): dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ba lag so// sa ga ma de yang thugasu chud de legaso leg so don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun
125b6('dul ba): dge slong bro g.yog bgyid pa rang gi ched du bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ bro 'tshal bgyi ba nyams par 'gyur bas/ des bdag gi bsod snyoms longs spyod na
125b7('dul ba): 'grub par 'gyur lag so// sa ga ma de yang thugasu chud de leg so leg so/ 'on gyi dbang cig mthong na/ dge 'dun la nas thug nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan
125b8('dul ba): 'das kyis nyan thos rnams la drod chung ba yang mchis/ drod che ba yang mchis de la shig drod chung ba gang dag lags pa de rnams ni nas thug 'tshal na drod skye bar
125a1('dul ba): 'das kyis gnang nas/ bdugs tshod gsol bar bzhad par 'gyur ba gang pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gdon mi za bar
125a2('dul ba): 'dis dge slong skran mo rnams mthong ngo snyam nas des gdugs tshod gsol ba'i skyes pa gzhan zhig btang nas/ des btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing mchi
125a3('dul ba): na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu
125a4('dul ba): bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ rgan pa'i mthar thugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
125a5('dul ba): ni sbyin pa chen po brgyad bca' bar bya ste/ blo bu ra ba la gsal ba dang / mchi bar chas pa la skul pa dang / bro 'tshal ba la stsal pa dang / bro g.yog pa la stsal pa
125a6('dul ba): dang gsang gnas kyi 'jams nar ma dang / sman nar ma dang / dge slong rnams la g.yar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong ma rnams la khras ras so// bcom
125a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa ga ma khyod kyi yon tan ci zhig mthong na/ blo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa blo bur mchis pa'i dge slong ni
125a8('dul ba): spyod yul mi mkhas pa dang / lam srang mi mkhas pa lags pas/ des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad ma/ spyod yul ma mkhas pa dang / lam srang la
126b1('dul ba): kyis bdag cing ba gang nas/ 'dzub bkar gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi 'dom nye bar ston te/ de dag gi nye bar rten pa rnams bag 'khums par 'gyur
126b2('dul ba): pas/ de rnams bdag gi khrus ras kyi bkab nas/ khrus bgyid par 'gyur leg so// sa ga ma leg so leg so// khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
126b3('dul ba): brgyad smras pa/ gang yin pa de dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun rnams la yang dug par snang zhing / 'di dag ni rdzas las byung
126b4('dul ba): ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang dag la bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin 'a
126b5('dul ba): tsam mo zhes tshad bzung bar mi nus kyi 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro ba rnams kyi nang du 'duso//
126b6('dul ba): btsun pa bdag gi 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong che ge mo de snga nas dge slong 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas/ rgyun tu zhugs
126b7('dul ba): pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba de ltar thogs na srid pa len par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan
126b8('dul ba): bdun du nyid 'tshams sbyor zhing / 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro// zhes lung stan pa thos te/ de mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing skra
126a1('dul ba): 'gyur ba la/ drod che ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nyams skye bar lag so// sa gam de la yang thugasu chud de leg so leg so// don gyi
126a2('dul ba): dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams las bro nad dmang ba dang / bro nad nyung ba mchis te/ de la bro nad
126a3('dul ba): mang po gang lags pa de rnams la re shig 'tshal che/ bro nad nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na/ lhag par yang bde ba la rigs par gnas
126a4('dul ba): par 'gyur lagaso// sa ga ma de yang thugasu chud de leg so leg so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbyin btsun pa
126a5('dul ba): de ring kho na bdag gi bu mo ma ngag bzhags bgyid pa dus tshod gsol ba btab pa las/ des dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus bgyid pa mthong nas de slar mchi/
126a6('dul ba): te bdag la 'phags rnams ni bzhad la/ mtsho ba pa na la phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang btab po mchis pas/ de rnams bdag gi dbyar gyi gos
126a7('dul ba): ras chen bkab par 'gyur lag so// sa ga ma de yang thugasu chud de leg so lag so// don gyi dbang ji zhig mthong na/ dge slong rnams la khrus ras sbyin
126a8('dul ba): btsun pa dus 'di cig na/ khyim pa mo rab tu mang po dang / dge slong ma rab tu mang po nam/ chu bo gnas ldan la khrus bgyis pa las/ khyim pa mo de rnam
127b1('dul ba): bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ zos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu
127b2('dul ba): dga' ba rgya chen po/ dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan par thob par 'gyur lag so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo// dge slong 'di ni nyon mod
127b3('dul ba): pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhes lung stan
127b4('dul ba): ba de yang re 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar yang mchi la/ des bdag gi blo bur pa'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong ma'i khrus
127b5('dul ba): ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ zos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lag so// bco
127b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi dge slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan la/
127b7('dul ba): 'das pa'i dbyingasu 'jug par 'gyuraro// zhes lung stan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar yang mchi la/ des bdag gi blo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba
127b8('dul ba): nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong ma'i khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ zos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba
127a1('dul ba): yang mchi bar 'gyur la/ des bdag gi blo bu muchi ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras
127a2('dul ba): longs spyod par 'gyur lag so zhes bya ba'i bar te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan par thob par
127a3('dul ba): 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
127a4('dul ba): mug srabs pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas/ sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i
127a5('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin to/ thos nas kyang lung stan pa de yang mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchis zhing slar yang mchis la/ des bdag gi blo bur pa'i zas shes pa nas
127a6('dul ba): dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ thos kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'a/
127a7('dul ba): ba dang ldan pa thos par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun par kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas/
127a8('dul ba): phyir mi 'ongs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyu ro zhes lung ston pa de yang re 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar mchi la nges bdag gi blo
128b1('dul ba): par spyod pa byed do// snyam du dgongs nas/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms spyad de/ zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs/ lhung bzed dang
128b2('dul ba): nam bza' chos gos 'khos su phab nas zhabs bsil te/ nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug lag khang du bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du
128b3('dul ba): 'jog las bzhengs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bden bshams pa nyid la bzhug so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
128b4('dul ba): ga dge slong dag 'dir snga dro sham thabs gos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ ngas dge slong rab tu mang
128b5('dul ba): po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo nas gnas mal mi ga tsang bas gos pa dang khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du
128b6('dul ba): dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag lpags pa dang sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod snyoms byas pa gang yin pA dge slong rnams
128b7('dul ba): bag med cing ma rtags par spyod par byed do// dge slong dag dad pas sbyin pa la bag yod par spyod pa dang / skabs skabasu spyod pa dang / rtags te spyod pa dang /
128b8('dul ba): cung zad spyod pa ni leg so leg so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dad pas sbyin pa la bag yod par spyad par bya ba'i sngags pa gsungs nas/ dge slong
128a1('dul ba): nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la chos dang ldan pa'i
128a2('dul ba): gtam gyis yang dag par stan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ bden las bzhengs te
128a3('dul ba): gsheg so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhad kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ yangs pa can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyi rgyu zhing
128a4('dul ba): gshegs pa na yang pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u'i rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs snam
128a5('dul ba): chos gos dang lhung zed bsnams nas/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhug so// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi btsang ba/
128a6('dul ba): gos pa rnams khro ba dang / skyems pa dang / 'ding bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas
128a7('dul ba): gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang skyems pa dang / 'dings par byed pa gzig so/ gzigs nas kyang yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dang
128a8('dul ba): pa can lpags pa dang / sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin par btang zhing / bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma btags
129b1('dul ba): bdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring snga dro sham thabs dgos
129b2('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ de na ngas mi rgyab nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/ de ni yang dag par
129b3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong du gyur pa las/ de na des dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs
129b4('dul ba): lnga rgya'i bar rgyab nag por gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis deng phan chad ming tsam gyi bding ba dang /
129b5('dul ba): dri ma can gyi bding bas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la/ longs spyad par mi bya'o// longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis
129b6('dul ba): longs spyad par bya ste/ sdug na ni/ rim gcig gis so// seng ba zhig na rim gnyis kyiso/ dge slong rnams bding ba bkra zhing bkra' ba kha tshar ma nyams pa dag
129b7('dul ba): 'chang bar byed pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ bzhogs chas byed/ kha zer bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
129b8('dul ba): stsal pa/ sngon po 'am/ 'dam ka 'am/ kha rgyur ba'i bding ba gris dras pa cang bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i na
129a1('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la/ gding ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o// /
129a2('dul ba): gnas mal la mi bcang bas gos na/ de'i modo kho na la bkru bar bya ste/ bzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs
129a3('dul ba): snams lhung bzed dang chos gos snams nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/
129a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgyab nag por 'gyur ba zhig rgyang ring po kho na nas gzig so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dag
129a5('dul ba): bo khyod kyis mi rgyab nag po thab pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong leg so// kun dga' bo pha gi ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi/ gsung rab la ra
129a6('dul ba): tu byung bar gyur te/ de na 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding ba dang / shur bu dang / rgya chang dang / lcug gu'i gding ba
129a7('dul ba): bting nas longs spyod pa des las kyi rnam par smin pas/ tshe rabs lnga rgyar rgyab nag por gyur to// da dung yang rgyab nag por gyur to// zhes rig par mdzad nas
129a8('dul ba): yangs pa can du bsod snyoms mdzad nas zhes bya ba nas/ nang du yang dag par 'jog las zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la
130b1('dul ba): 'dun gyi chab khung dang / snum phyi sar 'jug par mi bya zhing / dge 'dun gyi de la gnas dben par byin nas rim 'gro bya'o// dge slong mdze nad kyi theb pas kun tu spyod pa'i
130b2('dul ba): chos ji ltar btsas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// / 'dul ba bzhi/ bam po ra~M ba ni/
130b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyi zhus pa/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa'i nam bza' chos gos lhag par
130b4('dul ba): bcad du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa smon dar gyis chos gos la chos gsum du byin gyis rlabs nas chos gos lhag par byin gyis rlabs
130b5('dul ba): te/ bcad du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ci dgar zer te/ de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal dang / sha na'i ras la yang rung ngo // sdom la gso ma'i skra'i
130b6('dul ba): chos gos dang / bcer bu'i skra 'bal lo ma'i gos/ mthang gos bcas dang g.yang bzhi dang / gso ras seng ba pa char sngo// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge
130b7('dul ba): slong zhig bcom ldan 'das 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig
130b8('dul ba): tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gso ma'i chos gos 'tshar bar 'tsha'o//
130a1('dul ba): kyis nyen pas de'i chos rnams rnag dang khrag gi reg nas/ dri mi zhim la sbrang ma rnams 'du zhing de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de bram
130a2('dul ba): ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/ smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byes/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs te/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
130a3('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/ g.yan pa bgab pa bcang bar bya ste/ zhag lnga 'am drug lon nas bkru
130a4('dul ba): bar bya'o// gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// dge slong 'dze nad kyis zin pa dag/ dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang khyams dang / rdzing dang / sgo gang dang /
130a5('dul ba): bang rim dang / 'chag sa rnams dang / shing drang gi gnas rnams na dri mi zhim pa dang / sbrang ma 'khor bas gnas shing longs spyod par byed pa de dag/ bram ze dang khyi
130a6('dul ba): bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ bzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
130a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong mdze nad kyi thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun tu sbyor ba'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong mdze nad kyis
130a8('dul ba): thebs pas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya'o// khyams rnams dang ji skad du skrag pa'i khyams la stsogs par gnas par mi bya/ dge
131b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang de 'di nyid ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyi chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig/ dge slong
131b2('dul ba): dag sngon byung ba dang po'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bu mo rab khyim thab tshol lo zhes yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'du
131b3('dul ba): bar gyur to// so so nas bsams pa/ de'i khyim thab du bdag 'gyuraro// snyam mo// des rma bya zhig mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'di ni bdag gi khyim thabs du 'gyuraro//
131b4('dul ba): de la gzhan gyis 'dis khyod khyim rab tu 'dam so// zhes smras pa/ des 'jug ma skud nas gar byed par brtsams pa/ de yul 'khor skyong gi mthong nas/ smras pa
131b5('dul ba): 'di ci zhig gi phyir gar byed/ gzhan bdag gi smras pa/ khyod kyi bu mo ni khyim thab tu 'gyur leg so// des smras pa/ ngo tsha dang khrel dang mi ldan pas/ 'di la bdag gi
131b6('dul ba): bu mo mi sbyin no zhes bya ba rma bya zlos nas/ yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song ste/ tshigasu bcad pas smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ongs kha dog mdzes pa dang / mdab
131b7('dul ba): ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/ nor bu bai dUr+ya dang 'dra 'gyur na/ ci slad khyod kyi sras mo bdag mi stsal/ yul 'khor skyong gi smras pa/ dbyangs snyan
131b8('dul ba): yid 'ongs kha dog mdzes pa dang / mdab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan 'grin pa ni/ nor bu bai dUr+ya dang 'dra gyur kyang / mdze med skyon gyis khyod la mi sbyin no// dge
131a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gso ma'i chos gos 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtag yin no// de lta/
131a2('dul ba): bas na dge slong gi gso ma'i chos gos bcang bar mi bya'o// bcad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ang/
131a3('dul ba): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag skra'i chos gos bcang bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags
131a4('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
131a5('dul ba): pa bdag bcer bu bgyed par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ bcer bu ni mu stegs pa'i stabs yin no// gzhan
131a6('dul ba): yang ngas chos gos gsum rjesu gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod cer bu byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gi cer bu mi bya'o// byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// de nas dge slo
131a7('dul ba): bcer bu ma gnang ba dang / slab pa rnams spangs te nyams par gyur to// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
131a8('dul ba): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong 'di bcer bu ma rnang ba dang / slab pa rnams spangs te/ nyams par 'gyur ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
132b1('dul ba): chos gos gsum rje su gnang na/ gzhan ci'i phyir khyod bla gos zang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gi thang gos dang bcas pa'i chos
132b2('dul ba): gos gi 'tshor bar mi bya'o// 'tsho bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro// yang dge slong zhig gi bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
132b3('dul ba): bdag g.yang bzhi mchang par 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal
132b4('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis gso
132b5('dul ba): ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos 'chang bar 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan yin no// zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal
132b6('dul ba): tsha ba can du 'gyuro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag pa char 'a
132b7('dul ba): bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ pa char 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshab
132b8('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i glong ma yang dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag chos gos tham
132a1('dul ba): slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de nas yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyi
132a2('dul ba): chung ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas bya'i tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo // da ltar yang 'dis bcer bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/
132a3('dul ba): dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo // yang dge slong gi bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag skra 'bal 'tshalo// bcom ldan
132a4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nges 'dres par rjesu gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod skra 'bal skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ sgra 'bral ba 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtul
132a5('dul ba): shugs yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gi skra 'bal bar mi bya'o// 'bal na 'gal tshab can du 'gyu ro// yang dge slong zhag gi bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
132a6('dul ba): ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag lo ma'o bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i
132a7('dul ba): rtul shugs yin no// zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das
132a8('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa dag bla gos thang gos bcas pas 'tsho bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug ngas
133b1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
133b2('dul ba): yang dge slong zhig gi bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
133b3('dul ba): pa/ skyes bu gti mug can 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong
133b4('dul ba): zhig gi bcom ldan 'das la 'di ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag thod cing bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di
133b5('dul ba): khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di/
133b6('dul ba): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ra bal gyi chos gos 'chang bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i
133b7('dul ba): rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
133b8('dul ba): ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rta bab kyi klam 'chang 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes pa gti mug can 'di ni khyim pa'i rtag
133a1('dul ba): cad sdong por 'chang bar 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni khyim pa 'chang bar byed do// de lta bas na dge slong gi
133a2('dul ba): chos thams cad sngon bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal chab can du 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de bzhin du thams cad ser ba 'am/ zam
133a3('dul ba): cang dmar ba 'am/ dkar ba ni rung ba ma yin pa nyid do// sdom la kha tshar ring dang gding ka dang / ral ga btsug gtor thod dang ni/ ral bal gos dang rnga bal
133a4('dul ba): kA ma/ mchi nas kun dga' mthang gos cas/ yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos
133a5('dul ba): gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu steg pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tsha ba can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba
133a6('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tsar gdeng ka lta bu'i chos 'chang bar
133a7('dul ba): 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes
133a8('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong shig gi bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdug ra la ka 'chang bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan
134b1('dul ba): chos gos snyed pa sbyin par bya'o// zhes gsungs nas/ dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i mdo kho na la/ ljongs rgyur dong ba dang / de rnams kyis
134b2('dul ba): snyad pa sus kyang ma blang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i snyed pa lan du bzhugs pa'i phyir/ dge slong la bcol nas bgo bar bya'o// ma
134b3('dul ba): bcol pa'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcom pa
134b4('dul ba): dge slong gis rnyed pa blangs par mi bya'o// blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
134b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad nod par bya'o// dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang snyed pa ma blangaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnam
134b6('dul ba): kyi mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag gi blangs par bya'o// dge slong dag snyed pa chung ngu dag 'gyed par byed pa na/ snyed pa chung ngu yin no// snyam nas/ dong ba rnams
134b7('dul ba): kyis byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol pa de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// gzhan bdag gi ma bcol bar 'dod pa
134b8('dul ba): dang / de rnams kyis sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang ba
134a1('dul ba): yin no zhes bya ba nas/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mchi nad can dge
134a2('dul ba): slong med pa'i sgo 'phar med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ de de'i phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de'i rnam sbyar rkun po'i khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste//
134a3('dul ba): de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gi dge slong med pa'i gnas/ sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca' zhing / snam sbyar med par
134a4('dul ba): gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o// song na 'gal tshabs du 'gyu ro/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mchi nad can bde ba de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun blo byed pa las
134a5('dul ba): phab pa dang / de snam sbar gyon te/ 'gro ba'i spro ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos dang bla go su bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o// /
134a6('dul ba): gzhan yang snam sbyar bzhag tu rung ba ni lnga ste/ dge slong dang bcas gnas sgo 'bar dang bcas pa dang / char pa 'bab pa 'am/ char bab tu dog pa dang / 'bab
134a7('dul ba): chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / srab kyang 'ding ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o// bar sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa/ dbyar dang
134a8('dul ba): dge tshul nyid dag gi byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni/ snyen pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang / dge 'dun rnyed dang de'i yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis
135b1('dul ba): nus kyis kyang gang bzhon pa ni 'gro'o// gang rgan pa des ni gos rnams srung ngo // de bzhin du bya'o bzhon shos dge slong rnams bod pa'i phyir snyen yod du song
135b2('dul ba): // drug sde rnams kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo re mos re mos mi stengs par byed pa yin pas/ nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshalnga sgo na 'dug pa des rgyang
135b3('dul ba): ring po nas mgo smra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/ smin ma chang ba zhig mthong nas bsams// dge slong gnas rten 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis der sur 'gro snyam
135b4('dul ba): nas gnas rten byon pa lag so slob dpon phyag 'tshalo// des bsams pa 'di ni slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni rgan shugs
135b5('dul ba): shig yin no snyam du rig nas/ smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri bor che ge mo zhig nas so// ci de na yang gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug
135b6('dul ba): lag khang yod do// ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam 'on te phod pa yin/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / khyod don ci zhig las 'ongs/ dge slong
135b7('dul ba): rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro// gal te de lta na nga kho nas khyod la snying rtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o// slob dpon lag so// nye dgas bsam pa/ gal te 'di dag
135b8('dul ba): gis thad nas gzhan du song na/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/ legs par srung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de ngal sor bcug ste/ dus
135a1('dul ba): bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// snyed pa chung ngu gzhan dag gor ma chag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga gzhan
135a2('dul ba): dag dang sres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcol pas rnyed pa chung ngu ma blang na/ ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan
135a3('dul ba): chad ni nges par brda' bar bya'o// ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pas des gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig te/ de na gal te dge slong rgya gnas na/ ras
135a4('dul ba): yug rgya phul lo// de bzhin du dge slong cig gnas na yang ras yug rgya kho na la 'bulo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ gtsug lag
135a5('dul ba): khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa las khyim bdag des ras yug rgya gyur pa/ de nyid kyi blangs nas phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis
135a6('dul ba): smras pa/ snyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro// ci shos kyi rma pra bdag cag kho nar 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na longs shig/ des smras pa/ phan tshun brtse
135a7('dul ba): par mi 'gyur grang / ji tsam na cig gis kyang ma blangs nas/ de gnyis kyis kyang spyad pa/ de la ji ltar sgrub par bya/ cig gi smras pa dge slong rnam
135a8('dul ba): bos la de rnams dang lhan cig sgo'o// cig shos kyi smras pa/ de bzhin du bya na su 'gro gang gzhon pa'o// gos rnams srang gang gzhon pas so// de ltar mi
136b1('dul ba): gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyed kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas rten bdag gis gtsug lag khang du rtag par chag chag dang / phyag dar dang ba'i lji pa
136b2('dul ba): 'jam po byug par byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag dar byas pa kho na nas snyad pa thob na lta/ nye dga' gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang
136b3('dul ba): phyag dar bya'o// 'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung bar yin pa de ni rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de gtsug lag khang dus du su chos 'don pa'i byin pa byin
136b4('dul ba): pas/ chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/ des na snyed par 'gyur gyis/ 'dis ci byin pa blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// de des
136b5('dul ba): gnang la phab pas/ sbyangs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/ de nas cig shos kyi drung du song nas/ smras pa rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas rten
136b6('dul ba): bdag gis 'dir dus chos skrag pa'i sbyin pa byaso// rgan zhugs gal te chos smra bsgrags par snyed pa thob pa lta na/ nye dgas 'grengs pa dang / 'gro ba dang /
136b7('dul ba): 'dug pa dang nyal ba dus thams cad du chos bshad do// snyed pa gang du chu zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs gcig shos kyi mthu yin te/ des
136b8('dul ba): gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang phyag dar ngang pa'i lci ba 'jam pa'i byug pa byas pas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod
136a1('dul ba): ma'i btung ba dag spud nas/ ji nas kyang bre mo btam gyis nam sros kyi bar du drod ma la bzang po bshams te/ rkang pa bkru ba dang /
136a2('dul ba): rkang pa smra ba byin nas/ ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du sdud do// de nas nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi 'gyur/ grang snyam pa'i 'tshe bas mtshan mo de 'das
136a3('dul ba): bar byas so// de nas de nang par sngar langs te/ rgan zhugs khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/ rim gyi ri bor phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang na gan
136a4('dul ba): pa'i rgan zhugs gcig shos des 'ongs pa leg so// zhes kun dga' ra bar 'gyur ba'i tshig smras nas/ de gnyis ngal sos pa dang / khong gsum char yang gnas
136a5('dul ba): gcig tu 'tshogs nas/ nye dgas smras pa/ rnyed pa gos shig/ gnas rtan bgo'o// nye dgas rgan zhugs cig la smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis dgos
136a6('dul ba): shig gnas rten bdag ni mi bgod do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung ni mi rung ngo // cig shos la yang smras na/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis gos shig/ de dang de
136a7('dul ba): bzhin du smras pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ khyod ni nyes pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni spyi'u tshug su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur 'dod dam ci
136a8('dul ba): nye dgas bsams pa/ rgan zhugs 'dis gnyis sdong gis dbyen bya'o snyams nas/ de nas de gnyis rgyun tu rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas/
137b1('dul ba): nag gnyis bcod par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la gos shig/ des bgo bar brtsams nas/ de na ras yug cig khe 'khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs
137b2('dul ba): nas/ ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo // de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / des dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga'
137b3('dul ba): khyod kyi su zhig shi ba mthong / de la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa khyod de ltar byed pa rtags pa yin pas/ mi 'dza ba rnams kyi
137b4('dul ba): 'grin pa rdog pas gnan nas so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgod pa nyes dmigs gang ci
137b5('dul ba): byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi snyad pa thob pa rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na/
137b6('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa
137b7('dul ba): nye dga' ma sa rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas slus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lta 'ba' shig tu ma zad de/
137b8('dul ba): 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'di rgan zhugs gnyis smras pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung 'bab chu'i ngos shig na sram gnyis shig gnas pa las/ de gnyis
137a1('dul ba): do// lnga gang zhe na/ bdag gi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge
137a2('dul ba): ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnam su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de lta bas na de la gtsug lag
137a3('dul ba): khang phyag dar byas pas yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar 'gyur te/ des na de snyed pa byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i mthus 'dir snyed pa byas
137a4('dul ba): de ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang par mi bya'o// de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas/ smras pa/ rgan
137a5('dul ba): zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsol ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas/ gsol ba l+la bgo ba'o// de gnyis sngar sma pas smras pa/
137a6('dul ba): gnas rten ci dges pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug go/ de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha gcig
137a7('dul ba): bzhag nas/ gsol bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs khyed gnyis nyon cig/ khyed gnyis dang 'di cig/ 'di gnyis dang kho bo cig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo//
137a8('dul ba): 'di ni gsol ba'o// de nas cha gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangaso// cha cig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa// gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag
138b1('dul ba): dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis rtag tu g.yog byed pa ru sbal zhig mthong nas/ gcig gi drung du song nas dris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dga' byed/
138b2('dul ba): zhang po bdag chur zhugs te/ bdag chur zhugs nas/ nya rnams srogs te skam la 'don pa dang 'dis sad do// tsha bo gal te chur zhugs pas chung zad thob
138b3('dul ba): na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o// skam la 'gro ba de ni sdong dum gyi 'jigs pa dang / tsher mas 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gyi 'jigs pa
138b4('dul ba): dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam 'grog gi 'jigs pa dang / gzhan yang gal te ngas ma bsad na khyod kyis sgrogs kyang cis phan/ mdor na 'dir nya snyed
138b5('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas/ 'dis ci byin pa de de blang bar bya ste/ khang par mi bya'o// des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi
138b6('dul ba): smra bar 'dugo// de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dga' byas/ zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste/ bdag gis 'jig
138b7('dul ba): skam mthon pa'i nya rnams bsad do// tsha bo gal te skam la song bas chung zad 'thob na lta/ bzhi rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o// chur 'gro ba de rma klong gi 'jig
138b8('dul ba): ba dang / ru sbal gyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa bsod kyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin ku bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i sa 'jigs pa yod do//
138a1('dul ba): gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya ka ma la thon par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshe skam la dong ba pa de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas kyang cung zad
138a2('dul ba): kyang ma snyed do// de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pas/ bdag cag la cig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o/ gcig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ snyed pa gang yin pa de ni
138a3('dul ba): spyir bya'o// de na gcig ni chur song ngo // gcig shos ni skam ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams srogs te skam la bton nas/ de rnams skam la
138a4('dul ba): gnas pas bsang ngo // chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas par gnyis kyis so// ji tsam na nya'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang / bcig gis smras pa/ de la khyod
138a5('dul ba): kyis gos shig/ gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bgang mi bgyid do// ci'i phyir/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag la
138a6('dul ba): yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba/ de gnyis kyis drung du 'ongs nas des smras
138a7('dul ba): pa tsha bo dag ci ste sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/ zhang po bdag cag gis nya snyed spos so// ji ste mi 'gyed zhang po nyes pas 'jig so// khyod ni nyes pas
138a8('dul ba): 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa spyi'u tshug su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis stong gis
139b1('dul ba): des kyang tshig su bcad pas smras pa/ rgyal po lda na sdug pa khyod// pha rol gnon pa shin du legs// de gnyis kyang ni 'gu gyur la/ khyod kyang snyed pas phun su
139b2('dul ba): tshogs// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin no// sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni
139b3('dul ba): rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dis blas la/ da ltar de gnyis blu so// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig
139b4('dul ba): yod pa des/ gtsug lag khang zhig rtsigs nas/ de dge slong rgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// khyim bdag des blo skyes pa/ ras yug rgya sgrubs te/
139b5('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun bdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la ras yug re re skon no// snyam mo// ji tsam na nye dgas khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi
139b6('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re le yang ras yug re re skon no zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te de la
139b7('dul ba): ras yugacig ma grub na/ bdag nye dga' ma ma yin no// 'gron du ma pos bzhin du song ngo // khyim bdag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun bdug tshod gsol nas
139b8('dul ba): ras rnams 'grim pa na nye dgas 'drim pa na/ nye dgas ras gcig blangs nas/ myur ba myur slong ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gcig gis ras chad do//
139a1('dul ba): gzhan yang gal te des ma srogs na/ khyod kyis 'jigs pa ji ltar bsod mdor ni nye snyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pos
139a2('dul ba): des ci byin pa des blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o de des gnang la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la
139a3('dul ba): tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do// de sngar sma phab pas smras pa/ zhang po ci dges pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ gzhin rgyas kyi
139a4('dul ba): cha gsum du mgos te/ nye'i 'jug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams cig tu byas/ bar gyi cha rnams cig tu byas nas/ tshig su bcad de smras pa/ thang
139a5('dul ba): la rgyu bas 'jug ma ste/ gting du rgyu bas 'gro ba'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/ de ni chos la gnas pas bkur/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di
139a6('dul ba): gnyis blus pas bdag snyed pa dang ldan no snyam nas/ des nya chen po zhig gi rkang pa khyer te/ ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma de mgu nas tshig su
139a7('dul ba): bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// mgo yang med cing 'jug med pa'i// nya bo che zhig thogs nas ni// shin du don 'grub
139a8('dul ba): ga la 'ongs/ des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtse gyur cing chos dang chos mi shes pas/ rgyal pos mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar/ des ni chos shes 'tsho bar 'gyu
140b1('dul ba): na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod do// des bram ze'i khye'u rgyal zla ba gsum du 'gron du bos te/ zas byin nas des blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la ras
140b2('dul ba): yug re re smon no// snyam mo// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze rgan mo shog gnas be de dris zos nas/ de rgan pa'i mtho' na 'dug ste/ thog mar zos nas
140b3('dul ba): ras yu gcig khyer nas song ngo // bram zes ras rnams 'grim par byed pa na bram ze khye'u cig gi ras chad nas/ des bris pa shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug rgyu
140b4('dul ba): legs par 'ongs te 'ongs pa/ bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gi ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid/ 'on kyang khyod
140b5('dul ba): kyis bram ze rgan po 'gron du bos sam/ bdag gi 'gron du ma bos so// des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song ngo // bram ze des smod par rtsam so// dge slong dag ji ste
140b6('dul ba): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgan mo gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di yin te/ de na yang 'gron du ma bos so// da lta na yang ngo // gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri
140b7('dul ba): zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig rtsigs nas/ der dge slong cig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de ldang ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig
140b8('dul ba): bas/ de nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang de byung ba dang phyag dar byed do// gtsug lag khang de ni sa phyogs dben bzang ba'i phyogasu rtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis/
140a1('dul ba): bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ras rgya legs par bgrang ste/ 'tshal te mchis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis
140a2('dul ba): ras yug gnyis rnam par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de ltar su zhig byed/ 'on kyang btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis spyan drang
140a3('dul ba): sAm/ 'phags pa bdag gis spyan ma dra so/ des ras de khyer nas song ngo // de nas khyim bdag des smod par snyam pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams
140a4('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol po dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang byung ba ni/ dge slong dag don 'gron du ma bos pa
140a5('dul ba): gzhan gyi snyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis 'gron du ma bos par gzhan gyi snyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal
140a6('dul ba): byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnam the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad spyod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa che/
140a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa dbyer ma drangs par gzhan gyi snyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig
140a8('dul ba): tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nye dgas 'gron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa de nyid cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i ri 'or zhig
141b1('dul ba): 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang log su dge 'dun dbye bar gyur na/ rnyed par stsal bar 'am mi stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
141b2('dul ba): nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang log su dge slong gis
141b3('dul ba): slab pa phul te/ nyams par gyur na snyed par stsal bar bgyi 'am mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du
141b4('dul ba): gnas pa'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang log su dge slong gum par gum par gyur na/ snyed bstsal bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi skul bar bgyis/ nye bar 'khor kha cig
141b5('dul ba): la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des/ yo byad thams cad dang
141b6('dul ba): ldan pa'i gtsug lags khang shig rtsigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las/ gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des zas
141b7('dul ba): sbyin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin dang / des ras yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo // ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /
141b8('dul ba): drang srong len dang / drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las/ ri bor de nyid du byin pa dang / khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin ras yug lnga rgya byin no//
141a1('dul ba): mdzes par byas pa/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa me tog dang 'bras
141a2('dul ba): bu sna tshogs kyi mdzes par byas pa yin no// ji tsam na ded dpon rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las gtsug lags khang de mdzes
141a3('dul ba): pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun nam mthong yang de'i tshad du snyed pa la phal po che zhig skur nas/ de nang par sngar langs te song ngo //
141a4('dul ba): dge slong dag de 'dzem bag can yin pas/ snyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no// zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par 'god pa'i phyir/ dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i
141a5('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gi ba'i lci ba'i khang par
141a6('dul ba): dbyar gnas par dam bcas par ma gyur kyang / der gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom/ dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa chung ngu 'am/ phal po che
141a7('dul ba): 'am phul na/ de na gnas cig gam gnyis sam rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sdom la/ bye ba rnams te skal ba ni/
141a8('dul ba): sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las/ dge 'dun gyi ni chos gos kyi/ rnyed brgyad du bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar
142b1('dul ba): pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs spyang bar bya ste 'di ni mtshams kyis thob pa skyed pa zhes bya'o khrims kyi skud pa gang shen 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis
142b2('dul ba): wAbu'i khrim su bca' ba khyed kyis ni khyim che ga mo zhig go// kho bo cag gi khyim che ge mo zhig go// lam po che dang tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / gum mngon spyi'i
142b3('dul ba): yin no zhes bcas nas/ dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bca'
142b4('dul ba): dang / dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na snyed pa gang dbang
142b5('dul ba): bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gan su bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la phan byin nas/ dam
142b6('dul ba): bcas pa rnams chu drangs la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la sted phul na/ snyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnam
142b7('dul ba): kyis gnasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa rnams la zan byin pa nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/ dam bcas pa rnams la snyed pa phul las
142b8('dul ba): rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// 'dul ba bzhi// bam po re lnga// / dam bcas pa rnam
142a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis mkhan po'i khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga rgyu thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na
142a2('dul ba): la bgos kyis/ de rang gi snyed pa 'di rnams kyang bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyuraro// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ mkhan po ni bsod nams che ba shes pa dang
142a3('dul ba): ldan pa yin te/ des lan 'ga' khyod cag la byin par zad do// de rnams kyis slar lan glan par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
142a4('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag snyed pa ni rgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ mtshams kyi thob pa'i
142a5('dul ba): rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa dang / rten gyis thob pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rtags pa dang / dge slong gir rtags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang so
142a6('dul ba): sor snyan pa'o// mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gnyis la gso sbyong gcig pa ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi snyed pa gang yin pa
142a7('dul ba): de ni gtsug lag khang gnyis ka'i sdug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no// de la smyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rgyal gso sbyong tha dad pa/
142a8('dul ba): dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/ de la snyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid sbyin te/ gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas
143b1('dul ba): dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu dang na snyed pa gang bas 'gyur
143b2('dul ba): zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dmas bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar
143b3('dul ba): snyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ snyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu de
143b4('dul ba): bcas pa dang / dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ zhes bya ba rnams grang dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam bcas pa rnams kyi gan su dge slong
143b5('dul ba): rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o/ gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnam kyis lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo
143b6('dul ba): dang / rnam su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la snyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho
143b7('dul ba): na la chu drangs la/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshod dus dang / bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma
143b8('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la snyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na
143a1('dul ba): kyi gan su dam bcas pa dang / dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la
143a2('dul ba): chu drangs la snyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa rnams dang / dam bcas pa rnams kyi
143a3('dul ba): gnasu dam bcas pa dang / dam bas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin pa dang / rgan pa'i mthar snyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ snyed pa gang
143a4('dul ba): dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gan su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams snyed
143a5('dul ba): pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na snyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gan su dam bcas pa dang /

143a7('dul ba): dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa dang dam sa bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar
143a8('dul ba): yul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyi gan/
144b1('dul ba): pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ snyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnam
144b2('dul ba): su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul/ rgan pa'i mthar nyid du chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang
144b3('dul ba): dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pas de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di
144b4('dul ba): ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rten gyis gnas pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skye ba 'am bud med dam/ ma ning gang la rten te dbyar gnas par dam par
144b5('dul ba): pa des/ rnyed pa gang byin pa de ni de kho yin te/ 'di ni rten gyis thob pa'i snyed pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun gyis rtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ snyed pa gang zhig
144b6('dul ba): nges la dmigs kyis ma phye ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyir rtags pa'i snyed pa zhes bya'o// dge slong gi btags pa'i skyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ngas
144b7('dul ba): la dmigs kyi phye nas/ gnas khang pa'i'o// yang thog pa'i 'o// zhes rtag pa'i ni/ de na gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir btags
144b8('dul ba): pa'i snyed pa gang zhes bya'o// rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste/ 'di ni dbyar gyi snyed pa zhes
144a1('dul ba): gnyi dga'o// lam po che dang tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang sum mngonamasu dam bcas pa/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan
144a2('dul ba): byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la snyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang /
144a3('dul ba): tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul
144a4('dul ba): la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ snyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su

144a6('dul ba): bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan/

145b1('dul ba): zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur ba lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas ci ga nas phyung ba rab tu mang po
145b2('dul ba): dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la// de nas las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/
145b3('dul ba): rang bzhin du gnas pa rnam so// gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis pa mchis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig
145b4('dul ba): gum lags na/ gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig shes so// gnas nas byung ba ni rab tu mang la rang bzhin du gnas pa
145b5('dul ba): ni gcig mchis pa/ gum na snyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas phyung ba rnams la thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o// dam
145b6('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyi gan su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi nas/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyer kyi dge tshul shi'i sa//
145b7('dul ba): des chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma brtsa
145b8('dul ba): pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres nas 'gyed par byas nas ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ phyogs bcu'i dge
145a1('dul ba): bya'o// mngon sum gyi snyed pa gang zhe na/ snyed pa gang zhig ma nges la dmigs kyis ma phye ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi snyed pa zhes bya'o//
145a2('dul ba): so sor ston pa'i snyed pa gang zhe na/ snyed pa gang zhig lham pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa las phul ba ste/ gal
145a3('dul ba): mchod rten chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na/ mchod rten gcig kho na la dbul zhing gzhan la ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni so sor snyan pa snyed pa zhes bya'o// sdom la/
145a4('dul ba): gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang / bgo ba dang ni sre ba dang / gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang / dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na/
145a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar gnas cig na/ gnas nas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang /
145a6('dul ba): rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum pa 'di'i yo byed gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'kho//
145a7('dul ba): rang bzhin du gnas par rnam so// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni/ gnyis mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas byung ba
145a8('dul ba): zhig gum na/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// gnas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni nyung ba las/ gnas nas byung ba
146b1('dul ba): phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par sngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'od
146b2('dul ba): nas/ 'di skad ces drug bdag ni drang du gsol/ dam bcas par bgyi'o// zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung ba nyid du shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam
146b3('dul ba): ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyis tshangs par spyod pa shi'i sa/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// khas blang ba rnams
146b4('dul ba): 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa logs par bgos yin no// sres nas
146b5('dul ba): 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par sngo ba yin no// dam ma
146b6('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyis gnas su/ dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi dge tshul shi'i sa/ de'i lhung bzed dang
146b7('dul ba): chos gos long shig/ ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam
146b8('dul ba): bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres pa 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos yin no// phyogs
146a1('dul ba): 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par sngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis gan su dam bcas dge tshul 'ongs 'ong //
146a2('dul ba): 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o// zhes smras pa las de yang ma phyung bar shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis de
146a3('dul ba): bcas pa rnams la khyed kyis dge tshul shi'i sa/ de'i chos dang lhung bzed longs shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/
146a4('dul ba): ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na/ dgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres par 'gyed par byed na/
146a5('dul ba): ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par sngos pa yin no/ dam bcas pa rnams
146a6('dul ba): kyi gan su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa tshungs par smod
146a7('dul ba): pa shi nas/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// khas blang ba rnams 'gyed par byed na bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no//
146a8('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no//
147b1('dul ba): yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par sngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'od
147b2('dul ba): pa 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o// zhes smras pa las de yang phyung bar shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam
147b3('dul ba): bcas pa rnam pa la khyed kyi tshangs mtshungs par shi'i sa/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par
147b4('dul ba): byed na/ ma bgos pa nye bar bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ dgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres te 'ged par byed
147b5('dul ba): na/ ma bgos pa nye bar bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar byed na/ legs par sngos pa yino// sdom ni/ nye dga' dang ni byin gyi
147b6('dul ba): rlabs/ bar ma sbyin dang blang bya dang / bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang / spangs pa dang ni mi gsum mo// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// nye dga'i spyi bor phol
147b7('dul ba): migacig byung nas/ de sman pa'i gam du song nas/ bzhin pabangs kho bo la sman skyon cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa mar khu gsol cig dang / sos par
147b8('dul ba): 'gyur ro// nyes dgas bsams pa/ gal te de ring kho na/ 'thungs na de ring nyid du sos par gyur na/ sang mar dang gos blang ba ji lta bu rung bar 'gyur gyi/
147a1('dul ba): bzhi dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo bar bye/ legs par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnasu dam bcas pa'i dge
147a2('dul ba): tshul 'ongs nas/ 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag grangs du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o// zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi na/ dam ma
147a3('dul ba): bcas par rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi nas/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya btang bar bya'o// dam pa
147a4('dul ba): pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa rnams nye bar bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin//
147a5('dul ba): sres te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nye bar bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sngo byed na lags par sngos pa yin no// dam ma
147a6('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyis gan su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs te shi na/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par
147a7('dul ba): spyod pa shi'i sa de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa
147a8('dul ba): yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sras te 'geg par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa
148b1('dul ba): 'thungs dang sos par 'gyur ro// sman pa de'i 'jal to zhes bya ba nas/ khros te song ngo // de nas nye dgas mar khu lhung bzed skang ste 'thung ba las ma zhu
148b2('dul ba): nas/ shi'o// de la gser mang du yod de/ cha gcig ni chos gos lag so// cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman lag so// cha gsum pa ni rdungasu byas pa dang /
148b3('dul ba): ma byas pa las te/ gser srang sum khri byung ngo // zhes blon po rnams kyis thos nas/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa nye dga' gus pa las/ de la
148b4('dul ba): gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri mchis kyi de la bka' stsal pa'i rig so// rgyal po'i smras pa gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas
148b5('dul ba): thob shig/ dge slong de rnams khyer te srog tu song ngo // de rnams kyang lhag nas/ gnas khang rgyas btab po/ dge slong rnams kyis de'i dur khrod du
148b6('dul ba): bsregs gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal pos rgyas btab pa mthong nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
148b7('dul ba): gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ nga'i tshigs gis rgyal po
148b8('dul ba): gsal rgyal la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po gang tshe/ khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi dge slong nye dga'
148a1('dul ba): re shig slang la phyi nas btung bar bya'o// snyam du sems nas/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan cig gnas pa dang /
148a2('dul ba): nye gnas rnams kun tu gnas pa dang / de rnams kyi mar gyi bum dang / rma g.yog pa'i gos phal po che blang so// phyi de nyin par sman pas dris pa/ 'phag
148a3('dul ba): pa khyod snyun dang sam/ khyod kyis mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs ma thung so// 'phags pa ma legs bgyis gyis ded nyes 'gyur du gsol cig/ de nas
148a4('dul ba): lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa dang / sman pas ji skad smras thos sam/ mkhan po thos lag so// kho bo'i nad 'di ni cher skyes par 'gyur
148a5('dul ba): te/ mar dang rma g.yog pa'i gos mang du dgos kyi slong shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal po che blangaso// de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas
148a6('dul ba): nyi ma de la mthungs pas de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas/ bris pa 'phags pa mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs ma
148a7('dul ba): thung so// 'phags pa ma legs par zhig byaso// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs de ring nyid sum 'gyur du btung ngo // sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa
148a8('dul ba): gal te mar gyi sgom pa'i nang du nub par zhugs kyang dag ni khyod la srogs ma mchis so// gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi 'gul pa rdog pas mnan la mar
149b1('dul ba): kyis dga' shi nas de la gser mang du phyung ste/ gser srang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis dgos so// zhes thos nas/ de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas
149b2('dul ba): smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa yin pas/ bdag cag kyang de'i snyed pa la dbang bar 'gyu ro// dge slong rnams kyis snga ste/
149b3('dul ba): de dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so// yangs pa can dang / ba ra na se dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis yang dang yang sdus nas dgos
