149b4('dul ba): te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so// dge slong rnam 'dus cing 'ged pa na/ lung nod pa dang / glog pa dang / 'don pa dang /
149b5('dul ba): yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs te dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bag bI lnga ste/ lnga gang
149b6('dul ba): zhe na/ 'gan de dang / rgyun chags gsum pa dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni gsol ba'o// shi ba'i 'gan te rdung ba na 'ongs pa gang yin pa
149b7('dul ba): de la rnyed pa bzhi te/ rgyun chag su 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'grim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no// dge 'dun dang
149b8('dul ba): de lta bas na shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te/ dgos na mi khrugs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas/ dge
149a1('dul ba): la ltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag ma btong ba'am bag ma len pa de'i tshe/ nye dga' len na khyod kyi ji srid mtsho ba'i chos
149a2('dul ba): gos dang / bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen gyi dang yo byad rnams kyang btab bsam/ 'on rten pa na rim gro byas sam zhes bgyis shig/ gal tes
149a3('dul ba): bgyis zhes smra ba dang / des rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngu gnas par gyis shig/
149a4('dul ba): rnyed pa 'di ni tshang ba mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas rtogs 'dod thong shig/ ces smros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe
149a5('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dag 'os bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal/
149a6('dul ba): pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa dang / btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi ji skad bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du bgyi ste/ bdag rtogs 'dod mi/
149a7('dul ba): bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo// rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
149a8('dul ba): dag khyed kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad dgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun dbus su phyung ste/ sbyar nas bgos so// gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnam
150b1('dul ba): bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'byor pa mi bya'o// gsol ba 'am/ thog ma dang / tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi snyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams
150b2('dul ba): cad dbang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan
150b3('dul ba): pa nye dga' ma 'os pa chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig du ma zad
150b4('dul ba): de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os pa'i chags pa shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dge sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis/ glang po che'i ma
150b5('dul ba): du snun pa dang / de nas gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyan cing mda' phyi rjes bzhin du/ song nas brngon pa de'i srog dang phral lo// ji tsam na ma ste te chom rkun
150b6('dul ba): ba lnga rgya ri 'or zhig bcom nas/ phyogs der byin nas de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo // mu ge dang bcwa pa'i dus de byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes
150b7('dul ba): ldan dag sha 'di snyed kyis nyi rgya lnga bcu'i ni glang po che'i sha bcad pa la btso'o// nyis rgya lnga bcu ni chu blang ngo // de glang po che sha bcod cing 'chad pa gang yin
150b8('dul ba): ba de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di 'grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir
150a1('dul ba): 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge
150a2('dul ba): slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug pa la gsol ba bya'o// dge chung btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/ gum
150a3('dul ba): ba de'i yo byad bda' ba dang / mi bda' ba mchis pas 'di lag ste/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig
150a4('dul ba): dang 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad kyis rdzas bda' ba dang / mi bda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis rlab po/ 'di ni gsol
150a5('dul ba): ba'o/ dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad dgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste gsol pa'o// gsol ba byas nas/ dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni mi sbyin no// /
150a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gang na dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol ba bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum
150a7('dul ba): ba'i yo byad dgo bar bgyi 'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor thog ma dang tha ma med byas naso/ dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes
150a8('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ yo byad cig myur te/ de las chung zhig dge 'dun gyinan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bzhon pa la byin pas ci dag
151b1('dul ba): pas shi bar gyur to// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba tshabs che ba/ zhig yod pa de dag dge slong gis ri
151b2('dul ba): gro byas na/ 'on kyang shi bar gyur nas/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de chos gos cig dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams
151b3('dul ba): 'du bar gyur to// de nas gos 'gyed pas rim gro byed pa de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyur ngan byas te/ chos gos ma krus kyis khrus shig/
151b4('dul ba): des smras pa yo byad ni khyod 'gyed na/ kho mo khru 'am khyod nyid kyis khrus shig skabs de dge slong kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
151b5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o/ gal te nad g.yog mang bar gyur na thams cad kyi yo byed spyir yo byad
151b6('dul ba): drug bgo bar bya'o// dge slong shes nyan dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi nas de nas de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge sbyong gi yo byad dang /
151b7('dul ba): 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nad g.yog gi yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal to// zhes des bdam shing
151b8('dul ba): bdams shing bzang po rnams blang so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams la sbyin par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin nas/
151a1('dul ba): sbyin sha las ci/ yog pa zos la lhag ma dug gis bdab bo// de dag gis sha dug can zos dang mchi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro/
151a2('dul ba): zhes de rnams kyis ci log pa'i sha zos nas/ lhag ma dug gis gdab po// gang dag chu la dong ba rnams de bzhin du spyad nas chu ci yog pa mthungs nas/
151a3('dul ba): lhag ma dug blugs te 'ongs nas/ gang dag gis ni sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs/ gang dag chu 'thung ba de dag gis kyang sha zos nas/ thams
151a4('dul ba): cad shi bar gyur to// ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas/ phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo // de nas chags pa
151a5('dul ba): skyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la snyed pa phal po che yod kyis shi bar gyur to// rim bzhin du za'o snyam nas/ des bzhu mchog khar bcug ste//
151a6('dul ba): bzhi rgyud kyis stod pa rgyus pa bca' ba brtsams te/ de nas rgyus pa spyod pa dang mchog mas rkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to// lhas tshagasu bcad pa smras
151a7('dul ba): bsag par yang ni bya ba ste/ lhag par gsag pa mi bya'o// stsogs pa'i chags pa'i wa long la/ bzhu'i sa gsad par gyur la ltos/ dge slong dag ji snya
151a8('dul ba): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te de na yang 'di lhag par 'chags pa shi'o// da ltar yang 'di lhag par chags
152b1('dul ba): slong nad kyi theb pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de shes pa chung bas de'i sman med nas/ de'i lus kyi nad la rtags te/ rim gro byed pa la smras pa
152b2('dul ba): bdag la ci yang med kyis bdag gi chad du mchod pa bgyis shig/ des khas ma blangs pa las de shi nas ngan song rnam su skyeso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
152b3('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim gro byed pa la 'di skad smras pa/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol ba
152b4('dul ba): dang / dge slong dag dge slong de log par ltung ngo // gal te tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i chad du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas par
152b5('dul ba): gyur pa dang / dad pa skyes pas log par ldang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ da lta bas na dge slong gi tshangs mtshungs par spyod pa na yal bar mi bzhag te/ nad g.yog
152b6('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o// des de la dris te/ gal te de la sman med na yon dag la blang bar bya'o// gal te grub na de lta na legs/ ji ste ma grub na dge 'dun gyi las sgri/
152b7('dul ba): nau// ji ste de yang ma grub na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ dri tsang khang gi bdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam rgyan gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyis phog la
152b8('dul ba): sbyin par bya zhing / rim gro byed pas sgyur nas/ rim gro dang ston pa mchod par bya'o// sos par gyur na de la 'di ni sangs rgyas yin te/ khyod kyis yo byad du spyod
152a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bar ma rnams la sbyin par bya'o// nad pa ma tshor ba
152a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur
152a3('dul ba): bar rtag par bya'o// de'i bya ba nyams par 'gyur mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la stsal bar bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod
152a4('dul ba): na'o// dge slong nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la rtags nas/ dge slong la smras pa/ re shig kho bo ji 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig/ kho'i
152a5('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig/ des de'i rim gro bya bar tsam pa la/ ji tsam dge slong de shi'o// de nas gos 'ged pas de la smra
152a6('dul ba): pa/ dge slong de'i lhung bzad dang chos gos bgo dgos kyis phul cig/ des smras pa/ des kho bo kho la ci bder byed du bcug go// zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong
152a7('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bson pa'i tshe nyid na ma byin na/ shi nas byin pa lta
152a8('dul ba): smos kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te dgos la/ dge slong de'i rang gi bskal pa byin par bya'o// de'i tshe dge/
153b1('dul ba): la song shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'ged par 'gyur ro// de 'khrugs nas ci dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ nag stug po zhig tu zhugs nas/ des der khros
153b2('dul ba): pa'i me sbar pas gzugs de rab tu 'bar te/ de nyid du tshig nas/ dge slong rnams la ngan sems skyes pas dmyal ba rnamasu skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
153b3('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' ba/ dge slong dag sregs pa thams cad las skrag par gyis shig/ srid pa'i yo byad gang gis phyir sems can cig gi lus de
153b4('dul ba): gnas gsum po nags stug por khros pa'i me dang / dmyal bar sems can dmyal ba'i me dang / du khrod du me phal bas sreg par byas pa thams cad las
153b5('dul ba): yid byung bar bya'o// de lta bas na dge slong gis yo byad la lhag par chags pa skyed par mi bya zhing / gang la skye ba de yongasu spang bar bya'o// ma spangs na 'gal
153b6('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gal te nad pa rang gi yo byad blong na/ rim gro byed pas/ myur ba myur bar sbyin par bya'o// ma byin na 'gal tshabs can du
153b7('dul ba): 'gyur ro// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas/ mi ma yin pa'i rnams kyis nang du skyes// gos 'ged pas lhung bzed
153b8('dul ba): dang chos gos bgo zhes dge slong gi gnas khang du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de kun nas kris pa drag pos dbyug pa blangs te langs nas des smras pa/
153a1('dul ba): spyod de zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te 'byor pa yod na/ des 'bad de gal bar bya'o// gal te med na de ni spyad pa leg par spyad pa yin te//
153a2('dul ba): pha'i bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ dge slong nad kyi theb pa/ sdug bsngal ba nad tsha ba che ba ma tshor bas nye
153a3('dul ba): pa cig yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ kho'i lhung bzed 'on cig/ des ma byin pa dang / de
153a4('dul ba): lhag pa ngan sems skyes shing / lhung bzed lhag par chags pas she nas de lhung bzed de nyid du sbrul zhig tu skyes// dge slong de rnams kyis de sred pa khyer nas sreg
153a5('dul ba): te/ gtsug lag khang du lhag nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so// gos 'ged pas shi ba'i yo byad rgyan pa'i mthar spungaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
153a6('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong sus kyang de'i lhung bzed bzhag pa'i snod ma dbye shig/ de bzhin gshegs nyid/
153a7('dul ba): kyis 'byed par 'gyuraro// zhes sgo shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis phye ba dang / sprul zhig
153a8('dul ba): mgo bos bdengs ka byer byas nas/ 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis se gol gyi sgras blangs nas bka' stsal pa/ mi gti mug can lhung bzed 'di sgong
154b1('dul ba): 'ged pas des gnas khang nang du zhugs pa las/ des dbyug pa blangs te/ blangs nas re shig bdag gis ched du chos bsgrags par ma byas par chos go/
154b2('dul ba): rnams 'ged par byed dam/ zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das lo gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i
154b3('dul ba): ched du chos sgrags pa dang / de'i ched du yon sngo ba byas nas/ chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o// sdom la nad pa dang / tshong dpon dang / dngos pos sbyin pa lag
154b4('dul ba): gi bla/ mtshams bzhi dag tu byas pa dang / pho nya brgyad du bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe khyim dag gcig gi sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
154b5('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdug tshod la spyan drad pa las/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni lhag so// bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis sgrubs pa na/ bzhugs nas bsod snyom
154b6('dul ba): kyi sku skal bzhes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu lngas rdzas kyis sgrub pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes te/ lnga po gang gis
154b7('dul ba): zhes pa na/ nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa dang / gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la
154b8('dul ba): gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la slab pa'i bzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang / slob pa'i bzhi
154a1('dul ba): re shig kho bo du thod du yang ma phyung bar lhung bzed dang chos gos 'ged par byed dam/ de sngangs nas bros pa'i skabs de dge slong
154a2('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re shig thog mar dge slong gi ro phyung nas/ phyi nas de'i lhung bzed
154a3('dul ba): dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o// gleng bzhin ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong zhig shi nas/ dge slong rnams kyis de phyung ste/ dur khrod du de bzhin du bor
154a4('dul ba): nas/ gtsug lag khang du lhags te/ gos 'ged pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bgo'o// zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / de mi ma yin pa rnam
154a5('dul ba): su skyes nas/ dbyug pa blangs te langs nas song ngo // re shig kho bos ro la mchod pa yang byas par chos gos dang / lhung bzed 'ged par byed dam zhes pa'i
154a6('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i ro la mchod pa/
154a7('dul ba): byas la/ de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos pa dang / nyes dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa
154a8('dul ba): zhig gnas khang du shi nas de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer de/ ro la mchod pa byas sregs nas/ de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / gleng bzhi ni he
155b1('dul ba): 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen pa ma gros pa nas/ chu khyer te 'ong zhing ri spos
155b2('dul ba): kyi ngan ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs skyed pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyi gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i
155b3('dul ba): thugs skyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis shes so// de nas lha rnam
155b4('dul ba): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril ba bkang ste/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa grangs
155b5('dul ba): nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bzhags shig dang / de'i rim gro ba dag gis
155b6('dul ba): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang de'i phyir yin no// gzhan yang khyod kyis 'a
155b7('dul ba): sngon ma mthong la/ lha rnams ni gtsang sbral dga' ba yin pas 'dug sheg ngas 'di'i rim gro bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos brje
155b8('dul ba): nas/ phyag 'khor lo// bkra shis dang g.yung drung khyil pa can bsod nams rgya phrag tu ma sgrubs pa/ skags pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas dge
155a1('dul ba): bca' bar bzhed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyi sgrub pa na bzhugs nas/ bsod snyoms kyi skra skal bzhe so// de/
155a2('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas/ ring por ma lon par mkhyen nas/ lde mig rnams te kun dga' ra bar dang / gtsug lag khang nas
155a3('dul ba): gtsug lag khang dang / spyil po nas spyil po dang / 'chags sa nas chags sa rnamasu 'chags cing gshegs pa na/ gtsug lag khang chen po gang na ba der
155a4('dul ba): byon pa dang / dge slong nad tshabs che bas shes pa/ chung ba rang gi sbyin dang / ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ bcom ldan
155a5('dul ba): 'das bdag la mgon ma mchi so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so zhes skad ngan bton pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
155a6('dul ba): dge slong nga khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rje su khyod rab tu byung na/ ci'i phyir de skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa
155a7('dul ba): bdag la mgon ma mchis so// zhes du skad 'on btsun pa bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim 'gro bgyid pa dang / lta ba ma mchis so//
155a8('dul ba): dge slong khyod kyis tshangs mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro dang lta ba byas pa yod dam/ btsun pa mchis lag so// de bas kyang khyod gnas skabs
156b1('dul ba): legs par tshim par bgyi lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
156b2('dul ba): kun dga' bo song la gtsug lag khang che ge mon dge slong nad tshabs che bzhig yod pa de la bsod snyoms byed po 'di khyer la zos nas 'di skad ces
156b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi rim 'gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de/ bsod snyoms byed kyi bgo sha yang mdzad do// zhes bgyis shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin
156b4('dul ba): 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/ de la bsod snyoms byin nas
156b5('dul ba): ji skad bka' stsal pa yang smras so// 'dul ba bzhi// / bam po re drug/ de nas dge slong de 'di ste
156b6('dul ba): du sems te/ bdag ni khams gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis rim gro mdzad nas/ bsod snyoms phyed kyang gnang gis bdag dad pas sbyin pa la longs
156b7('dul ba): spyad nas lo los dus 'da' bar byed pa ni/ bdag la rig pa ma yin pas ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la/
156b8('dul ba): brtson par gnas par bya'o// snyams nas des nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson pas gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i
156a1('dul ba): slong de bzung ste/ bcin dang ngan skyugs rnams phyung nas mtha' cig tu bzhag te/ smyug ma'i tshal pas spyad nas/ sa dkar po'i
156a2('dul ba): dril phyis byas te bkru so// de nas skyil mo krung char bcug nas/ de'i chos gos rnams klas te/ phyogs de yang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byugs pa mdzad
156a3('dul ba): do// de nas phyag dang zhabs bsil nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nang pa la rim gro bya ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pa yang dag pastan/
156a4('dul ba): yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug nas gtsug lag khang du bzhag so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod nams khyer te/
156a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo // chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas rnams ni bsod snyoms ma nus khyer te/ 'ong ba'i dge slong la so so yang dag par
156a6('dul ba): rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa des/ so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de dge slong gcig gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pa legs par tshim par byas
156a7('dul ba): sam/ zhes btsun pa yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
156a8('dul ba): kun dga' bo cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa de bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge 'dun
157b1('dul ba): dpon gyi'o// mkhan po ni mkhan po gcig pa'i'o// slob dpon cig pas ni slob dpon cig pa'i 'o// gtam 'dres pas ni btam 'dres pa'i 'o// phebs pa
157b2('dul ba): smra bas ni phebs par smra ba'i 'o// smos 'dren bgyi'o// 'khor ba dang bral ba shes pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis nad kyi gnas skabs la rtag
157b3('dul ba): nas/ rim gro ba cig gam gnyis sam/ mang po sprin te mthar na dge 'dun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams
157b4('dul ba): cad bcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad des dgra bcom pa
157b5('dul ba): mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na/
157b6('dul ba): yang ngas 'di rim gro byas nas/ des mngon par shes pa lnga sngon gsum du byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i sti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu/
157b7('dul ba): dang chu phun gsum 'tshogs pa/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnaso// des slob ma
157b8('dul ba): rim gro byas nas sos pa dang / de nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byaso// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong
157a1('dul ba): 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang rnam par
157a2('dul ba): 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom par gyur to// dgra bcom par gyur
157a3('dul ba): nas/ khams gsum pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du snyam pa na mkha' lcag 'thil du mtshungs pa'i sems can dan dang sde'ur snyam pa ma
157a4('dul ba): rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'bral bar gyur cing / rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /
157a5('dul ba): bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po dang / bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra ba
157a6('dul ba): bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nad pa 'di dag la ni tshangs mtshungs par spyod pa khyed
157a7('dul ba): cag kho na ma btogs par ma med/ pha med/ rtsa lag gzhan med do// de lta bas na tshang ba mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis phan tshun du ri mo gro bya ste/
157a8('dul ba): 'khan pos ni lhan cig gnas pa'i'o// lhan cig gnas pa'i ni mkhan po'i'o// slob dpon gyis ni nye gnas kyi'o// slob dpon gyi'o// nye gnas kyis ni sgo
158b1('dul ba): thug bgyis te/ zla ba drug stsal na de lta na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyis/ gzhan gyi ni ma lag so// rgyal pos smras pa/ de'i sman dkon pa de
158b2('dul ba): bden no// de nas bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la rtags par bsams na/ bdag nyid kyi spyod pa rtags dka' bar gyur nas/ des ma la dris pa rtsams pas
158b3('dul ba): mang dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon 'ga' la khros pa yod dam/ gzhon nu khyod kyi gang gi tshe/ bdag gi phang du byon pa de nas bdag kyang sngon su la
158b4('dul ba): yang lan 'ga' yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras pa/ yum bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon
158b5('dul ba): su la yang 'ga' la khros pa ma mchis sam/ gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi rum du zhugs de nas bdag kyang sngon su la yang khro ba ma myong na
158b6('dul ba): khyod lta smos kyang ci dgos/ des bsams pa/ sman rnyed do snyam du rig nas/ des sman pa rnams la sgo ba/ shes ldan dag ngas rang la rtags
158b7('dul ba): na/ nga sngon su la yang khro ma myong bas nga'i yan lag lnga'i rtsa ba tor cig/ lha bdag cag ni phal zhig gi don du lha'i ku la mtshon mi 'beb so// byang
158b8('dul ba): chub sems dpa' nams ni gzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de rnams mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtsa gtar te/ khrag des zla ba drug tu
158a1('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas rim gro byas/
158a2('dul ba): de ltar yang ngas byaso// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par yang nad pa rnams la byis
158a3('dul ba): par mdzad la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang lhag
158a4('dul ba): par nad pa rnams la byams par byed pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul shi ba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na/ rgyal po shi ba'i zhes bya ba
158a5('dul ba): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo mi mang po rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug/ dge slong rnam la mi gtong ba chung zad kyang
158a6('dul ba): med de/ nad pa rnams la ni khyad par du byed do// ji tsam na khyim bdag nad pa sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po de'i drung du song nas/ lha
158a7('dul ba): bdag la spyad mdzod cig/ rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag spyad byos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di'i sman ni dkon lags
158a8('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/ dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ lha gang zhig btsas tshun chad sngon lan 'ga' yang su la yang khro ba myong ba de'i khrag las nas/
159b1('dul ba): smras pa dang / des smras pa thong shig thong shig/ sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang rin po che rnams smra'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ de shig khyod
159b2('dul ba): kyis sman de dag ji 'dra ba ltas lhan cig/ de smras pa bdag gi khrus byas pa'i mchu ni sha'i mthu yod pa'i yin gyis de khyer la dang shig rin po 'di dag yin no//
159b3('dul ba): de dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pas rin po rnams bor te/ shang shang te'u de nyid khyer te dong ba las rim gyis yul shi ba'i dbang kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas/
159b4('dul ba): de rnams kyis srog chags shang shang te'u rgyal po la phul te/ de rnams ston pa'i sman gang yin pa de yang smras so// de nas rgyal pos shang shang ti'u la bris
159b5('dul ba): pa dang / smras pa lha bdag bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs chen du bgyid pa lagaso// rgyal po chu snod bdun du bzang pos bkang bar bzhag go// ji tsam na de dag ji srid
159b6('dul ba): legs par ngal sos pa de srid du khrus byas nas/ de nas lus stobs shes dang / mod la phur te/ khang pa'i steng du 'dug nas 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba dang bral na
159b7('dul ba): tshig su bcad pas smras pas/ re shig thog ma bla dag blun te/ phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go// de nas rgyal po sman pa ste/ blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs/ shes
159b8('dul ba): smras nas song ngo // de nas rgyal pos sman rnams bkug ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag shang shang ti'u gi khrus byas pa'i chu de shi ba'i mthu yin pa bden nams/ de rnams
159a1('dul ba): nyi ma re re zhing de la gnas thug blud pas sos par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de ni
159a2('dul ba): nga nyid yin te/ de na yang nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhan yang shi ba'i rgyal po'i bu bzhog phyed skams par gyur nas/
159a3('dul ba): rgyal po'i sman pa rnams la sgo ba/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu'i spyad gyis shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa lha bcud thams cad mar dang sgrol cig/ lo bcu gnyisu
159a4('dul ba): bcud thams cad stsogs na de'i tshe yang shang shang ste'i sha ma snyed do// sman pa rnams kyis bya ba dag la sgo ba/ shes ldan dag me long dang bya gag khyer te rgya mtsho'i
159a5('dul ba): 'gram du deng la der sti tshugs te bya gag rang gi gzugs snyen mthong nas/ 'di bya gag yin no snyams te 'di skad phyung ba dang / shang shang sti'u gis bya gag gi
159a6('dul ba): skad thos nas ngo mtshar che bas bya gag gi drung du 'ong bar gyur te/ de bzung ba'i thabs ni 'di yin no// de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas pa las ji tsam na//
159a7('dul ba): las kyi zhags pas zin pa'i srog chags shang shang te'i thogs nas de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo / 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ 'jig rten gnas pa chags pa
159a8('dul ba): nas ring po ma lon pa de'i tshe dud 'gro rnams kyang sgra shes pas/ srog chags shang shang ti'u gis smras pa/ bdag gar kris te de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa
160b1('dul ba): khyod kyi stug nad/ 'di ji 'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras kyis yang de kho na 'dra nas/ lo bcu gnyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos pa/ mchis kyi bzhud la
160b2('dul ba): slong shig dang / gal te skal pa'i khyed par gyis bcud de thob na des na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// des rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas/ sgo tsar sdud do// rgyal po de'i
160b3('dul ba): kun tu spyod pa ni slong ba po'i skye bo sgron du bzhugs pa'i phyi'i rgyu nang du dril 'dog te/ gang gi tshe slong ba po sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe na de bkrol bar byed do//
160b4('dul ba): na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dris te bkrolo// de nas rgyal po'i bus pa dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum slong ba zhig mchis kyi ci zhig slong ba rmos shig/ de
160b5('dul ba): gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu bdag cag gi lo bcu gnyi su rdzas rnams sogs/ btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re shig 'thung shig dang / phyi nas phyi nas blong ba
160b6('dul ba): po nang du bkug la ci slong ba rma'o// de ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang bde leg su gyur pa dag byas nas/ mar 'thung bar 'dod na slong po'i skye bo'i re bas lu
160b7('dul ba): kyi nang du phog nas/ mar de ma thungs par smras pa/ yab yum re shig/ slong ba po nang du ma bkug gi bar du ma 'tshalo// rgyal po'i sgo la rgo ba/ slong ba po nang du
160b8('dul ba): song shig/ de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal pos bu lus mdzes pa dang / sems dang ba dang / spyod lam zhi bas zhugs pa mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'phag
160a1('dul ba): smras pa/ lha ma lcags kyis mar dang sgrol cig/ de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang bcos te/ rgyal po'i blud par bzhug so// ji tsam
160a2('dul ba): na gang ri'i sul zhig na/ rang sangs rgyas lnga rgya gnas pa las de na gcig bzhogs phyed skams par gyur to// de la rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang
160a3('dul ba): ldan pa ljong su song la/ sman pa la spros te sman sten cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang
160a4('dul ba): po la mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ sems cad kyi thun mong gi mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de
160a5('dul ba): 'ong ste/ bdag nad dang ces te khyer bar 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir grong gi mthar 'gro/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes
160a6('dul ba): bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po sog so// ji tsam du bsod nams mang po sogs pa de tsam du mtho rig
160a7('dul ba): su yun ring du dga' bar 'gyuraro// zhes de de rnams rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongasu bcas te rim gyis yul shi'i dbyangs kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin
160a8('dul ba): de nas lam gyis dub dal sos nas/ sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang kho 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa
161b1('dul ba): rnams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang / mi dge
161b2('dul ba): ba byas shing sngags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnams par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams skal pa rgyar yang ni/ chud mi za'
161b3('dul ba): tshogs dang dus snyed na lus can rnams la ni/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ba ra na sa'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya
161b4('dul ba): ba byung ste de la bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de'i rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to// mdun la 'don la yang gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin/
161b5('dul ba): pa de ni dun na 'don par gyur te/ sems can rnams ni khams kyi sgo nas shad 'phrod pa yin pas/ de gnyis phan tshun du yid bcug par gyur nas/ rgyal ba/
161b6('dul ba): smras pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na/ des na nga rgyal por gyur/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis gal te bdag 'dun na 'don du bzhug na ni/ thabs mchis kyi snyan du gsol
161b7('dul ba): gar bgyi'o// zhes smras pa/ de ltar bya ste/ bzhugs gis smros shig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi gcen zha bor bgyis dang khong rgyal por 'gyur ro// des
161b8('dul ba): rjes yid rang ngo // de nas des rgyal bu phu'o shes te/ sman ma yin pa byin nas zha bor gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na rgyal shi nas/ blon po rnams kyis de ni zha bor gyur
161a1('dul ba): ba ci zhig bzhed/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa bcud ni khyod kho na 'os kyis/ bdag la ma lags kyis
161a2('dul ba): 'bul gyis gzhes shig/ des lhung bzed zed pa dang / rgyal po'i bus bsams pa drag po'i lhung bzed der bcud slang so// bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyal
161a3('dul ba): po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / ldan pa'i sems skyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni 'grub par 'gyur la/ de yang tshul
161a4('dul ba): khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis yang sos par 'gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gzhon nu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin
161a5('dul ba): de na yang de nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ lha mod kyang ci dgos/ btsun pa rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las ji zhig bgyis na/ des na gnyis ka
161a6('dul ba): yang snyam du bros theb la/ mnyam du sos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas/ sngon gyi tshe bas
161a7('dul ba): gzhan rnam su las tshogs rnyed pas rkyen yongasu sgyur ba 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa'i gdon mi za bar gyur pa'i las dag byas shing stsags pas/ 'di
161a8('dul ba): gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing sngags pa gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa de ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
162b1('dul ba): sman byin pa gang yin pa des na/ mnyan dus sos par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni cig tu gnag pa yin
162b2('dul ba): la gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi gcig tu kar ba dang / 'dres ma rnams ni 'dres ma ste dge slong de lta bas na/ las cig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dres pa rnam
162b3('dul ba): spangs la las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la stsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la slab par bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe mnyam
162b4('dul ba): yod na khyim bdag tshong dpon zhes bya ba phyug cig nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongasu bzang ba yang shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bus nor dang ldan pa/
162b5('dul ba): rnam thos kyi bus nor gyi 'gran pa zhig gan so// des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de bu med cing mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang chu lha dang /
162b6('dul ba): lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa las gsol 'debs shing lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra'i lha dang / tshal gyi lha dag
162b7('dul ba): dang bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum 'do'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang lhan cig skyes pa/ chos 'thun pa'i lha dag dang / rtag tu rjesu 'brang ba'i lha rnams
162b8('dul ba): la yang gsol ba 'deb so// 'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu pho dang bu mo dang skye'o zhes bya'i btam de lta bu yod de/ de de lta ma yin
162a1('dul ba): to// snyam nas/ nu bo shos rgyal por dbang skur to// des kyang 'dun 'don gyi nu bo shos gang yin pa de mi mdun na 'don du bcug go// ji tsam dus
162a2('dul ba): gzhan zhig na rgyal po dang mdun na 'don lhan cig tu bre mo gtam smra zhing 'dug pa las rgyal po bu po zha bo de mthong ngo // des de mthong nas 'gyod par gyur te/ bdag gi
162a3('dul ba): rgyal srid kyi phyir phu bo zha bor byas pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so// lha bdag kyang 'gyod par 'gyur gyis/ gal te lha dges na 'di phyir sngon gyi
162a4('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du bgyid do// des smras pa/ gnang gis byos shig des de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to// de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la bya ba
162a5('dul ba): byas nas/ smon lam btab par brtsams pa gang yang bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di rnam par phyung cing nor mang la
162a6('dul ba): longs spyod che ba'i rig su skye zhing / zha bor byas pa'i sdig pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang nyam su myong bar 'gyur cig/ ces byas so// dge slong dag jiH
162a7('dul ba): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// mdun na 'don gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis kyi
162a8('dul ba): gros byas nas/ rgyal po gzhon nu la sman ma yin pa byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du zha bor gyur to// yang 'gyod par gyur pas de gnyis kyi gros byas te/ slar
163b1('dul ba): kyis nyin par sman byaso// mtshan mo nad la bab par gyur to// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di'i byad bdag cag gis bdugs bgyis na/ mtshan mo bro 'tshal bar
163b2('dul ba): gyur gyis/ gal te 'di khyim du skyel na/ bdag cag gis nyin mtshan du spyad par bgyi'o// zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
163b3('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim du skyol la der yang de'i rim gro byed pa sbyin par bya'o// de'i nad de yun ring por gyur nas/ de'i
163b4('dul ba): skra ring po ring por skyes pas/ khyim bdag des khyim bdag mgo reg ces bya bar grag so// de gang gi tshe rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang 'bras
163b5('dul ba): bu sman gyis snyan bskur byas pa las/ slar na bar gyur pa de'i tshe bdag mchi'o zhes bya bar rang gi tshor nas/ de na des mchi ka'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad glegs
163b6('dul ba): bu la bris te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du skur ro// de ni shi'o// blon po rnams kyis/ ke sa la'i rgyal po gsalA lba smras pa/ lha khyim bdag mgo reg bu ma mchis
163b7('dul ba): bar gum ste/ de la dbyig dang gser dang / glang po che dang / rta dang ba glang dang / ma he dang / gau tsa la sogs pa bal mo che zhig mchis pa de dag thams cad gleg
163b8('dul ba): bu la bris nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phra'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa dga' dbang ba gleg bu la ma bris pa yang nga
163a1('dul ba): gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor lo'i sa sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong skye bar 'gyuraro// 'on/
163a2('dul ba): kyang gnas gsum po dag sngon sum du gyur pa las bu po dang bu mo dang skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par 'gyur cing 'das
163a3('dul ba): pa dang ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas gsum po de dag sngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag 'gyuro//
163a4('dul ba): de'i gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol pa dang / byas kyang bu mo dang bud med pa'i de'i tshe lha thams spangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gyur to// ji tsam na dge
163a5('dul ba): slong zhig gi drung du song ste/ 'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung bar 'tshalo// bzhin bzang de bzhin du gyis shig ces des de rim
163a6('dul ba): gros skra breg nas slab pa'i bzhi rnams sbyin par brtsams pa las rims chen po'i thebs nas rab tu byung ba'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das dge slong
163a7('dul ba): rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re shig sos kyi bar du slob pa'i bzhi rnams mi byin zhing des rim gro bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
163a8('dul ba): kyis des rim gro bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sus bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong sman pa rnams dang so sman pa rnam
164b1('dul ba): gyi phyir spyir bzhag par bya'o// ras yug dang ras yug chen po dang / ko sgro dang mchil lham dang / 'bru mar gyi snod dang ril ba dang / bya ma bum rnams ni dge
164b2('dul ba): 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o/ mdung shing ring po gang yin pa de dag ni 'dzam bu lta bu'i sku gzugs snyan rgyal mtshan gyi shing bya'o// thung ngu gang yin pa
164b3('dul ba): de dag ni khar bsil gyi yu bar byas la/ dge slong rnams la byin par bya'o// khye'u dang bu mo ni dge 'dun gyi mi sbyar te/ ci rigs pa zhig blangs nas/
164b4('dul ba): bder btang bar bya'o// rkang bzhi pa rnams las glang po che dang / rta dang rnga mo dang / bung bu dang dre'u rnams ni rgyal po la 'bul bar bya'o// ba glang dang ma
164b5('dul ba): dang ra dang / lug rnams ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir bzhag ste/ mi bgo'o// 'thab stan dang go cha dang gzhan yang rgyal po la 'os
164b6('dul ba): pa dang gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o// mtshon cha rnams ni bzhag la/ de rnams gri'u dang khab dang / khar gsil du rdungs te dge 'dun
164b7('dul ba): brim par bya'o// mtshon rtsi rnams las mtshon rtsi chen po kang bkus dang / mtshal dang thing shun la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni sku'i gzugs snyan gyi phyir dri
164b8('dul ba): gtsang khang du bzhag par bya'o// thod lo kor dang btsag dang / rams ni dge 'dun gyi bgo bar bya'o// chang ni yos rlugs pas don du bzhug par bya ste tsha bar gyur
164a1('dul ba): ma thob na/ glegs bu bris pa lta mos kyang ci dgos/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba gang yin pa de long shig pa'i skabs
164a2('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ci dag yod/ bar sdom ma la/ gzhi
164a3('dul ba): dang gnas mal gos dang ni/ lcags nas lcags ni lham mkhan dang / rdzas mkhan 'dreg mkhan shing mkhan sogs/ mtshon rtsi mdung shing bar bur dang / rkang
164a4('dul ba): gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi dang / zas dang ltung ba sman dang ni/ bran dang bding ba dbang rgya dag/ ci rigs par ni dgos par bya/ dbyig rnams dang ni gser rnam
164a5('dul ba): dang / gzhan yang rdungs byas rdungs ma byas/ dge 'dun 'dus nas mgo bo zhes/ drang srong chen po'i bka' skul to// dge slong rnams kyi gsol pa dang /
164a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji rigs par bgo bar bya ste/ de la zhing gi bzhi dang khyim gyi gzhi dang / tshong khang gi bzhi dang / gnas mal dang
164a7('dul ba): lhag nag gi 'gar ba'i lag spyad dang / lcags 'gar gyi lag spyad dang / rdza mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / shing mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / smyug ma mkhan gyi
164a8('dul ba): lag spyad dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / no shas 'tsho ba dang kha zas btung ba dang / 'bru rnams mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
165b1('dul ba): sen me'i mchod rten rnams kyi ral pa can dang / 'drums pa slar bcos par bya'o// chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o// seng ge'i khri rgyan par bya'o/
165b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// gang gi tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis chu bzang gyi dus ston brtsug
165b3('dul ba): pa de'i tshe/ dge slong dang dge slong dang dge snyen dang dge snyen ma rnams mang du tshogs par gyur to// de'i tshe slong khrum stong dge slong mas bkur ba yin pas chu bzangs kyi
165b4('dul ba): dus ston gtsugs pa'i dge slong ma rab tu mang po'i tshe dang ldan pa khrum stod la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa chu bzangs kyi dus ston la spyan 'dren gyis gshegaso//
165b5('dul ba): des smras pa/ bdag gi chos gos dang lhung bzed phyir su la bcol/ dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang
165b6('dul ba): bdag cag gi bzhag par bya'o// des de rnams la bzhag pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo btad do// skye dgu'i dag mo chen mos kyang tshe dang lnga
165b7('dul ba): ba kun dga'o la'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang gtsug lag khang zhig tu bzhag go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa khrum ston chu bzangs kyi dus ston la 'ongs pa dang / de nas
165b8('dul ba): dge slong ma rnams kyis 'gron du bos pa yin pas/ gcig gi smras pa/ 'phags pa deng bdag gis zhal chus bgyi'o// gzhan yang gzhan bdag gis kyang g.yar
165a1('dul ba): na long spyad par bya'o// tsha bar ma rung na dor bar bya'o// dge slong dgang ston pa yin pa khas len pa rnams kyis chang mi sbyin zhing /
165a2('dul ba): na rtsa mchog gi mi btu ngo // sman rnams ni sman khang rung ber bzhag par bya zhing de nas dge slong nad pa rnams kyis longs sprad par bya'o// rin po che rnams las mu tig ma
165a3('dul ba): btog par nor bu dang bai dUr+ya dang / dung g.yas su khyil ba la sogs pa ni cha gnyi su byas te/ gcig ni chos la'o// cig shos ni dge 'dun la'o// chos kyi gang yin pa de
165a4('dul ba): ni sangs kyi gsung bri bar bya'o// seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa ni/ dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// glegs bam rnams la sangs rgyas
165a5('dul ba): kyi gsung gi gleg bam rnams ni mig bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun du spyir mdzod du bzhug par bya'o// phyi rol pa'i stan bcos kyi glegs bem rnams ni
165a6('dul ba): brtsod la bgo bar bya'o// phyag rgya ni myur du 'grub par nus pa gang yin pa de ni rdzas 'gyed pa'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni
165a7('dul ba): phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi chad du spyi mdzod du bzhug par bya'o// gser dang dbyig dang gzhan yang rdungasu byas pa dang / rdungasu ma byas pa gang yin pa ni cha
165a8('dul ba): gsum du byas te/ gcig ni sangs rgyas la'o// gnyis pa la ni chos la'o// gsum pa ni dge 'dun la'o// sangs rgyas kyi gang yin de ni dri btsang khyang dang dbu skra dang
166b1('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong cig gis gsol ba'o// 'di ltar bya ste gnas mal bsham pa byas la/ 'gen de brdungs te dris pa'i
166b2('dul ba): tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pas dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste/
166b3('dul ba): las bya'o// dge 'ur btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong khrum stong gum na/ des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi rin dang bcas pa kun dag 'os
166b4('dul ba): sug pa na mchis kyi gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun khrum stong gum pa'i yo byad
166b5('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos dang gos kyi rin dang bcas pa'i dngos po sbyin par dge slong kun dga'o byin gyis rlab par bya'o// 'di gsol ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
166b6('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong yang zhan du gum lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan na mchis/ dngos pos sbyin pa yang gzhan
166b7('dul ba): na de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed gang bar dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor dngos po'i sbyin pa'i dge slong ngam/ khyim bdag na yod pa'o// gleng bzhi ni mnya
166b8('dul ba): yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong lag gi bla zhig shi'o// dge slong rnams de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pa bgos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnamam gyis bcom ldan
166a1('dul ba): tshul la bab po// gzhan bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi bdugs tshod gsol cig/ de bzhin du gzhan dag gzhan dag gis smra
166a2('dul ba): so// gzhan zhig smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi dus ma lags pa'i btung ba la gsol cig/ de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras pa/ des de rnams kyi sems
166a3('dul ba): srung ba'i phyir/ g.yar chus rnams las chung zad blangs/ de bzhin du dro yang zos dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud la yang 'thung pa dang / de dag ce gcig pa yor langs nas/
166a4('dul ba): de yang lam gyis dub pa des mang po zos pas ma zhu bar gyur de shi'o// de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du sregs nas/ cho sgrags par byas nas/ rim gyi gtsug lag khang du
166a5('dul ba): lhag so// gos 'ged pas nad g.yog la smras pa/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'on cig/ des smras pa/ bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi lag tu bzhag go// de rnams la bris pa dang //
166a6('dul ba): smras pa bdag cag gis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i lag tu bzhag go// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos smras pa/ bdag gi 'phags pa kun dga'o la gtad do// tshe
166a7('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu bzhag go// zhes pa'i skabs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /
166a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa/ shi ba'i yo byad sbyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis rlabs par bya'o// byin gyis rlab pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/ 'gen de brdungs la
167b1('dul ba): lam gyis 'tsho ba dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing / de rnams gang dang gang du 'dug nas 'ged par byed pa de dang der skye bo'i tshogs
167b2('dul ba): chen pos yongasu skor bar gyur nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo'o snyam de rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dung nye ba zhig tu bgo
167b3('dul ba): bar rtsams pa dang / dge skos kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig byed/ de rnams kyis ji ltar smras pa/ bdag kyang 'tsham su 'ongs pa yin na zhes de
167b4('dul ba): 'khangs kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtsham
167b5('dul ba): kyi nang mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes te/ shi ba'i yo byad 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos par nyes par bgos pa yin te slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan
167b6('dul ba): cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'tshams kyi nang na yid gnyis kyis 'gyed par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa/
167b7('dul ba): yin te/ slar yang mtsham su 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya'o// gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'tshams kyi phyi rol la 'tshams kyis nang gi/
167b8('dul ba): 'du shes kyis 'god par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang 'tshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod
167a1('dul ba): 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad la sogs la ci 'dres
167a2('dul ba): sam ma dres par gyur de btags par bya'o// gal te 'dres te dge 'dun gyi ni mchod rten gyir byas la/ mchod rten gyi ni dge 'dun gyir gyur na/ de lta bu chos dang mi
167a3('dul ba): mthun pas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dang / gos kyi rin thang chas pa la phyag gsum du byas te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun no// dge 'dun gyi ni dge
167a4('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / dri btsang khang dang / mchod rten gyi lag gi sar spyad par bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni/
167a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya/ seng ge'i khri rgyan par bya'o// gal te 'dres par ma gyur na/ thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi
167a6('dul ba): bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las/ rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nye ba zhig phyin pa dang /
167a7('dul ba): de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong cig shi'o// de rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsug lag khang du 'dug pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang skal pa 'dod
167a8('dul ba): par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du bgo bar bya'o ma snyam pa las mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i baglang rdzi dang phyug rje dang rtsa thun dang shing thun dang
168b1('dul ba): par byed pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur na/ gang la skur ba de ni shi la gang la skur ba de ni shi ba'i yo byad du rung byin gyis rlob par byed na
168b2('dul ba): legs par byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// gang gi skur pa de'i shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// dge slong gi slong gi chos
168b3('dul ba): gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la skur ba de'i slar zlog la gang gis skur ba de yang shi nas gang la skur ba de la yid bcugs pas na/ nyes par spyod pa yino// /
168b4('dul ba): gang la skur pa de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos skur bar
168b5('dul ba): byed pa na/ gang la skur pa des slar zlog nas de shi la/ gang gis skur bar byed pa de yang shi na/ de shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nye bar
168b6('dul ba): byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// gang gis skur ba de shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// gos kyi bzhi rdzogs
168b7('dul ba): s+ho// srab kyang gi bzhi'i sdom ni/ gnas bcas pa dang kha cig dang / rdol pa dang gling pa dang / dus dang gang zag ma mo'i bzhi/ nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang / dgos
168b8('dul ba): pa dag ni bcu gnyis te/ gnas bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa/ ston pa lta bar 'dod pa na/ 'dam rdzab kyis ni ngal gyur pa/ de la der ni chos gos snang /
168a1('dul ba): na'o// de'i tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun gi lag nas chos gos dag skur ba na/ dge slong des gang gis skur ba de la yid bcug pas bcad pa'i
168a2('dul ba): skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong nas kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong des yod btsugs par byas par ma yin
168a3('dul ba): ba la yid btsugs par skyed de 'di ltar des gang gis skur ba de la yid btsugs pas spyad do// 'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag skur
168a4('dul ba): ba na/ gang la skur ba de la yid bcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no// gang gis skur pa de la yid bcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no// dge slong
168a5('dul ba): gis ge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed na gang la skur de shi la/ gang gis skur ba de la yang bcugs pas sdud na/ nyes par spyad pa yin no// gang la sku ba de
168a6('dul ba): shi ba'i yo byad rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed na/ gang gis skur
168a7('dul ba): ba de ni shi la gang gis skur ba de'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis rlob pa yin no// dge slong gi dge slong la chos gos dag skur ba byed
168a8('dul ba): ba na/ gang la skur ba de la slar zlog la gang gis skur ba de la yid bcugs pas spyad na/ legs par spyad pa yin no// gang la skur ba de la yid bcugs pas na nyes
169b1('dul ba): snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/ btsun pa mang bar gsol te/ bdag cag gnas su bde ba reg par dbyar gnas shing bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis
169b2('dul ba): kyang brel bar ma mchis lag so// 'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtsa stug po dang / rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal gyur cing rdul gyis lus
169b3('dul ba): yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing mchi ba na/ tshegs chen pos 'dir mchis lagaso// 'dul ba bzhi// / bam po
169b4('dul ba): re bdun// // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtsa stug po dang / rdzab chen por tsha bas
169b5('dul ba): ngal bar gyur cing lus rdul gyis g.yog pa ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni nyon mongs kyis/ ma la ngas dge slong rnams reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa rnam
169b6('dul ba): kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dge slong rnams la gnang bar bya'o phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu las thal na ma yin pa dang / zla ba las thal na ma yin
169b7('dul ba): pa dang / nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang / gla gos thang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba las/ chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa
169b8('dul ba): 'chang na ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang yon tan lnga yod de/ tshogs shing za na ma yin pa dang / yang yang za na ma yin pa dang / khyim rnam su 'gron du ma bos par
169a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyi bzheso//
169a2('dul ba): de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas/ chos gos byas pa dang chos gos
169a3('dul ba): zin pa dang ldan nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtsa rtug po dang 'dam rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing rdul gyi lus g.yogs bzhin mnyan yod
169a4('dul ba): gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba dang / mnyan yod du phyin to// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis chos dang / lhung bzed mkho su phab nas
169a5('dul ba): rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
169a6('dul ba): tu 'dug/ chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ blo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so so'i yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so
169a7('dul ba): yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong dag khyed dag bzod gang nas 'ongs/ gnas gang du dbyar gnas btsun pa bdag cag gis ni gnas bcas nas da bzod
169a8('dul ba): mchis lags te/ bdag cag gnas bcas na dbyar mchis mchis lag so// dge slong dag khyed cag gnas bca su ji ga bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas sam bsod
170b1('dul ba): yang dag par bgo ba/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong cig gis gsol ba byas te/ las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnam
170b2('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi snyed pa byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'dis srabarkyang bgyi
170b3('dul ba): nas srab kyang gding bar bzhed na/ des na srab kyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang / 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na sar pa rnam
170b4('dul ba): dang / lha mos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyi snang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis chos
170b5('dul ba): gos 'di srab kyang mdzad de chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi srab kyang 'dingaso// de nas srab kyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang
170b6('dul ba): bral bar mi 'gyur na/ sar pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dung btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos
170b7('dul ba): gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'byung ba lags la/ dge 'dun yang srab kyang bgyi bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di srab kyang
170b8('dul ba): du mdzad pas/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis srab kyang 'ding so// des na srab kyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams 'bral bar
170a1('dul ba): 'gron ma yin pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos btsal ba dang / ston zla 'bring po nas sgyid zla ra ba'i bar gyi nang der/ srab kyang ting
170a2('dul ba): ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin pa'o// snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na ngas yang ngas rje su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams
170a3('dul ba): reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyi'i dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dge slo kyang bting
170a4('dul ba): bar bya'o// 'di ltar srab kyang la phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu thal na ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas srab kyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong
170a5('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis srab rkyang bting bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa na/ dge slong rnams kyis srab rkyang ji ltar bting ba ma shes nas/ bcom
170a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos yod pa gang yin pa de las bting bar bya'o// bting ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ re shig thog
170a7('dul ba): mar 'thun pa'i dgo bar bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed na chos gos
170a8('dul ba): 'dis dge 'dun gyi srab kyang gting bar bgyi'o// de nas phyi de nyin gnas mal bshams nas 'gen de rdungs te/ bris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la/
171b1('dul ba): nas spo ba dang / mgur ba bya ba spyod pa dang / bzhi gnas mgur bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gnas nas phyung ba'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan pa sko bar
171b2('dul ba): mi bya ste 'dun pas 'gro ba ste/ zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / srab kyang bting ba dang ma ting
171b3('dul ba): ba mi shes pa'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra ba skyang 'dings par ma rkos pa ni/ sko bar bya zhing skos pa ni byung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang
171b4('dul ba): zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / srab kyang bting
171b5('dul ba): ba dang ma ting ba shes pa'o// skos pa 'di lta bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing / 'dun par
171b6('dul ba): gyur pa dang / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ re shig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi srab kyang 'dings par
171b7('dul ba): spro 'am/ gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/ las byas te dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
171b8('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ srab kyang 'dings pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi srab kyang 'dings par spro na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing
171a1('dul ba): mi 'gyur na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag chos 'di srab kyang du bgyid
171a2('dul ba): zhing chos gos 'di dge 'dun gyi srab kyang bting ste/ des na srab kyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang bral bar yang
171a3('dul ba): mi 'gyur na srar pa rnams dang / lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang mi gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/
171a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di srab kyang da mdzad nas/ chos gos 'di dge 'dun gyi srab kyang 'dings te/ des na srab kyang bting ba'i gnas nas
171a5('dul ba): chas pa la/ chos gos rnying pa rnams dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur na/ sbar pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas
171a6('dul ba): 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de 'og tu srab kyang 'dings pa'i dge slong sko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni srab kyang
171a7('dul ba): 'dings par ma skos pa ni sgos par mi bya zhing / skos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang dbyar ral pa dang / dbyar phyi mar
171a8('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / slab pa byin pa bya'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na sgo bar mi bya ste/ spo ba dang bzhi
172b1('dul ba): chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi slad du gsol to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// ngas dge slong srab kyang 'ding pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong srab kyang
172b2('dul ba): 'di ngas pas/ srab kyang thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/ bkru'o// sbyang ngo // dra'o// brub po// kha sgyu ro// chung ngu na khab kyi srubs gnyis sam gsum yang
172b3('dul ba): btsems par bya'o// len gnyis len gsum du sems skyed par bya'o// de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi ngo tsha bco lnga la bgo bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag pang
172b4('dul ba): kho bo srab kyang 'dings kyis khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung zhing / de nas srab kyang 'di ngas pa'i dge 'dun gis srab kyang dri dang me tog gis rtor zhing dri
172b5('dul ba): zhim po'i 'dugs nas/ gnas mal bshams te/ 'gen de rdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bgo ba/ dge 'dun thams cad
172b6('dul ba): tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / de nas rgan pa'i mthar bzhag par bya'o// de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas srab kyang blangs te/ dge slong btsun pa rnams
172b7('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'di ni srab kyang du mdzad la/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang srab kyang 'ding bar skos te/ srab kyang 'did
172b8('dul ba): pa bdag ming 'di kyis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi srab kyang 'dings par 'gyuraro// bting ngo bting ngo // de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o//
172a1('dul ba): bzod ma dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong srab sbyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ga dge 'dun
172a2('dul ba): kyis srab kyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa gsan du gsol/ srab rkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
172a3('dul ba): 'di dge 'dun gyi srab kyang 'dings pa spro na/ de'i dge slong du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bya ba sra brkyang 'dings par rkos te/ srab kyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes
172a4('dul ba): bgyi bas/ dge 'dun gyi srabarkyang 'dings par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba srab kyang 'dings par sko bar bzod pa de dag ni
172a5('dul ba): cang mi gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis srab rkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
172a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi srab rkyang 'dings par skos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas gsol bas srab rkyang 'dings pa'i dge 'dun la srab rgya
172a7('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'di ni srab kyang mdzad na/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang srab kyang 'dir
172a8('dul ba): par rkos lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig/ 'di ltar dge 'dun dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la
173b1('dul ba): rnams byin gyis rlobs shig/ de la snyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'kho
173b2('dul ba): gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa du zhig gis srab kyang ma gting ba lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i te/ dbyar gyi gnas ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral pa dang / dbyar phyi mar
173b3('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang / srab kyang de 'dings pa na/ mngon gsum du ma gyur pa'i 'o// gzhan yang 'di lnga
173b4('dul ba): ma bting ba yin te/ spos pa dang / spos spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar spyad zin pa dang / slab pa byin pa'o// btsun pa dus shig rnyed pa
173b5('dul ba): mchis pa la phan yon ma mchis pa lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar gyi ral pa dang dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang /
173b6('dul ba): dbyar tha dad par dam bcas pa dang / srab kyang de 'dings pa na/ mngon gsum du ma gyur pa'i 'o// gzhan yang lnga pa 'di lta ste/ spo ba dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang /
173b7('dul ba): mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang / slab pa byin pa'i'o// btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa yang ma mchis pa la phan yon yang ma mchis lags/
173b8('dul ba): nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste/ mthong ba gnas nas phyung ba dang / phyir mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba dang / sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang /
173a1('dul ba): de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyi gnas rten gyi 'dun du 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gnas rten dgongasu gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dge
173a2('dul ba): 'dun gyi srab kyang du mdzad pa la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang srab kyang 'dings par rkos pa lags te/ bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi
173a3('dul ba): srab kyang bting lag so zhes brjod par bya'o// de legs par bting ngo shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi
173a4('dul ba): yin no zhes rjod par bya zhing / de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par dge 'dun sar bu'i bar du thams cad gting gyi lags par ting ngo // shin
173a5('dul ba): tu sting ste 'di la rnyed pa dang / phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no// zhes brjod par bya zhing 'o// srab kyang 'di ngas pa'i dge slong gis srab
173a6('dul ba): kyang thogs te/ chab khung sar ma yin phyi sar ma yin te/ tshang mang du yang 'jug par mi bya'o// gal te song na de na gnas par mi bya'o// srab kyang 'dings pa'i
173a7('dul ba): dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshab can du 'gyuraro// de nas srab kyang 'di sa
173a8('dul ba): ba'i dge slong gis dpyod zlar bzla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshe bco lnga la yang bgo bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo srab kyang 'byin gyis khyod cag so so'i chos gos
174b1('dul ba): dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod/ cig dang dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyis srid du srab kyang
174b2('dul ba): 'byin par mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pa 'di srid du
174b3('dul ba): srab kyang bting ba las na/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags te/ dge 'dun gyis chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad
174b4('dul ba): du srab kyang 'byin par mdzad/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi phyir srab kyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang
174b5('dul ba): ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang na/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnam
174b6('dul ba): kyi slad du srab kyang 'byin par mdzad de/ gang gi slad du mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de bgo bar bya ste/ bgos nas gang
174b7('dul ba): 'dod pa des rang gi skal pa chom rkun pa bdag gis bcom na dge slong rnams la bgo sha bya'o// sdom la spel pa dang ni dril zos dang / mtha' skor ldan/ rol ldan
174b8('dul ba): ring dang / gso ma'i seng ras zegs pa dang / rnyings dang spangs dang dengs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/
174a1('dul ba): dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / dge 'dun byed na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs pa'i'o// dge slong rab tu mang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na/
174a2('dul ba): chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom nas/ de dag rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa leg so 'ongs
174a3('dul ba): pa leg so// ji ga bde bar byed dam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar spyad pa ni ji 'dra ba zhig bdag cag/ ni chos kun pa rnams kyis bcom mo// tshe dang ldan
174a4('dul ba): pa dag bdag cag la rnyed par mang du byung ste/ gal te srab kyang phyung na khyod la chos gos kyi bgo sha bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dge
174a5('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjesu gnang te/ chom rkun pa dag gi bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir
174a6('dul ba): srab kyang dbyung bar bya'o// dbyung ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la 'gen de rdungs te/ bris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo la/
174a7('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad 'tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
174a8('dul ba): gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas 'di srid du srab kyang bting ba las dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhag na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi
175b1('dul ba): ba gsum/ sar pa dang ni rtags pa nyid/ phongs pa dang ni so ma'i ras/ gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/ btsun pa dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi srab rkyang
175b2('dul ba): bting du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor rung ngo // btsun pa dgung zla gsum 'das nas/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa gang lags pa des srab kyang bting du rung
175b3('dul ba): lags sam/ nye bar 'khor rung ngo // chos gos sar pa rung ngo // sar par rtags par rung ngo // phongs pa'i chos rung ngo // gso mi'i seng ras snams sbyar mi rung ngo //
175b4('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa gang zag gi snam sbyar gyis srab rkyang bting du rung lags sam/ gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo // bla gos dang thang gos kyang
175b5('dul ba): de bzhin no// sdom la/ gang zag gi dang khyim pa dang / khru lnga pa dang khru lnga'i lhag/ blo mthun byas pa'i gting ba dang / mtshams kyi nang nyid skye ba'o// btsun pa
175b6('dul ba): gang zag gis chos gos kyis srab rkyang bting du rung lags sam/ mi rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na'o// khyim pa'i gos kyis mi rung ngo // gal
175b7('dul ba): te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na mi rung ngo // khru lnga pas rung ngo // khru lnga las lhag pa rung ngo // blo mthun par byas pa'i srab rkyang gi chos gos dang / srab rkyang 'dings
175b8('dul ba): bas rung ngo // 'tshams kyi nang du blo 'thun par byas pa'i sra ba rkyang chos gos kyis rung ngo // mtshams kyi nang du srab rkyang 'dings pas skos pa rung ngo // ma mo rgyad kyi/
175a1('dul ba): btsun pa chos rdol bas srab kyang gting du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal
175a2('dul ba): ba dang / chos gos cha ga btab pa dang chos gos glan pa blo bos btab pa dang / chos gos lhan rings can dang / gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos dang / chos gos theg
175a3('dul ba): pa dang / chos gos rnyings pa dang / chos gos spangs pa dang / chos gos dengs pas srab kyang gting du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // sdom la gling dang
175a4('dul ba): dus ma yin pa dang / gang zag gis ni chos gos gsum/ mi rung ba dang ma dras dang / khru lngar mchog mi bya dang / blo 'thun min dang mi gting dang / mtshams kyi phyi
175a5('dul ba): rol mi skye'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gling pa'i chos gos gis srab kyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba
175a6('dul ba): 'khor gyi rung ngo // btsun pa dus ma lags pa'i chos gos dang / gang zag gi snam sbyar dang / bla gos dang thang gos dang / mi rung ba'i chos dang ma dras pa dang / khru lnga
175a7('dul ba): ma mchis pa dang / blo 'thun par bgyis pa'i chos gos dang / srab kyang bting ba mo bskos pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol tu blo 'thun par bgyis pa'i chos gos kyi
175a8('dul ba): srab kyang dang / 'tshams kyi slad rol tu skos pa'i srab rkyang 'dings pas srabarkyang bting du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // sdom la/ dus kyi dang ni zla
176b1('dul ba): zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ongs zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no//
176b2('dul ba): nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang gting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin pa'i mtshas kyi phyi
176b3('dul ba): rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las 'di snyam du sems te/ slar yang mi 'ongs la chos gos kyang mi bya'o// snyam nas des de rtsom zhing brtsam
176b4('dul ba): pa dang / nyams pa de ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi srab rkyang byung ba yin no// thos pa'i mtha' can gyi srab rkyang phyung ba gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang gding
176b5('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ongs te chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas srab
176b6('dul ba): rkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun pas srab rkyang phyung ngo // zhes thos so thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin du byung ngo // zhes shin tu yi rang bar byas pa de ni/
176b7('dul ba): thos pa'i mtha' can gyi srab rkyang byung ba yin no// mtshams 'das pa'i srab rkyang phyung ba gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge slong srab rkyang gting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos
176b8('dul ba): ma byas chos gos ma zin par phyir 'ong ngam/ phyir mi 'ongs snyam pa las 'tshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i na/ mtshams 'das pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// re thag
176a1('dul ba): bzhi la srab cang chung bar 'gyur te/ rgyud gang zhe na/ song ba dang rdzogs pa dang / ngas pa dang / nyams pa dang / thos pa dang / 'tshams 'das pa
176a2('dul ba): dang / re thag chad pa dang / rgyad pa ni srab kyang byung ba nyid de/ song ba'i 'tha' can gyi srabarkyang phyung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang / nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyam
176a3('dul ba): pa mtha' can dang / zos pa'i mtha' can dang / mtshams 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang rgyad pa ni srab kyang phyung zin pa nyid yin no// song ba'i mtha' can gyi srab
176a4('dul ba): rkyang byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos ma zin par lhung bzed dang / chos gos blangs te/ phyir mi 'ongs
176a5('dul ba): bar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra ba rkyang phyung ba yin no// rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi srab rkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong srab rkyang
176a6('dul ba): bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas phyir 'ong zhing chos gos sa bya'o// snyam pa las de'i 'di snyam
176a7('dul ba): du sems te bdag slar mi 'ong ba ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o// snyam pa de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi srab rkyang phyung ba yin no// nges pa'i mtha' can gyi srab
176a8('dul ba): rkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong srab rkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyis phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong
177b1('dul ba): kyis srab kyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong srab kyang gting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par 'tshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ lar 'ong
177b2('dul ba): zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong mod kyis 'on kyang chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi srab kyang byung ba
177b3('dul ba): yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong srab rkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/
177b4('dul ba): snyam pa las des de rtsom zhing de'i rtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi srabarkyang byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong srabarkyang 'dings pa'i gnas nas
177b5('dul ba): chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin pa 'tshams kyi phyi rol tu 'ong nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun thun pas sra brkyang phyung ba des dge 'dun
177b6('dul ba): 'thun pas srab kyang byung ngo // zhes thos so thos nas kyang legs par byung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo // zhes rjes yid rang ba'i byas pa de'i ni/ zos pa'i mtha' can gyis
177b7('dul ba): srab rkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong srab rkyang phyung ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong
177b8('dul ba): zhing ches gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa las de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi/
177a1('dul ba): chad pa'i srab rkyang phyung ba gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge slong srab rkyang gting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par 'tsham
177a2('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o mnyam pa las de'i chos gos re ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du chad pa de ni re thag chad pa'i srab
177a3('dul ba): rkyang phyung ba yin no// rgyad pas srabarkyang phyung ba gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos ma zin par mtsham
177a4('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu song ba las de yang slar 'ongs shing sra brkyang phyung ba nyam su myong de'i ni/ rgyad pa srab rkyang phyung ba nyid yin no// sdom la ma byas pa ni nyi shu dang / gsag
177a5('dul ba): pa dag ni nyi shu dang / re ba yod pa nyi shu dang / re ba med pa nyi shu cig ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong srab rkyang gting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma
177a6('dul ba): zin par 'tshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong mod kyi 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa
177a7('dul ba): de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i 'tha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong srab kyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol
177a8('dul ba): tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong mod kyi 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can
178b1('dul ba): bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i tha can gyi srab rkyang byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong srabarkyang gting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par
178b2('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o sem la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sem te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi
178b3('dul ba): bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin pa
