349b7('dul ba): bya'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams nas 'gan de brdungs la dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la dge 'dun thams cad
349b8('dul ba): tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / re shig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde khyad gsal ba yin na/ mtshams kyi phyogs
349a1('dul ba): gyis/ gzhan dag ni ma yin no// de lta bu'i skams la gnas pa rnams kyis/ cod pa skyes shing byung bzhi par bya ste/ de lta bu'i skam la gnas/
349a2('dul ba): ba rnams kyis rtsod pa zhi bar byas pa mngon sum du dag pa yin no// de la mngon sum du ji lta bu zhe na/ mngon sum ni gnyis te/ gang zag mngon sum dang / chos mngon
349a3('dul ba): sum mo// gang dag mngan sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis cod pa deni byed pa dang / gang zag gis chud pa de zhi bar bya ba de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur cing ban
349a4('dul ba): sum du gyur pa ste/ 'di ni gang bag mngon sum zhes bya'o// chos mngon sum gang she na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang / chos gang dang 'dul ba gang gis rtsod ga/
349a5('dul ba): zhi bar 'gyur bar ston pa'i bstan pa de dang / chos de dang 'dul bas des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o// gal te dge slong skams
349a6('dul ba): gnas pa dag gis cad pa dazhi bar byed mi nus na/ de rnams kyis rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtod par bya zhing dag 'dun gyi ston pa'i bstan bcos 'dul bas
349a7('dul ba): la 'i ldan pa tsha 'phru nga pa na ga pa nas pa sh+tsa/
349a8('dul ba): pa dzi pa ma rnas pa na / dgag sa sa ga ma na ga
350b1('dul ba): sde gsal ba rnams bskos te/ sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba mtshams kyi slad du mchis nas/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid par
350b2('dul ba): bzod pa de dag cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni ma gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnas nas/ dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang //
350b3('dul ba): chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba de rnams mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas/ dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa zhi bar bgyi ba skos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi
350b4('dul ba): gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin to// gsal ba rnams kyis ni/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o// gsal ba rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pas
350b5('dul ba): chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas nas/ legs par zhi bar bya bar brjod par bya ste/ mngon sum dag pa yin no// de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe na/ mngon sum ni gnyis
350b6('dul ba): te/ gang zag mngon sum dang / chos mngon sum mo// gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang zag gi rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du
350b7('dul ba): gyur pa ste/ 'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o// gal te dge slong chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang chos gang dang / 'dul ba gang gi rtsod pa de
350b8('dul ba): zhi bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa dang / chos de dang 'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dri ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o// gal te dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis
350a1('dul ba): logasu dong nas/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa bar bya bar sgo 'am/ gal te spro bar gyur na/ de rnams kyis spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slom
350a2('dul ba): gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde rnams gsal ba lags/
350a3('dul ba): te/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas dge 'dun gyis rtsod par zhi bar spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
350a4('dul ba): cig dang 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang / chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun sde gsal ba rnams bskos te/ sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin dang dge 'dun
350a5('dul ba): sde gsal ba mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
350a6('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin pa dang / dge 'dun sde rnams gsal ba lags te/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis nas/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa'i
350a7('dul ba): bar bgyi bar spro nas/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin dang dge 'dun sde rnams bskos te/ sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun
350a8('dul ba): sde gsal ba rnams mtshams kyi slad du rol mchis nas/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag sangs rgyas skyong dang chos sbyin dang / dge 'dun
351b1('dul ba): dbyung bar mi bya'o// sko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la 'gan de brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo la/ dge 'dun
351b2('dul ba): thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang re shig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa sbed pa spro 'am/ gal te spron/ des spro'o zhes
351b3('dul ba): brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/ las bya'o dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes
351b4('dul ba): bgyi ba/ 'di dge 'dun gyis brtsod pa sbed par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyi gnang bar mdzod cig/ 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis
351b5('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rtsod pa byed sbed par bsgo ste/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes gyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol
351b6('dul ba): ba'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa spro na/ de'i slad
351b7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dge slong gi ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa sbed par 'gyed par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig gang dag mi bzod pa de
351b8('dul ba): dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cig snang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'acod par sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun gyis bcod pa sbedapa
351a1('dul ba): rtsod pa de zhi bar bya mi nus na/ de rnams kyis dge slong gsal bas kyang gsal brgyad dam dgu bskor bar bya ste/ gsal ba bas kyang gsal pa
351a2('dul ba): rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas brtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o// gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas nas legs par zhi bar byas
351a3('dul ba): par brjod par bya'o// gal te dge slong gsal ba byas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar bya mi nus na/ de rnams kyis brtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par
351a4('dul ba): bya'o// de nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rtsod pa sbed par bsko bar bya'o// chos lnga dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong brtsod pa sbed pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// bskos pa
351a5('dul ba): dbyung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / rtsod pa spos pa dang / ma spos pa mi
351a6('dul ba): shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma sgo ba ni bsgo bar mi bya'o// bsgos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed/
351a7('dul ba): pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang gti mug gi mi 'gro ba dang /
351a8('dul ba): 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / rtsod pa sbed pa dang / ma spos pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ma skos pa ni sko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni
352b1('dul ba): so so thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o// gnas brtan dang bcas so so thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun
352b2('dul ba): gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/ mngon sum dag pa yin no// de la mngon sum ji lta bu zhe
352b3('dul ba): na/ mngon sum ni gsum ste/ dge 'dun mngon sum dang / gang zag mngon sum dang / chos mngon sum mo// dge 'dun mngon sum gang zhe na/ mtshams na gnas pa'i
352b4('dul ba): dge slong bya bar 'os pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa/ 'dun pa blangs par 'os pa rnams 'dun pa blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams 'dus
352b5('dul ba): shing mngon sum du gyur kyang mi btub cing bshe ba gang dag gi bshe ba 'os pa rnams mi btub pa med cing mi shes la/ las dag pa 'di ni dge 'dun mngon sum zhes bya'o//
352b6('dul ba): gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang zag gis brtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dag/ gang zag gi brtsod pa de zhi bar bya ba de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur/
352b7('dul ba): 'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o// chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang / chos gang dang / 'dul ba gang gis brtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i smos
352b8('dul ba): pa'i bstan pa de dag chos de dag 'dul ba des/ rtsod pa de zhi bar bya ba 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o// gal te gnas brtan dang bcas/ so so thar pa dang bcas pa'i
352a1('dul ba): sgos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// ngas bcod pa'i sbed pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos ban
352a2('dul ba): bar bya ste/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gis brtsod pa des gnas brtan dang bcas so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad par bya zhing rgan rab ji lta
352a3('dul ba): ba bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ rtsod pa sbed pa 'di ni gnas ga ge mo zhig 'di las byung nas/ dus 'di srid cig lon
352a4('dul ba): te/ rtsod pa de skams las gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar bgyi/ rngo ma thog nas de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ dge 'dun gyis kyang ma
352a5('dul ba): spyod nas/ des gsal ba'i dge slong rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis rngo ma thog nas/ de rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal babs kyang gsal ba rnam
352a6('dul ba): bskos pa las dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba de rnams kyis kyang / rngo ma thog nas de rnams kyi kyang dge 'dun la btad pa dang dge 'dun gyi kyang bdag la dge slong
352a7('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi brtsod pa sbed par bskos nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed/ ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas rten dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa/
352a8('dul ba): dge 'dun la 'bul gyis/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis 'di na bzung ste/ rtsod pa 'di zla ba drug gis mtha'i bar gyis zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ gnas brtan dang bcan
353b1('dul ba): bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ brtsod pa 'di mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la btad kyis shes ldan mdo sde dang
353b2('dul ba): 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis 'di nas bzung ste/ rtsod pa 'di lo gcig gi mtha'i bar mdzod cig/ mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dpe
353b3('dul ba): slong rnams kyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o// mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byas na/
353b4('dul ba): legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ste/ mngon sum dag pa yin no// de la mngon sum ji lta ba zhe na/ mngon sum du ni gnyis te/ gang zag mngon sum dang / chos
353b5('dul ba): mngon sum mo/ gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang / gang dag gi rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba de dag thams cad 'dus shing //
353b6('dul ba): mngon sum du gyur pa 'di ni gang zag mngon sum zhes bya'o// chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ ston pa'i bstan pa gang dang chos gang dang / 'dul gang gis rtsod pa de zhi bar 'gyu
353b7('dul ba): ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang chos de dang 'dul ba des rtsod pa de zhi bar byed/ 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o// gal te mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge/
353b8('dul ba): slong rnams kyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/ de rnams kyis cod pa sbed pa'i dge slong nyid la btad par bya'o// rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong gis gnas gang na dge slong
353a1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis bcod pa dezhi par byed mi nus so// des btsod pa de brtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong nyid la gtad par bya'o// cod pa sbed pa'i dge slong
353a2('dul ba): gis mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la btang par bya zhing / rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin la brjod par bya ste/ shes ldan dag mdo sde dang 'dul
353a3('dul ba): ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams gsan du gsol/ brtsod pa 'di ni gnas ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas/ dus 'di srid cig lon te/ rtsod pa de ska
353a4('dul ba): la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar byed nus nas/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la btad pa las/ dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas/ des kyang dge slong gsal
353a5('dul ba): rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong
353a6('dul ba): gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis kyang nus na/ de rnams kyis kyang dge 'dun la brtad pa dang / dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa/
353a7('dul ba): sbed par bskos te/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas brtsod pa 'di gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la
353a8('dul ba): gtad pa las/ gnas brtan dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis ma spyod nas bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la btad de
354b1('dul ba): dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang dag dge slong rtso de/ sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtad nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming/
354b2('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi brtsod pa 'di gnas brtan la 'gul na/ gnas brtan gyis 'di nas bzung ste/ rtsod pa 'di ji tsam gyis mthar phyin gyi bar du/ zhi bar mdzad du gsol/
354b3('dul ba): zhes brjod par bya'o// ngas dge slong gnas brtan gyis kun spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong gnas brtan gyis rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams
354b4('dul ba): sos shing stobs na/ bdag gir mi bya ste/ ba'i lci ba stobs na ma yin/ bdag 'tshal stobs na ma yin bzhin zhing 'don pa dang / 'dri ba yang byed du mi gzhug ste/
354b5('dul ba): gzhan du na 'dun du 'am rgyab du 'dug nas/ tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bdag ma 'thab shig/ 'tshang 'bru shig/ zab mo ma byed cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ de ci
354b6('dul ba): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag rtsod pa la gnyis ka la rgyal ba med kyis/ 'on kyang gcig rgyal gcig pham par 'gyuraro// 'gyed pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyis/
354b7('dul ba): 'on kyang cig rgyal cig pham par 'gyur ro// zhes bya zhing dge slong gnas brtan gyis ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa de zhi bar bya'o// dge slong gnas brtsa
354b8('dul ba): gyis brtsod pa de zhi bar byas nas/ legs par zhi bar byas pa brjod par bya'o// dge slong dag de ltar na mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa ni brjod pa zhi par byed pa yin
354a1('dul ba): gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba 'am/ shes nyes can gang yang rung ba 'am/ gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa de la gtad par bya zhing
354a2('dul ba): rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin la brjod par bya ste/ gnas brtan dag gson cig/ rtsod pa 'di ni ga ge mo zhig tu gzhi 'di las byung nas/ dus 'di srid cig lon te/ rtsod pa
354a3('dul ba): skam gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar byed ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la btad pa dang / dge 'dun gyis kyang ma spyod nas/ des kyang dge slong ba rnam
354a4('dul ba): bskos pa las/ dge slong ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang nus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba bskos pa las dge slong
354a5('dul ba): gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba rtsod pa sbed
354a6('dul ba): bar skos nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di nas brtan dang bcas/ dge slong so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la btad pa
354a7('dul ba): las/ gnas rten dang bcas/ so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyis zhi bar ma spod nas/ des kyis bdag dge slong rtsod pa sbed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la btang
354a8('dul ba): nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pazed pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ rtsod pa 'di mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i slong rnams la gtad pa dang / mdo sde dang 'dul ba
354'b1('dul ba): ji lta bu zhe na/ dbye bar byed pa'i bzhi bzhi bcu bzhi las 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shing tu rab tu yin te/ de ltar dge ba'i bsam
354'b2('dul ba): pa can yin no// sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/ skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyi bar gyis te/ de ltar na sbyor ba gzhan tu mi 'gyur ba
354'b3('dul ba): can yin te/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa sa na/ gang tshul mang po blang ba'i gzhi ni brtsub pa dang / gdug pa dang dam po dang dbye ba'i bsam pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du mi
354'b4('dul ba): 'gyur ba can yin no// de nas tshul shing 'grim pa'i dge slong bsgo bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'grim par ma sgo bar mi bya'o// lnga gang ni
354'b5('dul ba): na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang 'jig pas 'gro ba dang / tshul shing brims pa dang / ma brims pa mi shes pa ste/
354'b6('dul ba): chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i tshul shing 'drim par ma skos pa bsko bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'drim par ma
354'b7('dul ba): bskos pa ni sko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gi mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /
354'b8('dul ba): 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / tshul shing brim pa dang / ma brims pa shes pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul brims par ma skos pa ni bsko ba
354'a1('dul ba): zhing de lta na kha cig gi cod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang / zhi bdag nye bar zhi
354'a2('dul ba): yin no// dge slong tshul shing mang po blang ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod
354'a3('dul ba): pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang / zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ skam la gnas pa nas bzung ste/ gnas brtan gyis par gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te dge
354'a4('dul ba): slong gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed mi nus na/ rtsod pa sbed pa'i dge slong de la gtad par bya'o// des rtsod pa de dge 'dun la btad par bya'o// dge 'dun
354'a5('dul ba): gyis rtsod pa de gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa de zhi bas zhi bar bya'o// rgyus lngas gang tshul shing mang po len pa'i rtsod pa zhi ba ni gdug pa dam po dang / dbye/
354'a6('dul ba): ba'i bsams pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin no// rdzun pa ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsub po rab tu bzung ba/
354'a7('dul ba): yin te/ de lta na rtsub po can yin no// gdug pa ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams gdug pa dang / rnam par gnon pa yin te/ de ltar
354'a8('dul ba): gdug pa yin no// dam po ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dge slong kyis dam rab tu bzung ba yin te/ de ltar dam po can yin no// dbye ba'i bsam pa
355b1('dul ba): slong gnas brtan rnams kyis rje su byed pa rnams chos kyis tshul shing rab tu mang po len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do// snyam nas/ de tshul shing /
355b2('dul ba): mngon par te/ 'di ni mngon pa'i tshul shing 'brim pa zhes bya'o// rna drang du gshub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'dri ma
355b3('dul ba): pa'i dge slong gis rna drang du gtugs te/ gshugs la tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po'i chos kyis tshul shing blangs kyis/ khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing log shig
355b4('dul ba): khyod kyi slob dpon dang / mkhan po cig pa dang / slob dpon gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / 'phebs par smra ba dang / smos 'grin dang / 'grogs shes kyi
355b5('dul ba): chos kyi tshul shing blangs kyis khyed kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing long ces smra ba ste/ 'di ni rna drung du bshub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun
355b6('dul ba): thams cad pa'i/ tshul shing 'drim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di na dge slong nad pa rab tu mang
355b7('dul ba): gal te bdag gis dge 'dun tshogs shing ma 'dus par tshul shing brims nas/ dge slong rab tu mang po'i chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur ba gang
355b8('dul ba): yin pa'i gnas de yod kyis/ ma la bdag gis dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang / tshul shing brim par bya'o snyam nas/ de dge 'dun thams cad
355a1('dul ba): bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// tshul shing brim pa ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ smra ba dang mngon pa dang / na drung du gtung ba dang bcas pa/
355a2('dul ba): dang / dge 'dun thams cad pa'o// sba ba'i tshul zhing brim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing brim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di na dge slong
355a3('dul ba): gnas brtan gnas rab tu mang po dag ni chos ma yin pa smra lca gla sar bu nyung zad cig ni chos smra bas/ gal te bdag gis tshul shing mngon par brim nas/ dge
355a4('dul ba): slong gsar bu dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyi rje su byed pa rnams/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rab tu mang po len par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod
355a5('dul ba): ma la bdag gi tshul sbas te brim mo mnyam nas/ des tshul shing sbas nas 'drim pa de/ 'di ni sba ba'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes bya'o// mngon pa'i tshul shing ni 'drim pa
355a6('dul ba): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas brtan rab tu mang po dag ni chos smra la/ dge slong
355a7('dul ba): gsar bu nyung zad cig na chos ma yin pa smra bas/ gal te bdag gis tshul shing sbas te brims na/ dge slong gsar bu rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par
355a8('dul ba): 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod kyis ma la bdag gis tshul shing mngon par brim mo// bdag gis tshul shing gsal bar brims nas dge slong gsar bu dge
356b1('dul ba): pas tshul shing len pa yin no// chung bas kyang tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ sdam par bya ba dang / gshegs par bya ba yin no// snyam nas tshul shing len pa ste/
356b2('dul ba): lta bu ni chung ba bas kyang tshul shing len pa yin no// dbye ba'i bsams pas tshul shing len pa ji lta zhe na dbye bar byed pa'i bzhi bcu bzhi las/ dbye bar byed pa'i
356b3('dul ba): bzhi gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shin tu rab tu bzung ste de lta bu ni dge 'dun dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa yin no// sbyor ba bzhin du ma gyur pas tshul
356b4('dul ba): shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ skabs la gnas pas ma yin pa nas gzung nas gnas brtan gyis ma yin bya ba'i bar du ste/ de lta bu ni sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul
356b5('dul ba): shing len pa yin no// rten kha lo bsgyur ba dang mi bstan pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin
356b6('dul ba): par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la rten dang / kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ste/ de rnams la ma rtags par tshul shing len pa ste/ 'di lta bu ste/
356b7('dul ba): kha lo bsgyur ba dang / mi rtun pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/
356b8('dul ba): tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes de snyam bsams nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye bar bya
356a1('dul ba): tshogs shing 'dus pa dang / tshul shing 'drim pa ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa zhes bya'o// chos ma yin pa'i
356a2('dul ba): tshul shing len pa bcu dang chos kyi bcu'o// chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa dang / mi 'thun pas tshul
356a3('dul ba): shing len pa dang / chung ba pas kyang chung bas tshul shing len dang / dbye ba'i bsams pas tshul shing len pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa
356a4('dul ba): dang / rten kha lo sgyur ba dang / mi snun pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bye yang ci ma rung mnyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul
356a5('dul ba): shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin par smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar shes
356a6('dul ba): bzhin du tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po dag chos ma yin par smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa'o// /
356a7('dul ba): 'dul ba bzhi// / bam po don dgu pa'o// chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'dul ba dang / mthun pa ma yin pas tshul shing len pa ste/
356a8('dul ba): de lta bu chos ma yin pas tshul shing len pa yin no// mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge 'dun mi mthun par tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni mi mthun
357b1('dul ba): pa dang / chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa dang / mi dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du 'gyur bas tshul shing len
357b2('dul ba): pa dang / rten kha lo bsgyur ba dang / snun pas la shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar ma rung snyam pas tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu
357b3('dul ba): mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur grangs ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing brangs pas de dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul
357b4('dul ba): shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar ma shes pas tshul shing len pa yin no// chos kyi tshul shing len pa
357b5('dul ba): ji lta bu zhe na/ 'dul dang 'thun pas tshul shing len pa dang / de lta bu ni chos kyis tshul shing len pa yin no// 'thun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge 'dun
357b6('dul ba): 'thun pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni mthun pas tshul shing len pa yin no// chung ba bas kyang chung ba yin pa pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ sdam par bya/
357b7('dul ba): ba ma yin pa dang / gshegs par bya ba ma yin no snyam du sems nas/ tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni chung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len pa yin no//
357b8('dul ba): mi ba'i bsas pas tshul shing len pa'i lta bu zhe na/ dbye bar bya ba'i bzhi bcu bzhi las dbye bar byed pa'i bzhi yang rung ba legs par shin tu rab tu ma 'azung ba ste/ de 'du
357a1('dul ba): gyur kyang cim rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang tsam/
357a2('dul ba): rung snyam pas tshul shing lon pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas/ 'jug par 'gyur yang ci rung snyam
357a3('dul ba): pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam nas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pa
357a4('dul ba): dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing blangs pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar shes shing de ltar bsams nas tshul shing
357a5('dul ba): len pa dang de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bas shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos
357a6('dul ba): ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bas shes bzhin du/ tshul shing len pa ji lta bu tshul shing len pas dge slong rab tu mang po dag chos ma yin pa blangs nas/ 'jug par 'gyur
357a7('dul ba): bas shes shing de ltar bsams nas/ tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin
357a8('dul ba): du tshul shing len pa ste/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i len pa bcu yin no// chos kyi len pa bcu gang zhe na/ chos kyi tshul shi len pa dang / mthun pas tshul shing len
358b1('dul ba): shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur mi shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar mi shes
358b2('dul ba): shing de ltar mi sems pas/ tshul shing len te/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs
358b3('dul ba): bas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba mi shes pas tshul shing len pa lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blang
358b4('dul ba): nas spyod par mi shes shing de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang pos chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar mi
358b5('dul ba): shes pas tshul shing len pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyi tshul shing len pa bcu yin no// ngas dge slong tshul shing 'dri ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong tshul
358b6('dul ba): shing 'drims pas tshul shing rnam pa gnyis bsham par bya ste/ chos kyi tshul shing dang chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngo // chos kyi tshul shing rnams ni ya yo med pa/
358b7('dul ba): kyag kyog med pa kyang kyor med pa/ kha dog bzang ba reg na bde bar bya'o// chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams ni ya yo dang kyag kyog dang kyor kyor dang / kha dog ngan
358b8('dul ba): pa dang / reg na mi bde bar bya'o// de nas dge slong tshul shing 'drim pa lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi tshul shing blangs nas glayon pas chos mo yin pa'i tshul shing rnams bla
358a1('dul ba): ni mi dbye ba'i bsams pas tshul shing len pa yin no// sbyor ba gzhan du 'gyur bas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ skam la gnas pa nas bzung nas/
358a2('dul ba): gnas brtan gyis bar gyis te de lta bu ni sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa yin no// rten kha lo bsgyur ba dang / snun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dge slong
358a3('dul ba): mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa dang gang dag ni chos 'dul ba 'di la rten pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ste/ de rnams la rtags nas
358a4('dul ba): tshul shing len pa de lta bu ni stan kha lo bsgyur ba dang / snun pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas/ tshul
358a5('dul ba): shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing
358a6('dul ba): blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang pos chos ma yin pa smra bar
358a7('dul ba): ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pas blangs te/ 'jug par ma gyur kyang
358a8('dul ba): ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing
359b1('dul ba): na bzhes shig/ gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de log su lag pa bzed na/ tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya/ gnyis pa la sbyin par mi bya/ gsum pa la sbyin par
359b2('dul ba): bya ste/ de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bus 'dul ba dang / 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyis ltung ba gshegs par bya'o// gal te chos kyi tshul shing nyung bar bya na/ kun shes ko'u
359b3('dul ba): 'di n+ya'i tshul shing blang bar bya'o// gal te tshul shing cig gis lhag par gyur na yang de lta na 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rtsod pa de nye bar zhi ba yin no// de ltar rtsod pa zhi bar
359b4('dul ba): byas pa legs te 'ga' zhig skyo sngogs byed na/ ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing cig gis lhag par gyur na yang / de ltar na 'di lta
359b5('dul ba): ste/ chos ma yin pas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa yin no// de ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa la 'ga' zhig skyo sdog byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// de lta na gang tshul shing
359b6('dul ba): mang po blang ba rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin no// de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi na rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gang tshul shing len pa mang po rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba
359b7('dul ba): dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos gsum gyis 'dul bya zhi bar bya'o// gsum gang ni/
359b8('dul ba): na/ mngon sum du 'dul ba dang dran pas 'dul ba dang / ma mos pas 'dul ba'o// dge slong dag ji ltar na mngon sum gyis 'dul ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin//
359a1('dul ba): nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyi 'dun 'dug ste/ chos kyi tshul shing rnams kyi tshul sngags pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams kyis
359a2('dul ba): sngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ste/ gnas brtan 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing lags te/ ya yo ma mchis pa/ kyeg kyog ma mchis pa/ kyang kyor ma mchis pa/ kha dog
359a3('dul ba): bzang ba reg na bde bar lags kyis bzhes shig/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shes lags/ ya yo dang / kyag kyog dang kyar kyor dang kha ngan pa reg na mi bde ba lags
359a4('dul ba): pa gzhes shig/ gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na bde log su lags pa gzhes shig/ gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na ba de logs lag pa bzed na/
359a5('dul ba): tshig dang po la yang sbyin par mi bya/ gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya/ gsum la sbyin bya ste/ dge 'dun gnas brtan gyis 'dul ba dang / 'gal ba'i nyes pa byas kyi ltung
359a6('dul ba): ba gshegs par bya'o// de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar 'dun du 'dug nas/ chos kyis tshul shing rnams kyis sngags pa dang / chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams
359a7('dul ba): kyi sngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ste/ 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing lags te/ ya yo ma mchis pa/ kyag kyog ma mchis pa/ kyar kyor ma mchis pa/ kha dog bzang
359a8('dul ba): ba reg na bde ba lags kyis bzhes shig/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing lags te/ ya yo dang kyag kyog dang kyar kyor dang / kha dog ngan pa reg na mi bde ba la//
360b1('dul ba): te/ rgan rims ji lta buzhin dud pa byas la/ rgan pa'i mthar gtsog tsog por 'dug nas/ thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
360b2('dul ba): gsol/ gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mo'i mi bden pas bskur pa btab pas/ bdag la dge slong rnams bzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/ bdag la bzhi des
360b3('dul ba): gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun la drang bas 'dul ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs rtse ba can gyi nye bar bzung ste/ bdag gyad bu nor la dran pas
360b4('dul ba): 'dul ba stsal du gsol/ de skad len gnyis len gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya ste las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa
360b5('dul ba): rnams gsan du gsol/ gyad bu nor 'di dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas bskur pa btab pas 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/
360b6('dul ba): gzhi de las gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun dus la bab bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig
360b7('dul ba): dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la/ dran pas 'dul ba la sogs par mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste dge 'dun btsun pa rnam
360b8('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ gyad bu nor 'di la ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur ba bas/ 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de/ 'di la gzhi des gleng bar
360a1('dul ba): ji ltar na ni 'dim ba cigacod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul ba'i tshad bzhi par byed pas/ dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar ni ba yin no/
360a2('dul ba): skam la gnas pa na bzung nas/ gnas brtan gyi bar du gong ma bzhin du ste/ dge slong dag de ltar na mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing de ltar na
360a3('dul ba): 'di ni kha cig rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas/ dul ba dang zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag ji ltar na dran
360a4('dul ba): pas 'dun pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na ni 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ dran pas 'dul ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed par/ dul ba dang / zhi ba dang /
360a5('dul ba): nye bar zhi bar yin zhe na/ dper na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la dge slong ma 'dza' mos mi bden pas skur pa btab de la dge slong rnams gleng bar byed te/ gzhi des
360a6('dul ba): gleng ba na ngo tsha'o zhes bya ba'i bar skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyi
360a7('dul ba): gyed bu nor dang gzhan yang de lta bu dang 'thun pa su yang rung la dris pas 'dul blar byin cig/ sbyin pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la mgon de rdung nas dris
360a8('dul ba): dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang gyad bu nor gyis bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar
361b1('dul ba): gshegs par 'os pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste dge slong bye ma skye mos sems khrugs tshor bar nyan pa te/ sgren mor byung nas dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rje su 'thun
361b2('dul ba): pa ma yin pa/ mang du spyad smras stsal nas/ kha chu zags mig bgrangad bzhin 'gyur te/ gnyid kyi ma log par nyid log go snyam du shes/ pha rol gyis ma smras par
361b3('dul ba): smras so snyam du shes so// dus gzhan zhig na des rang sems slar sor chud pa/ de la gzhi des dge slong rnams gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed
361b4('dul ba): pa na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis bdag la gzhi gleng bar de la dran pas 'dul ba byin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul
361b5('dul ba): ba sbyin pa yin te/ de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ma mos par 'dul bar 'os pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste dge slong bzhi ldan dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba nyid shes pa
361b6('dul ba): las rngad nas phyir dran de/ shes pa las kyang rjed pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa
361b7('dul ba): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhug par 'os pa'i/ phyir te 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum gang zhe
361b8('dul ba): na 'di lta ste/ gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mas bden par bskur ba btab pa de la dge slong rnams bzhi des gleng bar byed pa ni/ dge 'dun la dran pa
361a1('dul ba): bgyid pa na dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba rtsol bar mdza
361a2('dul ba): na/ tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba gsol bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shing / dge 'du
361a3('dul ba): gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyi gyad bu nor la dran pas 'dul ba btsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin to// chos mi
361a4('dul ba): yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum dang / chos kyi gsum mo// chos ma yin dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong phas paM
361a5('dul ba): pa'i ltung ba byung ba de la dge slong rnams bzhi des gleng bar byed cing de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge slong dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de la dge 'dun/
361a6('dul ba): gyis dran pas 'dul ba byin pa yin te/ de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni snyil bar 'os pa yin pa'i phyi ro// 'di lta ste dge slong dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed da/
361a7('dul ba): so sor gshegs pa dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba de la dge 'dun rnams gzhi de gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun las
361a8('dul ba): dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci/
362b1('dul ba): tshor bas nyan nas sgren mor byung ste dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa rjesu 'thun pa ma yin pa mang du spyad smras rtsal nas kha nas chu zag mig 'gyur bzhin 'gyur te/ gnyid
362b2('dul ba): ma log par snyid kyi log go snyam du shes pha rol ma smras par smra so snyam du shes so// dus gzhan zhig na des rang gi sems sor chud pa dang / dge slong rnams
362b3('dul ba): gzhi de gleng bar byed de de la gzhi des gleng bar byed na dge 'dun la ma mos pas 'dul ba gsol ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
362b4('dul ba): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du/ dge slong dag khyed dge slong bye ma skyes dang / gzhan yang de lta bu dang 'thun pas su yang rung ba la/ ma mos pa
362b5('dul ba): 'dul ba sbyin pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la 'gan de brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo la/ dge 'dun de lta bu
362b6('dul ba): dang 'thun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong bye ma skyes kyi bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te rgan pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdud pa byas la rgan
362b7('dul ba): ba'i mthar cog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar lha 'di skad ces dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong bye ma skyes spyos sems 'khrugs
362b8('dul ba): tshor bas zhan nas smin mo byung ste/ dge sbyong gis tshul ma yin pa su zin pa ma yin pa mang du kyad sgras phul nas/ kha chu gas meg gyur bzhin 'gyur//
362a1('dul ba): / 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa na/ chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong zhig ltung ba gzhan kho na zhig byung //
362a2('dul ba): bar gyur pa de la dge slong rnams kyis bzhi gzhan gyis gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun
362a3('dul ba): las dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos kyis dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong zhig ltung ba byung bar gyur pa la/ des dge slong dge 'dun du gshags
362a4('dul ba): ba 'am byin gyis brlab par gyur pa de la/ dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pa na dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/
362a5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul sbyin pa ni/ chos kyis dran pas 'dul bar sbyin pa yin te/ gsum po 'di dag chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no// dge
362a6('dul ba): slong dag de ltar na dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa na/ rtsod pa yin zhing de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar
362a7('dul ba): byed pas/ dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag ji ltar nam mos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi par byed pa yin ji ltar na 'di na kha cig rtsod
362a8('dul ba): pa rnams 'di lta ste/ ma mos par 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong bye ma skyes mos sems 'khrugs
363b1('dul ba): par mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes 'dis myos sems rkyor bas nyen nas sgren
363b2('dul ba): mor byung ste/ dge slong gi tshul ma lags pa rjes mthun pa ma lags pa/ mang du spyad smras stsal nas/ kha chu zag mig 'gyur bzhin 'gyur/ gnyid kyis ma
363b3('dul ba): log par gnyid kyis log go// snyam du chal pha rol gyis ma smras par smra so snyam du 'tshal ba las/ dus gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gis sems sor chud pa dang /
363b4('dul ba): 'di la dge slong rnam gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing 'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa dge 'dun la ma mos pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun
363b5('dul ba): gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma myos par 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma mos pas 'dul stsol bar mdzad par
363b6('dul ba): bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung cig gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes
363b7('dul ba): lam mos pas 'dul ba stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// chos ma yin pa'i ma mos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin par
363b8('dul ba): cing dang chos kyi gcig go// chos ma yin pa'i la cig gang zhe na 'di lta ste dge slong ma myos par bdag ni smos so// sems 'khrugs par sems 'khrugs snyam du
363a1('dul ba): gnyid kyi ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du 'tshal pha rol gyis ma smras par smraso// snyam du 'tshal ba las dus gzhan zhig
363a2('dul ba): bdag gi sems sor chud pa dang bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar cing bgyid pa dge 'dun la ma mos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa
363a3('dul ba): rnams thugs rtse ba can/ thugs rtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong bye ma skyes la ma mos pas 'dul brtsal du gsol/ de skad lan gnyis len gsu
363a4('dul ba): du brjod par bya'o// de nas dge slong cig gis gsol pa bya ste las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes 'di smros 'khrug
363a5('dul ba): tshor bas nyan nas sgron mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa rjesu mthun pa ma lags pra/ mang du spyad smras/ stsal nas kha chu zags mig 'gyur bzhin 'gyur/
363a6('dul ba): te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du 'tshal/ pha rol gyi ma smras par smraso// snyam du 'chal ba las dus gzhan zhig na 'dir rang gi sems so//
363a7('dul ba): chud pa dang / 'di ni dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid cing 'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid pa/ dge 'dun lam mos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dag
363a8('dul ba): 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes la ma mos pas 'dul ba stsol
364b1('dul ba): 'dul bar 'os paso// dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhin/ dul bar bya ba'i zhi bar bya nye bar zhi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ khas blang bar 'os
364b2('dul ba): pa dang / mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / gang tshul zhing mang po sbyin par 'os pa dang / stsal bkram par 'os pas so// dge slong dag ji ltar na khas
364b3('dul ba): blang bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gis rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ khas blang bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang /
364b4('dul ba): zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ltung ba byung bar gyur pa de la gzhi des gled kyang rung ma gleng kyang rung dran par byas kyang rung dran par ma byas
364b5('dul ba): kyang rung / dge slong zhig gi 'dun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu zhig byung ba bdag
364b6('dul ba): gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mthol shig gshegs par bgyi'o// bdag gi mthol shing gshegs na/ bde ba la reg par 'gyur/ ma mthol ma gshegs na ni/
364b7('dul ba): ma lag so// des ltung ba mthong ngam zhes brjod par bya'o// des kyang ltung ba mthong ngo // zhes brjod par bya'o// snga ma shos kyis phyis sdom par byed dam zhes brjod
364b8('dul ba): par bya'o// phyi ma shos kyis bgyid do zhes brjod par bya'o// 'di na khas blang ba'o// chos ma yin pa'i khas blang ba sbyin pa bcu dang chos kyi bcu'o// chos ma yin pa'i
364a1('dul ba): shes pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la ma mos par 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i ma yin pa'i ma mos pas 'dul bar 'os
364a2('dul ba): pa sbyin pa yin te/ 'di ni chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no// chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong bye ma skyes myos sems 'khrugs tshor bas nyan

364a6('dul ba): ma mos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa na chos kyi mamo pas 'os pa sbyin pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyis gcig yin no// dge slong dag de ltar nam mos pas 'dul bar 'os
364a7('dul ba): ba ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rjod pa rnams dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag gdam ngag med pa'i rtsod pa rtsod pa

365b1('dul ba): zin no// 'di lta ste dge slong bam pa'i ltung ba ma byung la bdag la mabyung ngo // snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis ltung ba khas len du 'jug pa ni/ chos kyi mkhas/

365b5('dul ba): dang nye bar zhi ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhag so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ri
365b6('dul ba): dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po yang pa'i spre'u rdzing gi 'bram na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na 'dug go// de la rten nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams sangs rgyas dang /
365b7('dul ba): chos dang dge 'dun lhag par bya ba byed yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ri dag 'dzin gyi bu nag po 'di gzhan nyid du btsas la/
365b8('dul ba): gzhan du chen por gyur pa ste/ mnyan yod du skyes pa de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams lhags par dad par byed kyis de la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya/ des na de la/
365a1('dul ba): mkhas blang ba sbyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong bas pham pa'i ltung ba byung ba la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun
365a2('dul ba): gyis khas len tu 'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yin no// dge 'dun lhag ma'i dang ltung byed dang // so sor gshegs pa dang nyes byas kyi ltung ba
365a3('dul ba): byung ba la ma byung ngo // snyam du shes pa dang dge 'dun gyis de la khas len du 'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong phas pham

366b7('dul ba): rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa tshe dang ldan pa nag po 'ongs pa leg so// 'ongs pa leg so// khyod mthong ba ni kho bo cag dga' na/ 'ongs pa ni ma yin no// ci'i phyir 'di
366b8('dul ba): ltar khyod la rten nas/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge

366a2('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun srog khang gi khrus la spyan drang pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis gzar rtag la chos gos rnams bkal to khrus bya bar rtsam so// tshe dang
366a3('dul ba): ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pos kyang shes bzhin gyi mtha' cig tu chos gos bzhag nas khrus bya bar rtsam so// dge slong dag gzhan zhig gis kyang de nyid du
366a4('dul ba): chos gos gzhag go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa ri dag 'dzin gyi bu nag pos khrus byas nas/ 'di nyid bdag gis chos gos yin no snyam nas dge slong de chos gos bgos

367b1('dul ba): legs par blang ba yin no// de rnams rims kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos 'khosu phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te bcom ldan 'das gang na/

367b4('dul ba): mchis pa gnod pa ma bgyis pa la/ dran par bgyis par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyis pa bdag cag bgyid pa skyes nas ri dgas 'dzin gyis bu nag

367b6('dul ba): no// btsun pa bdag cag gis shul kar dge slong zhig las bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod pa de lta ste/ chos kyi blang lagaso zhes thos te de ltar lags mod kyi bdag cag
367b7('dul ba): gi nang na kha cig gi nang na kha cig gi mchid nas 'di skad ces blang ba ma lags kyi/ thag ring bar spang ba lags te/ 'di ltar der bdag cag mngon sum du ma gyur to/
367b8('dul ba): zhes mchi'o// gzhan dag ni gal te bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rje spang ba ni lags par blang ba lag so zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan
367a1('dul ba): #/ 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed do// des smras pa de na med mod kyi yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bdag la gleng bar ma byas dran par ma byas par/

367a3('dul ba): shig khyod ngas chos kyis blang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi blang ngo yang ba can gyi dge slong rnams bdag cag gis dge slong rab tu mang po skyon med pa
367a4('dul ba): gnod pa ma byas pa la mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa gang yin de ni ma legs pa zhig byaso zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas de rnams lhung bzed dang chos blangs te/
367a5('dul ba): mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ba las de rnams kyis lam kar dge slong mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang nas 'ongs/ mnyan yod nas so khyod kyi ri dag/
367a6('dul ba): 'dzin gyis bu nag po mthong ngam mthong ngo // de ci bya kho bo cag gis de skyon med pa gnod pa ma byas pas mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byaso// blang zin no// sus btso/

368b1('dul ba): 'os pa sbyin pa bcu drug dang / chos kyi bcu drug go// chos ma yin pa'i bcu drug gang zhe na/ gang zag chos dang mi 'thun pas gang zag chos dang 'thun pa dang / gang
368b2('dul ba): zag chos dang mi 'thun pa gnyis kyis gang zag chos dang mthun pa dang / gang zag chos dang mi mthun pas chos mang pos gang zag chos dang 'thun pa dang //
